tika-abh02t:1113_1: pavatto tadākāro moho upāyacintāvasena uppannoti daṭṭhabbo. Yathākate pana pāpe anādīnavadassanavasena
tika-abh02t:1113_2: pavattā saññā, saṅkappo vā paccavekkhaṇā, tassāpi micchābhāvapaṭicchādakaṃ tadākāraṃ,
tika-abh02t:1113_3: anādīnavadassanaṃ vā paccavekkhaṇākārena uppanno mohoti. Vimuttasaññitāti adhimānasampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1113_4: titthiyānaṃ vā attano diṭṭhiyā vimuttatāsañjānanaṃ. “Vimuttomhī”ti evaṃ pavatto akusalacittuppādo
tika-abh02t:1113_5: micchāvimuttīti keci vadanti. Phalaṃ viya vimuttanti gahite pana diṭṭhisampayuttacitte
tika-abh02t:1113_6: diṭṭhi micchāñāṇaṃ, samādhi ca micchāvimuttīti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh02t:1116_1: aññathā”ti pana visesaṃ akatvā gahaṇaṃ samūhagāhoti daṭṭhabbo. Aññaṃ ākāranti parasantānagataṃ
tika-abh02t:1116_2: ākāraṃ. Atthīti sadā saṃvijjatīti attho. Sīdatīti vinassati. Saṃsayaparivitakkavasenāti
tika-abh02t:1116_3: “kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ siyaṃ, na siya”nti evaṃ parivitakkavasena. Patthanākappanavasenāti
tika-abh02t:1116_4: “api nāma sādhu panāhaṃ siya”nti evaṃ patthanāya kappanavasena.
tika-abh02t:1117_1: vuttā. Tattha diṭṭhisīsehi diṭṭhiyā taṇhā dassitā, sīsasīsamūlakehi mānadiṭṭhīhi
tika-abh02t:1117_2: sayameva cāti āha “evamete…pe… taṇhā vicaritadhammā veditabbā”ti. Diṭṭhimānesupi
tika-abh02t:1117_3: “taṇhāvicaritānī”ti vacanañca aññamaññaṃ vippayogīnaṃ diṭṭhimānānaṃ taṇhāya avippayogīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1118_0: 974. Avakkarīti nipāto nānābhāve vattatīti anānākaraṇaṃ anavakkari, taṃ katvā, avakkari
tika-abh02t:1118_1: vā akatvā anavakkari katvāti evaṃ dassento āha “avinibbhogaṃ katvā”ti. “Anavakāriṃ
tika-abh02t:1118_2: karitvā”ti vā pāṭho, tattha avakiraṇaṃ vikkhepanaṃ samūhassa ekadesānaṃ vinibbhujjanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1118_3: avakāri, taṃ avakāriṃ vinibbhogaṃ akatvā, pañcapi khandhe samūhato ekatteneva gahetvā
tika-abh02t:1118_4: attato avinibbhujjitvā asmīti chandamānadiṭṭhiyo paṭilabhatīti attho. Asitabyābhaṅgitāyāti
tika-abh02t:1118_5: dāttena kājena cāti etena parikkhārena, asitabyābhaṅgīhi lavanavahanakiriyā vā “asitabyābhaṅgī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t:1119_0: 976. Avakāriṃ karitvāti rūpādīni attato vinibbhujjitvā iminā rūpena…pe… iminā viññāṇena
tika-abh02t:1119_1: asmīti chandaṃ paṭilabhatīti evaṃ sabbattha imināti etassa attato avinibbhuttena
tika-abh02t:1119_2: rūpādināti attho daṭṭhabbo. Attato hi avinibbhuttāni abahikatāni ahamicceva gahitāni
tika-abh02t:1119_3: rūpādīni upādāya upagantvā pavattā taṇhā “ajjhattikassa upādāyā”ti vuttā, attato
tika-abh02t:1119_4: ca vinibbhuttāni bahikatāni upagantvā pavattā “bāhirassa upādāyā”ti. Khaggena vā
tika-abh02t:1119_5: chattena vā ahaṃ niccoti abhimaṅgalasammatena khaggādinā mama vināso natthīti maññatīti
tika-abh02t:1119_6: attho. Ekekassāti idaṃ anādimhi anante ca saṃsāre ekekassa atītānāgatesu chattiṃsāyapi
tika-abh02t:1119_7: sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, ekekassa vā puggalassa yathālābhavasenāti idampi anissitataṇhāmānadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-abh02t:1124_2: niravasesato saṅgahitattā dutiyavārādīnañca ettha anuppavesato sabbasāmaññena vutto
tika-abh02t:1124_3: paṭhamo sabbasaṅgāhikavāro nāma, dutiyo uppattānuppattidassanavāro nāmāti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1124_4: Tattha pana “kāmadhātuyā kati khandhā kati āyatanānī”tiādinā tesaṃ atthitā eva vuttā,
tika-abh02t:1124_5: kiriyāvisesassa appayogo “atthi bhavati saṃvijjatī”ti sāmaññakiriyāya viññeyyabhāvato,
tika-abh02t:1124_6: tenāyaṃ “sambhavāsambhavadassanavāro”ti vattuṃ yutto, catuttho ca upapattikkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1125: 979. Yathāpucchanti pucchānurūpaṃ avitathabyākaraṇaṃ parehi katampi sabbaññuvacanaṃ viññāya katattā sabbaññubyākaraṇameva nāma hoti, ko pana vādo sabbaññunā eva kateti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1127_1: Ghānāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvenāti ettha yadi tadabhāvena gandhāyatanādīni āyatanādikiccaṃ
tika-abh02t:1127_2: na karonti, asaññasattesu cakkhāyatanassa abhāvena rūpāyatanaṃ āyatanādikiccaṃ na
tika-abh02t:1127_3: kareyya. Tato “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dvāyatanāni pātubhavantī”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1127_4: na vattabbaṃ siyā. Kāmāvacarādiokāsā tattha uppajjamānasattānaṃ, tattha pariyāpannadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1127_5: vā adhiṭṭhānabhāvena “dhātū”ti vuccanti, tathā yesu kāmāvacarādisattanikāyesu kāmāvacarādisattā
tika-abh02t:1127_6: uppajjanti, tesaṃ sattānaṃ uppatti etthāti sattuppattīti vuccamānā te sattanikāyā
tika-abh02t:1127_7: ca, na panettha apariyāpannokāso apariyāpannasattanikāyo ca atthi, yo “dhātū”ti vucceyyāti
tika-abh02t:1127_8: imamatthaṃ dassento “okāsavasena vā sattuppattivasena vā apariyāpannadhātu nāma natthī”ti
tika-abh02t:1127_9: āha. Sattuppattivasenāti iminā vā okāsasattalokadvayaṃ saha gahetvā tādisāya apariyāpannadhātuyā
tika-abh02t:1127_10: abhāvaṃ dasseti, sattabhāvena vā uppatti sattuppatti, sattāvāsavasena taṃtaṃbhavavasena
tika-abh02t:1129: 999. Bhavavasena okāsavasena ca paricchinnāti tattha aññattha ca uppajjamānā upādinnakakkhandhā taṃtaṃpariyāpannā sabbe daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t:1132_0: 1021. Khandhādīnaṃ dhātusambhavādivasena pabhedaṃ vatvā ye sattā dhātuppabhedavanto,
tika-abh02t:1132_1: yañca tesaṃ uppādakakammaṃ, yo ca tassa vipāko, tesaṃ vasena pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo
tika-abh02t:1132_2: devā”tiādiko chaṭṭhavāro āraddho. Khandhādayo eva hi dhātuttayabhūtadevavasena dānādikammavasena
tika-abh02t:1132_3: taṃtaṃāyuppamāṇaparicchinnaupādinnakakkhandhavasena ca bhinnāti. Catudoṇaṃ ambaṇaṃ, chadoṇanti eke.
tika-abh02t:1137_0: 1026. Kañcanapiṇḍo viya sassirikā kañcanapiṇḍasassirikā. Tattha pana sobhanapabhāya
tika-abh02t:1137_1: kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe ā-kārassa rassattaṃ antimaṇa-kārassa ha-kārañca katvā
tika-abh02t:1137_2: “subhakiṇhā”ti vuttā, atha pana subhena kiṇṇā subhakiṇṇā. Purimapadesupi parittaṃ
tika-abh02t:1137_3: subhaṃ etesanti parittasubhā, appamāṇaṃ subhaṃ etesanti appamāṇasubhāti subha-saddena
tika-abh02t:1138_0: 1027. Ārammaṇamanasikārā pubbabhāgena kathitāti jhānakkhaṇe tato pacchā vā parittādikasiṇārammaṇabhāvanāya
tika-abh02t:1138_1: āvajjanena ca jhānassa ārammaṇamanasikāranānattatā na hoti, pubbabhāgabhāvanāya pana
tika-abh02t:1138_2: pubbabhāgāvajjanena ca hotīti attho. Pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena hi jhānaṃ parittapathavīkasiṇādīsu
tika-abh02t:1138_3: taṃtadārammaṇaṃ hoti, pubbabhāgena taṃtaṃkasiṇāvajjanena taṃtaṃmanasikāranti. Chandādayo
tika-abh02t:1138_4: pana appanākkhaṇepi vijjanti. Tattha paṇidhīti na taṇhāpatthanā, atha kho chandapatthanāva
tika-abh02t:1138_5: daṭṭhabbā. Adhimokkho nicchayo. Abhinīhāro cittappavattiyeva. Yadi pana bhavachandabhavapatthanādayo
tika-abh02t:1138_6: taṃtaṃbhavavisesaniyāmakā adhippetā. “Appanāyapi vaṭṭantī”ti etassa appanāya pavattāya
tika-abh02t:1138_7: tato pacchāpi vaṭṭantīti attho daṭṭhabbo. Saññāvirāgādīhi pana visesiyamānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1138_8: tathā tathā tattha pavatto manasikāro ca bhavavisesaniyāmako pubbabhāgova vaṭṭatīti
tika-abh02t:1139: Vipulā phalāti vipulasantasukhāyuvaṇṇādiphalā. Suṭṭhu passanti paññācakkhunā maṃsadibbacakkhūhi ca.
tika-abh02t:1140: 1028. “Yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti vacanato “kammameva pamāṇa”nti āha, abbudādiāyuppamāṇaparicchedo pana kammavaseneva katoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1141: Nilīyanokāsassa abhāvāti samānajātikena accharāgaṇena sabbadā parivāriyamānassa kāmaguṇākiṇṇassa tabbirahitaṭṭhānassa abhāvāti attho.
tika-abh02t:1142_0: Kiṃ niyametīti kiṃ jhānaṃ upapattiṃ niyametīti attho. Nava brahmaloketi brahmapārisajjādayo
tika-abh02t:1142_1: navapi sodhetvā. Matthaketi vehapphalesūti attho. Seṭṭhabhavā nāmāti tato paraṃ agamanato
tika-abh02t:1142_2: uttamabhavāti adhippāyo. Teneva bhavasīsānīti gahitā. Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti vehapphalādiṭṭhānāni
tika-abh02t:1142_3: eva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vehapphalato pana purimesu navasu nibbattaanāgāmī arūpadhātuṃ
tika-abh02t:1142_4: upapajjatīti katvā “rūpadhātuyā cutassa arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassa kassaci satta
tika-abh02t:1142_5: anusayā anusenti, kassaci pañca, kassaci tayo anusentī”ti idaṃ vuttaṃ, na vehapphalādīsu
tika-abh02t:1142_6: upapannaṃ sandhāyāti ayamettha adhippāyo siyā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “navasu brahmalokesu
tika-abh02t:1142_7: nibbattaariyasāvakānaṃ tatrūpapattiyeva hoti, na heṭṭhūpapattī”ti, etena heṭṭhūpapatti
tika-abh02t:1142_8: eva nivāritā, na tesveva uparūpari vehapphale ca upapatti arūpadhātūpapatti ca. “Paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1142_9: nibbatto anāgāmī nava brahmaloke sodhetvā matthake ṭhito parinibbātī”ti idampi anupubbena
tika-abh02t:1142_10: ārohantaṃ sandhāya vuttanti na tena tassa matthakaṃ appattassa arūpadhātuṃ upapatti
tika-abh02t:1143_0: Yo vā aññattha tattha vā maggaṃ bhāvetvā cavitvā tattha upapanno avikkhambhitarūparāgo
tika-abh02t:1143_1: ariyasāvako, taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ aṭṭhakathā vuttā. Teneva “navasu brahmalokesu nibbattaariyasāvakāna”nti,
tika-abh02t:1143_3: ca sabbattha nibbattaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Tassa pana yena tattha upapanno, tasmiṃ rūparāge
tika-abh02t:1143_4: vikkhambhite puna bhavābhilāso na bhavissatīti arūparāgupacchedo ca bhavissatiyeva.
tika-abh02t:1143_5: Yo pana puthujjano tattha nibbatto ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetvā arūpehi vikkhambhitarūparāgo
tika-abh02t:1143_6: uppanne magge nibbattabhavādīnavadassanavasena anivattitabhavābhilāso, tassa vasena
tika-abh02t:1143_7: yamakapāḷi pavattāti vā ayamattho adhippeto siyā.
tika-abh02t:1146_1: salakkhaṇapariggāhikā diṭṭhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyo ñātapariññā, tato paraṃ yāva
tika-abh02t:1146_2: anulomā tīraṇapariññā, udayabbayānupassanato paṭṭhāya yāva maggā pahānapariññā.
tika-abh02t:1147_0: Tattha tatthāti khandhādīnaṃ tāva khandhavibhaṅgādīsu pañhapucchakavāre vattabbaṃ
tika-abh02t:1147_1: vuttaṃ, hetuādīnañca khandhādīsu antogadhattā tattha tattha pañhapucchakavāre vattabbaṃ
tika-abh02t:1157_1: saccāni gahitānīti nippadesato eva tadatthaṃ vibhāvento “cattāri saccānī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t:1157_2: Tattha samāhaṭānīti samānītāni, cittena ekato gahitānīti adhippāyo. “Samāhaṭānī”ti
tika-abh02t:1157_3: ca etena samāhāre ayaṃ samāsoti dasseti. Tenevassa katekattassa catusaccanti napuṃsakaniddeso
tika-abh02t:1157_4: “tivaṭṭa”ntiādīsu viya. Pattādipakkhepena hissa na itthiliṅgatā yathā pañcapattaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1157_5: catuyugaṃ, tibhuvananti, taṃ catusaccaṃ passi adakkhi, pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena
tika-abh02t:1157_6: paṭivijjhīti attho. Kasmā panettha anantāparimāṇesu anaññasādhāraṇesu mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādīsu
tika-abh02t:1157_7: buddhaguṇesu saṃvijjamānesu sāvakehi, paccekabuddhehi ca sādhāraṇena catusaccadassanena
tika-abh02t:1157_8: bhagavantaṃ thometīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “satipi sāvakāna”ntiādi. Tattha “anaññapubbakattā”ti
tika-abh02t:1157_9: iminā sāvakehi, “tattha cā”tiādinā paccekabuddhehi ca bhagavato catusaccadassanassa
tika-abh02t:1157_10: asādhāraṇataṃ, niratisayatañca dasseti. Parasantānesu pasāritabhāvena supākaṭattāti
tika-abh02t:1157_11: desanānubhāvena veneyyasantānesu catusaccadassanassa vitthāritabhāvena yāva devamanussesu
tika-abh02t:1157_12: suppakāsitattā. Nāthasaddaṃ loke yācanupatāpissariyāsīsāsu paṭhantīti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh02t:1157_13: “nāthatīti nātho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmā bhagavā catusaccadassanabhāveneva attano
tika-abh02t:1157_14: hitasukhāsīsāya kilesabyasanupatāpanassa, hitapaṭipattiyācanassa ca matthakaṃ patto,
tika-abh02t:1157_15: tasmā taṃ teneva pakāsitanti atthuddhāraṃ anāmasitvā paduddhāravasena nāthasaddassa
tika-abh02t:1157_16: atthaṃ dassento “veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsatī”tiādimāha. “Catusaccadaso”ti vā iminā
tika-abh02t:1157_17: anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato ñāṇānubhāvo pakāsitoti “nātho”ti iminā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1157_18: karuṇānubhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “veneyyāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Paramena cittissariyena samannāgato
tika-abh02t:1157_19: bhagavā nāthoti vuccatīti yojanā. Tathā paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte
tika-abh02t:1157_20: guṇehi īsatīti yojetabbaṃ. Cittissariyenāti ariyiddhiādinā citte vasībhāvena. Guṇehi
tika-abh02t:1157_21: īsatīti paramukkaṃsagatehi attano sīlādiguṇehi dhammena issariyaṃ vattetīti attho.
tika-abh02t:1157_22: Evaṃbhūto yasmā sabbābhibhū nāma hoti, tena vuttaṃ “abhibhavatī”ti. Tathā cāha “sadevake,
tika-abh02t:1157_23: bhikkhave, loke…pe… abhibhū anabhibhūto, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Duvidhenāpi
tika-abh02t:1158_0: Aṭṭhārasappabhedāya desanāya thomanamevāti yojanā. Samānagaṇanaguṇehīti samānagaṇanehi
tika-abh02t:1158_1: guṇehi karaṇabhūtehi. Yathāvuttena niratisayena catusaccadassanenāti sabbaññutaññāṇassa,
tika-abh02t:1158_2: dasabalesu vasībhāvassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtena. Saccābhisambodhena hi abhinīhārānurūpaṃ
tika-abh02t:1158_4: mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhātena buddhāveṇikena sammasanena sambhūtena bhagavā sammāsambodhiyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1158_5: patiṭṭhitova kusalādibhedena, phassādibhedena ca dhamme vibhajanto cittuppādakaṇḍādivasena
tika-abh02t:1158_6: dhammasaṅgahaṃ catudhā desetuṃ samattho ahosi. Tathā atītaṃse appaṭihatañāṇatādibuddhadhammasamannāgato
tika-abh02t:1158_7: bhagavā atītādibhedato khandhādike vibhajitvā desetuṃ samattho ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-abh02t:1158_9: asakkuṇeyyataṃ dassento”ti etena dhammasaṅgaṇīvibhaṅgānaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca
tika-abh02t:1158_11: sammāsambuddhatā, dhammasaṅgharatanānaṃ svākkhātatā, suppaṭipannatāti evamādiguṇe pakāseti.
tika-abh02t:1159_0: Nanu ca “catusaccadaso”tiādinā bhagavatova guṇā vibhāvitāti? Saccaṃ, teneva dhammasaṅghānampi
tika-abh02t:1159_1: guṇā vibhāvitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvato, tadapadesena vā dhammo, tadādhāro
tika-abh02t:1159_2: ca saṅgho vuttova hotīti vuttaṃ “buddhādīnaṃ…pe… vibhāvetī”ti.
tika-abh02t:1160_0: Atītaṃseti atītakoṭṭhāse, pubbanteti attho. Appaṭihatanti nappaṭihataṃ, ñāṇassa paṭighāto
tika-abh02t:1160_1: nāma aññāṇaṃ, sabbampi vā kilesajātaṃ. Taṃ yasmā bhagavato saha vāsanāya pahīnaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1160_2: tasmāssa atītaṃse sabbatthakameva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānena ñāṇaṃ appaṭihatanti vuccati.
tika-abh02t:1160_3: Esa nayo sesesupi. Kiṃ panetāni pāṭiyekkaṃ visuṃ ñāṇāni, udāhu atītādīsu pavattanakañāṇāni
tika-abh02t:1160_4: eva? Tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ bhagavato tīṇi ñāṇānevāti vadanti.
tika-abh02t:1160_5: Ekaṃyeva hutvā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ nāma sabbaññutaññāṇameva. Sabbaṃ kāyakammanti
tika-abh02t:1160_6: yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā kattabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Ñāṇapubbaṅgamanti ñāṇapurecārikaṃ. Ñāṇānuparivattanti
tika-abh02t:1160_7: ñāṇassa anuparivattanakaṃ, sabbaṃ kāyapayogaṃ pavattento bhagavā ñāṇena paricchinditvā
tika-abh02t:1160_8: ñāṇasahitameva pavattetīti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Chandassāti kattukamyatāya,
tika-abh02t:1160_9: mahākaruṇāsamāyogato sattānaṃ ekantahitesitāya hitakiriyāchandassāti attho. Dhammadesanāyāti
tika-abh02t:1160_10: dhammakathāya. Aparikkhayāparimeyyapaṭibhānatāya hi bhagavato karaṇasampattiyā ca
tika-abh02t:1160_11: dhammadesanā nirantaraṃ pavattiyamānāpi na kadācipi parikkhayaṃ gacchati, aññadatthu
tika-abh02t:1160_12: uparūpari vaḍḍhateva. Vīriyassāti parahitapaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhassa. Vimuttiyāti phalavimuttiyā.
tika-abh02t:1160_13: Ettha ca samādhiādīnaṃ ahāni taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhassa savāsanapahīnattā anaññasādhāraṇatāya
tika-abh02t:1160_14: veditabbā. Chandādīnaṃ pana mahākaruṇāsamāyogatopi. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-abh02t:1161_0: 1. Te eva dhammeti te eva kusalādike tikadukehi saṅgahite dhamme. Suttante khandhādivasena
tika-abh02t:1161_1: vutte khandhādivasena vibhajitunti yojanā. Nanu suttante paṭisambhidāvasena te na
tika-abh02t:1161_2: vuttāti? Yadipi sarūpato na vuttā, “jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ, jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā
tika-abh02t:1161_3: pana hetuhetuphalādīsu ñāṇavibhāgassa vuttattā atthato vuttā eva honti, paṭisambhidāmagge
tika-abh02t:1161_4: vā paṭisambhidānaṃ āgatattā suttante paṭisambhidāvasenapi te dhammā vuttā eva. Tatthāti
tika-abh02t:1161_5: tasmiṃ suttante. Saṅkhepenāti samāsena. Uddesaniddesamatteneva hi suttante khandhādayo
tika-abh02t:1161_6: desitā, na paṭiniddesādināti saṅkhepena te tattha vuttāti vuttā. Tatthāti vā dhammasaṅgahe.
tika-abh02t:1161_7: Tatthāpi hi “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontī”tiādinā khandhādayo saṅkhepena
tika-abh02t:1161_8: vuttāti. Vibhajīyanti ettha, etena vā khandhādayoti vibhaṅgo, te eva pakirīyanti
tika-abh02t:1161_9: paṭṭhapīyanti ettha, etena vāti pakaraṇaṃ, vibhaṅgo ca so pakaraṇañcāti vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1161_10: Ādisaddatthajotakenāti “iti vā, iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu
tika-abh02t:1161_11: viya ādisaddassa atthadīpakena. Pakāratthajotakenāti “iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo
tika-abh02t:1161_12: bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito”tiādīsu viya pakāratthavibhāvakena. “Ekadesena samudāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1161_13: nidassetī”ti etena “rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti ettha itisaddassa nidassanatthataṃ
tika-abh02t:1161_14: dasseti. Nidassanatthopi hi iti-saddo diṭṭho yathā “atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko
tika-abh02t:1161_15: anto”tiādīsu. Parisamāpanattho vā “tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha,
tika-abh02t:1161_16: no āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh02t:1161_17: no āmisadāyādā’ti” evamādīsu viya. Parisamāpanañhetaṃ suttantabhājanīyassa ekadesadassanena
tika-abh02t:1161_18: yadidaṃ “pañcakkhandhā rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti tāva tadatthassa saṅgahitattā.
tika-abh02t:1161_19: Tatthāti vibhaṅgappakaraṇe. “Nibbānavajjāna”nti ettha yadi nibbānavajjānaṃ…pe… appakatarapadattā
tika-abh02t:1161_20: khandhānaṃ khandhavibhaṅgo ādimhi vutto, nanu saha nibbānena sabbadhammasaṅgāhakattā,
tika-abh02t:1161_21: sabbadhammasaṅgāhakehi ca āyatanādīhi khandhehi ca appakatarapadattā saccavibhaṅgo
tika-abh02t:1161_22: ādimhi vattabboti? Na, tatthāpi dukkhasaccavibhaṅge ekadesena khandhānaṃ eva vibhajitabbato.
tika-abh02t:1161_23: Yathāha “tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ? Jātipi dukkhā…pe… saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā
tika-abh02t:1161_24: dukkhā”ti. Idha pana anavasesatova khandhā vibhajīyantīti nibbānavajjānaṃ…pe… appakatarapadattā
tika-abh02t:1162_0: Apica rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti tividhā bodhaneyyapuggalā, tathā
tika-abh02t:1162_2: majjhimindriyāti ca. Tesu arūpasammūḷhānaṃ upakārāya khandhadesanā, rūpasammūḷhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1162_3: āyatanadesanā, ubhayasammūḷhānaṃ dhātudesanā. Tathā saṃkhittarucīnaṃ khandhadesanā,
tika-abh02t:1162_5: khandhadesanā, majjhimindriyānaṃ āyatanadesanā, mudindriyānaṃ dhātudesanāti iminā
tika-abh02t:1162_6: payojanena anukkamena ca khandhāyatanadhātuvibhaṅgānaṃ desanākkamova veditabbo. Taṃ
tika-abh02t:1162_8: hoti, nāññathāti dassanatthaṃ saccavibhaṅgadesanā pavattā. So ca yathābhūtāvabodho
tika-abh02t:1162_9: visesato indriyasannissayenāti indriyavibhaṅgadesanā. Indriyānañca indaṭṭho taṃtaṃpaccayadhammabhūtānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1162_13: Svāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīsu sammāmanasikāro imāya paṭipattiyā hotīti jhānaappamaññāvibhaṅgadesanā,
tika-abh02t:1162_14: sā sammāpaṭipatti ettake sīle patiṭṭhitassa sambhavatīti sikkhāpadavibhaṅgadesanā,
tika-abh02t:1162_15: yathāvuttāya ca sammāpaṭipattiyā ime ānisaṃsāti paṭisambhidāñāṇavibhaṅgadesanā, te
tika-abh02t:1162_16: cime ñāṇavisesā imesu kilesesu pahīyantesu ca sambhavanti, nāññathāti kilesavibhaṅgadesanā,
tika-abh02t:1162_17: evaṃ vitthārato desite khandhādike saṅkhepatopi jānantassa atthasiddhi hoti evāti
tika-abh02t:1162_18: dassanatthaṃ pariyosāne dhammahadayavibhaṅgadesanā pavattāti evametesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ
tika-abh02t:1163_2: vedanādi vā ruppanādisabhāvaṃ. Yato rūpādīnaṃ vedanāsamavarodhanena “cattāro khandhā”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1163_3: saṅkhipitvā khandhā 06 desetabbā siyuṃ. Ruppanādito aññassābhāvāti ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvato
tika-abh02t:1163_4: aññassa atītādike gahetvā rāsivasena vattabbassa saṃkhittassa sabhāvassa abhāvā.
tika-abh02t:1163_5: Na hi cetasikādibhāvo vedanādīnaṃ sabhāvo. Heṭṭhā gaṇanesūti pañcato heṭṭhā gaṇanesu.
tika-abh02t:1163_6: Aniṭṭhānanti apariyosānaṃ. Rūpādīsu hi katipaye, ekampi vā aggahetvā vuccamānā khandhavasena
tika-abh02t:1163_7: desanā anavasesasaṅkhatadhammasaṅgāhinī na sambhavati. Khandhassāti rāsaṭṭhassa khandhassa.
tika-abh02t:1164_0: “Saddatthasahitaṃ khandhasaddassa visayaṃ dassetī”ti etena rāsisaddassa viya rāsaṭṭhe
tika-abh02t:1164_1: khandhasaddassa vācakabhāvena pavattiṃ dasseti pariyāyantarabhāvato. Guṇādīsu pana
tika-abh02t:1164_2: kevalaṃ tabbisayapayogabhāveneva pavatti, na vācakabhāvenāti āha “guṇe…pe… na saddattha”nti.
tika-abh02t:1164_4: rāsaṭṭhaṃ dīpetī”ti. Kecīti dhammasirittheraṃ sandhāya vadati. Etthāti “sīlakkhandho
tika-abh02t:1164_5: samādhikkhandho”ti ettha. Na kevalañca so eva, aṭṭhakathācariyehipi ettha guṇatthatā
tika-abh02t:1164_6: icchitā eva. Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandhotiādīsu guṇaṭṭhenā”ti
tika-abh02t:1164_7: vuttaṃ. Nanu ca kevalopi khandhasaddo “tiṇṇaṃ kho, māṇava, khandhānaṃ vaṇṇavādī,
tika-abh02t:1164_8: na kho, āvuso visākha, tīhi khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito”ti ca ādīsu
tika-abh02t:1164_9: sīlādivācako diṭṭhoti? Na, tatthāpi adhikārādivacchedakavasenevassa sīlādīsu pavattidassanato.
tika-abh02t:1164_10: Na khandhasaddo paññattisaddassa atthe vattatīti niruttivohārādisaddā viya paññattipariyāyo
tika-abh02t:1164_11: na hotīti attho. Dārukkhandhoti paññatti hotīti tassa khandhasaddassa paññattivisesappavattitaṃ
tika-abh02t:1164_12: dasseti. Viññāṇakkhandhoti khandhasaddoti “viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho”ti ettha vutto
tika-abh02t:1164_13: khandhasaddo. Samudāye niruḷhoti atītādibhedabhinnassa paññāya abhisaṃyūhanena rāsikate
tika-abh02t:1164_14: viññāṇasamūhe niruḷho. Tāya eva ruḷhiyā pavattatīti tāya samudāye niruḷhatāya tadavayave
tika-abh02t:1164_15: ekasmimpi viññāṇe pavattatīti. Ettha ca ñāṇasampayutte niruḷho kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena
tika-abh02t:1164_16: kusalabhāvo viya ñāṇavippayutte viññāṇasamudāye niruḷho tadekadesepi ruḷhiyā pavattatīti
tika-abh02t:1164_17: veditabbaṃ. Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ tannimittayutte kismiñcideva
tika-abh02t:1164_18: visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāvasena nimittavirahepi pavatti ruḷhi nāma, yathā mahiyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1164_19: setīti mahiṃso, gacchantīti gāvoti, evaṃ khandhasaddassāpi ruḷhibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t:1165_0: Rāsito guṇatoti sabbattha bhummatthe vā nissakkavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Niyametvāti vavatthapetvā.
tika-abh02t:1165_1: Piṇḍaṭṭhoti saṅghātattho. Tasmāti yasmā pañceva khandhā vuttā, koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe ca khandhaṭṭhe
tika-abh02t:1165_2: nibbānassa vasena chaṭṭhenāpi khandhena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā khandhaṭṭho nāma rāsaṭṭhoti
tika-abh02t:1165_3: yuttaṃ. “Yesaṃ vā atītādivasena bhedo atthī”tiādinā atītādivibhāgabhinnesu ruppanādisabhāvadhammesu
tika-abh02t:1165_4: visuṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsabhāvena gayhamānesu tabbibhāgarahitassa ekassa nibbānassa rāsaṭṭhatā
tika-abh02t:1165_5: viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhatāpi na sambhavatīti dasseti. Etena paññattiyāpi khandhesu aggahaṇe
tika-abh02t:1166_0: Kasmā panettha phassādike viya saṅkhārakkhandhe anavarodhetvā vedanāsaññā visuṃ khandhabhāvena
tika-abh02t:1166_2: Vuttañcetaṃ “puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva
tika-abh02t:1166_3: hetu mātāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi mātarā vivadatī”tiādi. Pabbajitānaṃ diṭṭhābhiniveso.
tika-abh02t:1166_4: Vuttampi cetaṃ “ye diṭṭhimuggayha vivādayanti, ‘idameva sacca’nti ca vādayantī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t:1166_5: Tesu kāmajjhosānaṃ vedanassādena hoti, diṭṭhābhiniveso saññāvipallāsena. Saññāvipallāsena
tika-abh02t:1166_6: hi cittavipallāso, cittavipallāsena diṭṭhimānataṇhāpapañcānaṃ vipallāsoti. Tathā
tika-abh02t:1166_7: vedanānugiddho vipallatthasañño ca saṃsarati. Vedanānugiddhassa hi vedanāpaccayā
tika-abh02t:1166_8: taṇhā siddhā hoti, tato ca taṇhāpaccayā upādānanti āvaṭṭati bhavacakkaṃ. Vipallatthasaññissa
tika-abh02t:1166_9: ca “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti vacanato diṭṭhimānataṇhāpapañcānaṃ anupacchedato
tika-abh02t:1166_10: saṃsārassa anupacchedova. Iti vivādakāraṇānaṃ kāmajjhosānadiṭṭhābhinivesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo
tika-abh02t:1166_11: saṃsārahetubhāvoti imassa vivādamūlatādivisesassa dassanatthaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe anavarodhetvā
tika-abh02t:1167_0: Okāsesūti vibhajanakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato atītādayo okāsāti vuttā. Itisaddenāti
tika-abh02t:1167_2: Sabboti sakalo ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto vibhajananayo. Idañca vibhajananti “cattāro
tika-abh02t:1167_3: ca mahābhūtā…pe… upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ vibhattaṃ idañca vibhajanaṃ. Oḷārikādīsūti
tika-abh02t:1167_5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ itthindriyaṃ…pe… kabaḷīkāro āhāro rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbāti
tika-abh02t:1167_6: evaṃ pavattaṃ vibhajanañca. Yathāsambhavanti yathārahaṃ. Ekādasasu okāsesu yaṃ yattha
tika-abh02t:1167_7: vibhajanaṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ tattha yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīsupīti yathā rūpakkhandhe
tika-abh02t:1167_8: yathāsambhavaṃ ekādasasu okāsesu vibhajanaṃ yojetabbanti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīsupi
tika-abh02t:1167_9: yathāsambhavaṃ ekādasasu okāsesu vibhajanaṃ yojetabbanti attho.
tika-abh02t:1168_0: Tattha vedanākkhandho tāva purime okāsapañcake sukhādivedanāttikavasena vibhatto,
tika-abh02t:1168_2: purime okāsapañcake chaphassadvāravasena, itarasmiṃ oḷārikaduke paṭighasamphassadukavasena
tika-abh02t:1168_3: ceva yathāvuttakusalattikādivasena ca vibhatto. Sesesu kusalattikādivaseneva. Tathā
tika-abh02t:1168_4: saṅkhārakkhandho. Paṭighasamphassaduko panettha nattheva. Cetanāya eva cettha niddeso
tika-abh02t:1168_6: vuttā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ viññāṇakkhandhassa vibhajane paṭiniddese. Taṃ pana dvayanti
tika-abh02t:1169: Pāḷinayenāti khandhavibhaṅgapāḷinayena. Aññena pakārenāti dhammasaṅgahe, tadaṭṭhakathāyañca āgatena pakārantarena.
tika-abh02t:1171_1: āmasitvā aniyamanidassana”nti. Ubhayenāti pakārabhedaṃ anāmasitvā āmasitvā ca aniyamadassanavasena
tika-abh02t:1171_2: pavattena “yaṃ kiñcī”ti padadvayena. Adhippetatthanti rūpaṃ. Aticcāti atikkamitvā.
tika-abh02t:1172_0: “Kiñcā”ti ettha kiṃ-saddo pucchāyaṃ hetuatthadīpako, karaṇe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1172_1: ca-saddo vacanālaṅkāroti āha “kena kāraṇena vadethā”ti. Dutiyavikappe pana vuttanayeneva
tika-abh02t:1173_0: Purimasantānassa bhedanti purimasantānassa vināsaṃ, vināsāpadesena cettha santāne
tika-abh02t:1173_1: visadisuppādameva dasseti. Tenevāha “visadisasantānuppattidassanato”ti. Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi
tika-abh02t:1173_2: virodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppatti atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi, sā pana na pākaṭatarā,
tika-abh02t:1173_3: pākaṭatarā ca idhādhippetā. Tenevāha “sītādisannipāte”ti. Tathā cāha bhagavā “sītenapi
tika-abh02t:1173_4: ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatī”tiādi. Idāni bheda-saddo ujukameva vikārāpattiṃ vadatīti
tika-abh02t:1173_5: dassento “bhedo cā”tiādimāha. Visadisarūpuppattiyeva, na uppannassa aññathābhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1173_6: adhippāyo. Tena kāpiliyaṃ pariṇāmavādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Yadi purimasantānato bhedo
tika-abh02t:1173_7: visadisuppatti ruppanaṃ, evaṃ sante lakkhaṇassa atippasaṅgo siyāti codanaṃ manasi
tika-abh02t:1173_8: katvā āha “arūpakkhandhāna”ntiādi. Ettha sītādīhīti ādi-saddena yathā uṇhajighacchādayo
tika-abh02t:1173_9: saṅgayhanti, evaṃ āhārādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Yenāti yena sītādīhi samāgamena.
tika-abh02t:1173_10: Tatthāti tesu rūpadhammesu. Āhārādikassa vā ṭhitippattassāti sambandho. Yathā rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1173_11: ṭhitikkhaṇe sītādīhi samāgamo hoti, evaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ aññehi samāgamo natthi
tika-abh02t:1173_12: atilahuparivattito, tasmā arūpadhammā rūpadhammānaṃ viya pākaṭassa vikārassa abhāvato
tika-abh02t:1173_14: kattukammasādhanānaṃ vasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyati
tika-abh02t:1173_15: bhijjatī”ti vuttanti tadatthaṃ vivaranto “kuppatīti etenā”tiādimāha. Kopādikiriyāti
tika-abh02t:1173_16: kopasaṅghaṭṭanapīḷanakiriyā. Kopa-saddo cettha khobhapariyāyo veditabbo. Kattubhūto
tika-abh02t:1173_17: kammabhūto ca atthoti kattukammasādhanānaṃ vasena vuccamāno bhūtupādāyarūpasaṅkhāto
tika-abh02t:1173_18: attho. Kammakattutthena bhijjati-saddenāti yadā kammakattuttho ruppati-saddo, tadā
tika-abh02t:1173_19: bhijjati-saddopi tadattho eva veditabboti attho. Tattha yadā kammatthe “ruppatī”ti
tika-abh02t:1173_20: padaṃ, tadā “sītenā”tiādīsu kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṃ
tika-abh02t:1173_21: kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā, tadā hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Yaṃ pana ruppatī”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1173_22: “kuppatī”tiādīnaṃ kattukammatthānampi atthavacanānaṃ vacane kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Yadipi
tika-abh02t:1173_25: attho. Tenevāha “na kevalaṃ saddatthoyeva ruppana”nti. Tassa atthassāti tassa bhūtupādāyappabhedassa
tika-abh02t:1173_26: sabhāvadhammassa. Ruppanalakkhaṇañca nāmetaṃ aniccatādi viya kakkhaḷattādito aññanti
tika-abh02t:1173_27: na gahetabbaṃ. Paññattiviseso hi tanti, kakkhaḷattādīnaṃyeva pana arūpadhammavidhuro
tika-abh02t:1174_0: Mucchāpattiyāti mucchāya mohassa āpajjanena. Kappasaṇṭhānaṃ udakanti kappasaṇṭhāpakamahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh02t:1174_1: udakaṃ. Tathāti tappakāratāya khārabhāve sati udakena kappavuṭṭhānakāle viya pathavī
tika-abh02t:1174_2: vilīyeyya. Lokantariyasattānaṃ pana pāpakammabalena akhārepi khāre viya sarīrassa
tika-abh02t:1174_3: vilīyanā veditabbā. Tenevāti saussadanissayanirayassa vuttattā eva. Na hi avīcimhi
tika-abh02t:1175_0: 3. Pakaraṇappattaṃ rūpaṃ pakkhipitvā mātikā ṭhapitāti ānetvā sambandho. Mahābhūtu…pe…
tika-abh02t:1175_1: āpajjati tappakārabhāvena atītaṃse gaṇanaṃ gatanti vuttattāti adhippāyo. “Na hī”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1175_4: “Na cā”tiādinā bhūtupādāyasabhāvo atītaṃsagaṇitatāya taṃsabhāvassapi aññathā gaṇitattā,
tika-abh02t:1175_5: ataṃsabhāvassa ca tathā gaṇitattā akāraṇanti dasseti. “Ajjhatta…pe… labbhatī”ti etena
tika-abh02t:1175_6: dutiyanaye na kevalaṃ yathāvuttova doso, atha kho abyāpitopi dosoti dasseti. Tadetaṃ
tika-abh02t:1175_7: pana akāraṇaṃ kāraṇabhāvasseva anadhippetattā. Na hettha bhūtupādāyarūpabhāvo atītaṃse
tika-abh02t:1175_8: gaṇanassa kāraṇanti adhippetaṃ, yato yathāvuttadosāpatti siyā.
tika-abh02t:1176_0: “Kintī”ti ettha “ki”nti pubbe yaṃ “rūpa”nti sāmaññato gahitaṃ, tassa sarūpapucchā.
tika-abh02t:1176_1: Iti-saddo nidassanattho, na kāraṇattho. Tenassa yaṃ rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ…pe… atītaṃsena
tika-abh02t:1176_2: saṅgahitaṃ atītakoṭṭhāse gaṇanaṃ gataṃ, taṃ kinti ce? “Cattāro ca…pe… rūpa”nti bhūtupādāyavibhāgadassanamukhena
tika-abh02t:1176_3: visesaṃ nidasseti. Yattakā hi idha visesā niddiṭṭhā cakkhāyatanādayo, tesamidaṃ nidassananti.
tika-abh02t:1176_4: Na cettha purimanayato aviseso. Tattha hi rūpassa bhūtupādāyatāmattasabhāvadassanatā
tika-abh02t:1176_5: vuttā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “atītarūpampi bhūtāni cevā”tiādi. Idha pana bhūtupādāyena
tika-abh02t:1176_6: nidassanabhūtena rūpassa sabbavisesavibhāvanatā dassitā. Evañca katvā abyāpitadosopi
tika-abh02t:1176_7: cettha anokāsova, yaṃ rūpaṃ ajjhattaṃ…pe… upādinnaṃ, kinti? Cattāro ca…pe… rūpanti
tika-abh02t:1176_8: tadaññavisesanidassanassa adhippetattā. Tathā cāha “evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo”ti.
tika-abh02t:1177_0: Pariyāyadesanattāti sabhāvato pariyāyanaṃ parivattanaṃ pariyāyo, ujukaṃ appavattīti
tika-abh02t:1177_1: attho. Pariyāyena, pariyāyabhūtā vā desanā etthāti pariyāyadesanaṃ, suttantaṃ. Suttantañhi
tika-abh02t:1177_2: veneyyajjhāsayavasena desetabbadhamme lesato labbhamānabhāvakathanaṃ, na ujunippadesabhāvakathananti
tika-abh02t:1177_3: pariyāyadesanaṃ nāma. Teneva taṃ “yathānulomasāsana”nti vuccati. Abhidhammo pana
tika-abh02t:1177_5: vuccati. Nicchayena desoti vavatthānato kathanaṃ. Tathā bhaddekarattasuttādīsu viya
tika-abh02t:1177_6: atītādibhāvo atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo addhāvasena idhāpi khandhavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyattā
tika-abh02t:1178_0: Sannipatitanti samāgataṃ. Santānavasenāti pubbāparavasena. Pubbenāparassa samappamāṇatāya
tika-abh02t:1178_1: anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ, tato eva ekākāraṃ. Pavattikālavasena vā anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ, samānasabhāvatāya
tika-abh02t:1178_2: ekākāraṃ. Tena visabhāgautunā anantaritataṃ dasseti. Evaṃ āhārepīti ettha visabhāgāhārena
tika-abh02t:1178_3: anantarito anekavāraṃ anekadivasampi bhutto sabhāgekāhāraṃ nāma. “Tato pubbe visabhāgautuāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1178_4: atītaṃ, pacchā anāgata”nti hi vuttanti. “Ekāhārasamuṭṭhāna”nti pana vuttattā ekasseva
tika-abh02t:1178_5: āhārassa yojanā yuttarūpāti apare. Pañcadvāravasenāti ettha pañcadvārāvajjanato paṭṭhāya
tika-abh02t:1178_6: yāva tadārammaṇaṃ, yāva javanaṃ, yāva vā voṭṭhabbanaṃ, tāva pavattā cittasantati
tika-abh02t:1178_7: ekavīthi. Ekajavanasamuṭṭhānanti ekajavanavārasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Ettha ca samayaṃ anāmasitvāva
tika-abh02t:1178_8: santativasena, santatiñca anāmasitvāva samayavasena atītādivibhāgo gahetabbo.
tika-abh02t:1179_0: Tesanti hetupaccayānaṃ. Kalāpassāti rūpakalāpassa. Kammānantarādīti kammādi, anantarādīti
tika-abh02t:1179_1: paccekaṃ ādi-saddo yojetabbo. Tattha paṭhamena ādisaddena upanissayapaccayassa āhārādino
tika-abh02t:1179_2: ca dutiyena samanantarānantarūpanissayādino saṅgaho veditabbo. Cittuppādassa cettha
tika-abh02t:1179_3: kammānantarādipaccayavasena, itarassa kammādivaseneva janakabhāve yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t:1179_4: Tathā cittuppādassa purejātavasena, itarassa pacchājātavasena, ubhayesampi sahajātavasena
tika-abh02t:1179_6: hetukiccakkhaṇe. Hetukiccaṃ nāma tassa tassa uppādetabbassa uppattikaraṇaṃ, tañca
tika-abh02t:1179_7: tasmiṃ khaṇe uppannaphalattā tato paraṃ kattabbābhāvato niṭṭhitañcāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1179_8: Itaraṃ pana tīsupi khaṇesu paccayakiccaṃ daṭṭhabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t:1180: 6. Aniṭṭhanāmanivattanassāti aniṭṭhanāmanivattiyā akāraṇabhāvadassanena iṭṭhanāmalābhāpanassa akāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1181_1: abhivuddhasobhanatā. Tato evāti sampattivirahato eva, asampannattā evāti attho. Tesaṃyeva
tika-abh02t:1181_2: hatthiādīnaṃ sukhassa hetubhāvaṃ na gacchanti sāraṇādivasena dukkhapaccayattā. Tesanti
tika-abh02t:1181_3: hatthirūpādīnaṃ. “Tassa tassevā”tiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ vivarati. Akusalena attanā
tika-abh02t:1181_4: katena nibbattaṃ dukkhassa paccayo hotīti yojanā. Tasmāti yasmā kammaṃ yasmiṃ santāne
tika-abh02t:1181_5: nibbattaṃ, tattheva sukhadukkhānaṃ paccayo hoti, na aññattha, tasmā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1181_6: panāti ekaccamatadassanaṃ. Tattha “aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti yasmā paṭisedhadvayena
tika-abh02t:1181_7: kusalakammajassa iṭṭhabhāvo niyato, tasmā “kusalakammajameva iṭṭha”nti evaṃ aniyametvā
tika-abh02t:1181_9: Kinti akusalakammajaṃ sobhanaṃ, yaṃ paresaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma siyā? Yadi duggatiyaṃ kesañci
tika-abh02t:1181_10: tiracchānānaṃ saṇṭhānādisampatti sugatiyaṃ sattānaṃ akusalanissandena virūparūpatā
tika-abh02t:1181_11: viya kusalanissandena, kathaṃ tassā akusalakammajatā. Atha pana yaṃ kesañci amanāpampi
tika-abh02t:1181_12: samānaṃ rūpaṃ manāpaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, evampi yathā kesañci
tika-abh02t:1181_13: tiracchānādīnaṃ kusalakammajaṃ manussādirūpaṃ amanāpato upaṭṭhahantampi kusalavipākasseva
tika-abh02t:1181_14: ārammaṇabhāvato atthato iṭṭhameva nāma hoti, evaṃ akusalakammajaṃ kesañci manāpaṃ
tika-abh02t:1181_15: hutvā upaṭṭhahantampi akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇabhāvato atthato aniṭṭhameva nāma
tika-abh02t:1181_16: hoti, evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Aññathā “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa
tika-abh02t:1181_17: iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko uppajjeyyā”tiādiaṭṭhānapāḷiyā virodho siyā. Tenevāha “kusalakammajassa
tika-abh02t:1181_18: panā”tiādi. Sabbesanti attano, paresañca. Iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabboti yathā “kusalakammajaṃ
tika-abh02t:1181_19: aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ kiñcāpi “akusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti
tika-abh02t:1181_20: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na vuttaṃ, tena pana nayadassanena akusalakammajassa abhāvo vutto eva
tika-abh02t:1181_21: hotīti so saṃvaṇṇanāvasena niddhāretvā vattabboti adhippāyo. Etena kusalakammajameva
tika-abh02t:1182_0: Idāni “hatthiādīnampī”tiādinā tamevatthaṃ vivarati. Kusalavipākassāti etthāpi kusalavipākasseva
tika-abh02t:1182_1: ārammaṇanti attho. Manussānanti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itaresampi ca akusalakammajaṃ
tika-abh02t:1182_2: akusalavipākasseva, kusalakammajañca kusalavipākasseva ārammaṇanti dassitovāyaṃ nayoti.
tika-abh02t:1182_3: Kasmā pana iṭṭhāniṭṭhamissite vatthumhi manāpatāva saṇṭhātīti āha “iṭṭhārammaṇena…pe…
tika-abh02t:1182_4: sakkā vattu”nti. Suṭṭhu vuttanti “iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ ekantato vipākeneva paricchijjatī”ti
tika-abh02t:1182_5: vadantehi iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ sammadeva vuttaṃ. Taṃ anugantvāti vipākavasena
tika-abh02t:1182_6: iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ anugantvā. Sabbatthāti sugatiduggatīsu, sabbesu vā ārammaṇesu.
tika-abh02t:1183_0: “Aniṭṭhā”ti vacaneneva tesaṃ iṭṭhatā nivattitāti āha “sadisatā ca rūpādibhāvoyevā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1183_1: Iṭṭhāneva rūpādīni kāmaguṇāti sutte vuttānīti mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya iṭṭhapaṭipakkhā
tika-abh02t:1183_2: aniṭṭhāti adhippetāti vuttaṃ “aniṭṭhāti…pe… vohāro viyā”ti. Sabbāni vāti ettha “piyarūpaṃ
tika-abh02t:1183_3: sātarūpa”nti vacanato kathaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ kāmaguṇabhāvāpattīti ce? Tesampi
tika-abh02t:1183_4: vipallāsavasena taṇhāvatthubhāvato piyarūpabhāvassa adhippetattā. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ
tika-abh02t:1184_0: Indriyabaddharūpavasena pāḷiyaṃ hīnadukaniddeso pavattoti dassetuṃ “dvīsupi hīnapaṇītapadesū”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t:1184_1: Avayavayoge sāmivacanaṃ, na kattarīti adhippāyo. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna”nti indriyabaddharūpe
tika-abh02t:1184_2: niddiṭṭhe kasmā kammajavasena attho vutto, na catusantativasenāti āha “sattasantāna…pe…
tika-abh02t:1184_3: vutta”nti. Padhānattā hi kammajavasena atthaṃ vatvā sesesu “evaṃ utusamuṭṭhānādīsupī”ti
tika-abh02t:1184_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atideso kato. “Tehi tehīti etasmiṃ atthe”ti iminā “tesaṃ tesa”nti kattari
tika-abh02t:1184_5: sāmivacanaṃ āsaṅkati. Tathā sati visaye vā sāmivacane laddhaguṇaṃ dasseti “na kammajavasenevā”tiādinā,
tika-abh02t:1185: Mariyādābhūtanti uttamamariyādābhūtaṃ. Tenevāha “yassa yeva manāpā, tassa teva paramā”ti. Tesanti kāmaguṇānaṃ. Sabhāvatoti lakkhaṇato.
tika-abh02t:1186_1: suttantavivaraṇaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāve hetubhāvena vuttanti dasseti. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1186_2: hotīti nibbāne viya aniṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ saññāvipallāsena aññesupi ārammaṇesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhābhiniveso hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1187_0: Vibhāgo nāma asaṅkaro, vitthāro cāti “vibhatta”nti padassa “vavatthitaṃ, pakāsita”nti
tika-abh02t:1187_1: ca atthamāha. Aññesanti atiaḍḍhadaliddānaṃ. Idaṃ iṭṭhaṃ, aniṭṭhañca hotīti ettha
tika-abh02t:1187_2: ca-saddena aniṭṭhaṃ, iṭṭhañca hotīti ayampi attho vuttoti veditabbaṃ. Aniṭṭhaṃ iṭṭhanti
tika-abh02t:1187_3: iṭṭhassa “aniṭṭha”nti, aniṭṭhassa “iṭṭha”nti gahaṇe yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojanā. Indriyavikārāpattiādināti
tika-abh02t:1187_4: ettha ādi-saddena pubbābhisaṅkhārādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Puretaraṃ pavattacittābhisaṅkhāravasenāpi
tika-abh02t:1187_5: hi vināva saññāvipallāsaṃ iṭṭhaṃ “aniṭṭha”nti, aniṭṭhañca “iṭṭha”nti gayhatīti.
tika-abh02t:1188_0: Tena vipākenāti tena kusalākusalavipākena. Ārammaṇassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhatanti yattha taṃ
tika-abh02t:1188_1: uppajjati, tassa buddharūpādikassa gūthādikassa ca ārammaṇassa yathākkamaṃ iṭṭhataṃ
tika-abh02t:1188_2: aniṭṭhatañca nidasseti. Vijjamānepi saññāvipallāse ārammaṇena vipākaniyamadassananti
tika-abh02t:1188_3: iṭṭhārammaṇe kusalavipākova uppajjati, aniṭṭhārammaṇe akusalavipākovāti evaṃ ārammaṇena
tika-abh02t:1188_5: taṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma. Yaṃ akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ, taṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāmāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1188_6: Ārammaṇena niyāmito hi vipāko attano upakārakassa ārammaṇassa niyāmako hotīti.
tika-abh02t:1189_0: Dvārantare dukkhassa paccayabhūtassa ārammaṇassa dvārantare sukhavipākuppādanato,
tika-abh02t:1189_1: dvārantare sukhassa paccayabhūtassa ārammaṇassa dvārantare dukkhavipākuppādanato
tika-abh02t:1189_2: vipākena ārammaṇaniyamadassanena vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā dassitāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t:1190_1: evaṃ supariggahaṭṭhena lakkhaṇasuppaṭivijjhatā veditabbā. “Dūre”ti avuttassāti lakkhaṇato
tika-abh02t:1191_0: “Bhindamāno”ti sambhindamānoti vuttaṃ hotīti āha “missakaṃ karonto”ti. Yasmā pana
tika-abh02t:1191_1: bhedanaṃ vibhāgakaraṇampi hoti, tasmā dutiyavikappe “bhindamāno”ti padassa “visuṃ
tika-abh02t:1191_2: karonto”ti atthamāha. Tatiyavikappe pana bhindamānoti vināsentoti attho. Tenāha “santikabhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t:1191_3: bhinditvā dūrabhāvaṃ, dūrabhāvañca bhinditvā santikabhāvaṃ karonto”ti. Na hi sakkā
tika-abh02t:1191_4: santikassa tabbhāvaṃ avināsetvā dūrabhāvaṃ kātuṃ, tathā itarassāpi. Santikabhāvakaraṇena
tika-abh02t:1191_5: na bhindati na vināseti, na ca okāsadūrato lakkhaṇato dūraṃ visuṃ karaṇena bhindati
tika-abh02t:1191_6: vibhāgaṃ karoti, nāpi okāsadūrena lakkhaṇato dūraṃ vomissakakaraṇena bhindati sambhindatīti
tika-abh02t:1191_7: yojanā. “Tidhā attho daṭṭhabbo”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ “na hī”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-abh02t:1191_8: Visuṃ karoti, vomissakaṃ karotīti karoti-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandho. “Etthāpī”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1191_9: yathā “okāsato dūrameva bhindatī”ti ettha okāsato dūrassa okāsato santikabhāvakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1191_10: adhippetanti vināsanaṃ bhedanaṃ, evaṃ “na lakkhaṇato dūraṃ bhindatī”ti etthāpi lakkhaṇato
tika-abh02t:1191_11: dūrassa lakkhaṇato santikabhāvākaraṇaṃ abhedanaṃ avināsananti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1191_12: Vomissakakaraṇavibhāgakaraṇatthataṃ sandhāyāha “bhindamānoti ettha ca aññathā bhedanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1191_13: vutta”nti. Pacchimanaye vināsanatthameva sandhāya “bhedanaṃ idha ca aññathā vutta”nti avoca.
tika-abh02t:1194_1: cakkhusotappasādā ca. Kāyavohāraṃ arahantīti kāyantogadhattā kāyekadesattā ca kāyoti
tika-abh02t:1194_2: vattabbataṃ arahanti. Kāyoti hi attabhāvopi vuccati “sakkāyadiṭṭhī”tiādīsu, karajakāyopi
tika-abh02t:1194_3: “so imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”tiādīsu. Tabbatthukāti cakkhādinissitā
tika-abh02t:1194_4: kāyikāti pariyāyena vuttā, nippariyāyena pana cetasikāva. Yathāha “yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye
tika-abh02t:1194_5: tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ
tika-abh02t:1194_6: adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayita”ntiādi. “Na hi cakkhādayo kāyappasādā hontī”ti iminā kāyapasādanissitā
tika-abh02t:1194_7: vedanā nippariyāyena kāyikāti dasseti. Kāyikacetasikādibhāvenāti ādi-saddena kusalākusalābyākatādibhāvā
tika-abh02t:1194_9: Keci panettha “heṭṭhā dassitanayattā pākaṭattā addhāvasena, ekamuhuttādipubbaṇhādīsu
tika-abh02t:1194_10: utuādinā rūpassa viya vedanāya vibhāgo na gayhatīti samayavasena ca atītādibhedo
tika-abh02t:1194_11: na dassito”ti vadanti. Santānavasena pavattānampi vedanānaṃ cittena samūhato gahetabbataṃ
tika-abh02t:1194_12: sandhāyāha “vedanāsamudāyo”ti. Tehīti addhāsamayavasena atītādibhāvehi. Etthāti etasmiṃ
tika-abh02t:1194_13: vibhaṅge. Teti “vedanekadesā”ti vuttā kāyikacetasikādibhāvena bhinnā sukhādivedanāvisesā.
tika-abh02t:1194_14: Yadi vedanekadesā ettha gahitā, khaṇaparicchinnāva te gahetabbā, na santatiparicchinnāti
tika-abh02t:1194_15: āha “ekasantatiyaṃ panā”tiādi. Tesūti sukhādibhedesu. Bhedoti viseso. Tassāti sukhādivisesassa.
tika-abh02t:1194_16: Yathā cettha, evaṃ “taṃsahitataduppādakā”ti etthāpi taṃ-saddena sukhādiviseso paccāmaṭṭhoti
tika-abh02t:1194_17: veditabbo. Santati paricchedikā bhavituṃ arahatīti sambandho. Santatikhaṇavaseneva
tika-abh02t:1195_1: pana atikkantahetupaccayakiccanti evaṃ vuttassa nayassa upalakkhaṇanti āha “pubbantāparantamajjhagatāti
tika-abh02t:1195_2: etena hetupaccayakiccavasena vuttanayaṃ dassetī”ti. Ettha kusalākusalakiriyavedanānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1195_3: rūpassa viya, vipākānaṃ viya ca ayaṃ nāma janakahetūti nippariyāyena na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh02t:1196_1: saṅkaraṃ sambhedaṃ akatvā. Samānajātiyanti ekajātiyaṃ. Sukhato tajjātiyā adukkhamasukhā
tika-abh02t:1196_2: paṇītāti yojetabbāti sambandho. Samānabhedeti bhūmantarādisamānavibhāge. Upabrūhitānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1196_3: dhātūnanti uḷārarūpasamuṭṭhāpanena paṇītānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ. Vibādhitānanti nippīḷitānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1196_4: milāpitānaṃ. Ubhayanti sukhādidvayaṃ. Ettha ca khobhanā, āluḷanā ca kāyikasukhassa
tika-abh02t:1196_5: vasena veditabbā. Abhisandanā jhānasukhassa. Madayanā kāmasukhassa. Tathā chādanā.
tika-abh02t:1196_6: Āsiñcanā sabbassa. Chādanā āsiñcanā vā sabbassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-abh02t:1197_0: Sabhāvādibhedena cāti sabhāvapuggalalokiyādibhedena ca. Ekantapaṇīte lokuttare hīnapaṇītānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1197_1: paṭipadānaṃ vasena hīnapaṇītatā. Ekantahīne akusale chandādivasena hīnapaṇītatā,
tika-abh02t:1197_2: oḷārikasukhumatā ca. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yā oḷārikā, sā hīnā. Yā sukhumā,
tika-abh02t:1197_3: sā paṇītā”ti. Akusalādīsu dosasahagatādiantarabhedavasena upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumatā
tika-abh02t:1197_4: taṃtaṃvāpanavasena vuccati, na kusalākusalādivasenāti āha “taṃtaṃvāpanavasena kathanepi
tika-abh02t:1197_5: parivattanaṃ natthī”ti. Dosussannatāyāti kilesādhikatāya. Tathāti dosussannatāya.
tika-abh02t:1197_6: Kathaṃ pana kusalesu dosussannatā? Upanissayavasena, kilesādhikehi santāne pavattamānā
tika-abh02t:1197_7: kusalā dhammā kilesehi sambādhappattiyā tiṇādīhi sambādhappattāni viya sassāni vipulaphalauḷāraphalā
tika-abh02t:1197_8: na hontīti. Tathāti mandadosatāya. Kusalānaṃ mandadosatāpi vuttanayānusārena veditabbā.
tika-abh02t:1197_10: vuttaṃ. Yathā hettha oḷārikasāmaññena oḷārikoḷārikataroḷārikatamā nikantiyo gayhanti,
tika-abh02t:1198: 13. Yadi siyāti yadi asampayogo visaṃsaṭṭho siyā.
tika-abh02t:1199_1: Akusalāti dosasahagatādiakusalavedanā dūreti yathā uddharīyati. Tato dūrato kusalatoti
tika-abh02t:1199_2: tato akusalato dūrato kāmāvacarādikusalavedayitato kusalā kāmāvacarādikusalavedanā.
tika-abh02t:1199_3: “Na sakkā”ti vuttaṃ uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ “tathā hi satī”tiādinā vivarati. Tasmāti
tika-abh02t:1199_4: yasmā dūrato santikuddharaṇaṃ vuttanayena santikato santikuddharaṇameva hoti, tathā
tika-abh02t:1199_5: sati atthaviseso na hoti, upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā idha vuccati. Tasmā santikato
tika-abh02t:1199_6: santikuddharaṇañca na sakkā kātuṃ atthavisesābhāvato, anadhippetattā cāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1200_0: Nanu ca atisayavacanicchāvasena attheva atthavisesoti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “dūradūrataratāya
tika-abh02t:1200_1: viya santikasantikataratāya ca anadhippetattā”ti. Yāti akusalavedanā. Tatoti kusalavedayitato.
tika-abh02t:1200_2: Idha vuttassa dūrassāti imasmiṃ vedanākkhandhavibhaṅge “akusalā vedanā kusalābyākatāhi
tika-abh02t:1200_3: vedanāhi dūre”tiādinā vuttassa dūrassa. Dūrato accantavisabhāgattāti yato yaṃ “dūre”ti
tika-abh02t:1200_4: vuttaṃ, tato accantavisadisattā tassa vasena dūre santikaṃ natthīti na sakkā dūrato
tika-abh02t:1200_5: santikaṃ uddharituṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – heṭṭhā yā vedanā yāya vedanāya dūreti
tika-abh02t:1200_6: vuttā, sā eva tassā kenacipi pariyāyena santiketi na uddharitabbāti. Santiketi vuttavedanaṃyeva
tika-abh02t:1200_7: sandhāya vadati. Bhinneti lobhasahagatādivasena vibhatte. Tatthevāti “santike”ti
tika-abh02t:1200_8: vuttaatthe eva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “akusalā vedanā akusalāya vedanāya santike”ti
tika-abh02t:1200_9: evaṃ vuttaakusalāya vedanāyameva lobhasahagatādivasena vibhattāya dūrabhāvopi labbhati. Evaṃ sesesupīti.
tika-abh02t:1201_0: Yadi santikato dūraṃ labbhati, yadaggena dūraṃ labbhati, tadaggena dūrato santikaṃ
tika-abh02t:1201_1: uddhariyeyyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “upādāyupādāya dūrato ca santikaṃ na sakkā
tika-abh02t:1201_2: uddharitu”ntiādi. Tassattho – yaṃ santikato dūraṃ labbhati, yadipi taṃ visabhāgaṭṭhena
tika-abh02t:1201_3: labbhati, tathāpi yaṃ tattha santikaṃ labbhati, taṃ sabhāgaṭṭheneva labbhatīti santikatova
tika-abh02t:1201_4: santikaṃ uddhaṭaṃ siyāti. Tasmāti yasmā visabhāgaṭṭhena dūratā, sabhāgaṭṭhena ca
tika-abh02t:1201_5: santikatā icchitā, tasmā. Lobhasahagatāya dosasahagatā visabhāgatāya dūre samānā
tika-abh02t:1201_6: kathaṃ santike bhaveyyāti adhippāyo. Nanu tāsaṃ akusalasabhāgatā labbhatevāti tattha
tika-abh02t:1201_7: uttaramāha “visabhāgatā”tiādi. Tattha bhedaṃ aggahetvā na pavattatīti bhedaṃ visesaṃ
tika-abh02t:1201_8: asadisataṃ gahetvā eva pavattati visabhāgatā. Dūratāyāti idhādhippetāya dūratāya
tika-abh02t:1201_9: sabhāgassa abyāpakattā dūrato santikuddharaṇaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ. Sati hi sabhāgabyāpakatte
tika-abh02t:1201_10: siyā santikatāti dūrato santikuddharaṇaṃ sakkā kātunti adhippāyo. “Na hī”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1201_11: tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Sabhāgatāti sāmaññaṃ. Bhedanti visesaṃ. Antogadhaṃ katvāvāti
tika-abh02t:1201_13: pavattanato heṭṭhā vuttasantikatāya santikato dūruddharaṇaṃ sakkā kātuṃ. Tamevatthaṃ
tika-abh02t:1204_0: 17. Tassāpīti saññāyapi. Tabbatthukattāti cakkhuvatthukattā. Paṭighaviññeyyoti yathāvuttapaṭighato
tika-abh02t:1204_1: vijānitabbo paṭighavasena gahetabbo. Uttarapadalopaṃ katvāti purimapade uttarapadalopaṃ katvā.
tika-abh02t:1205_0: Viññeyyabhāve, na uppattiyanti adhippāyo. Vacananti saddo, nāmanti attho. Vacanādhīnāti
tika-abh02t:1205_1: gahetabbataṃ pati saddādhīnā, nāmāyattagahaṇāti attho. Yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ nāmarūpaduke
tika-abh02t:1205_2: vuttameva. Adhivacanaṃ paññattipakāsakaṃ ñāpakaṃ etesaṃ atthīti adhivacanā yathā
tika-abh02t:1205_3: arisasoti. Tatojoti adhivacanasaṅkhātato arūpakkhandhato jāto. Arūpakkhandhapariyāpannattā
tika-abh02t:1205_4: phassepi yathāvutto attho sambhavatīti dassetuṃ “samphassoyeva vā”tiādimāha. Na kevalaṃ
tika-abh02t:1205_5: manodvārikaphasse eva, atha kho pañcadvārikaphassepi “viññeyyabhāve vacanaṃ adhikicca
tika-abh02t:1205_6: pavattā adhivacanā”tiādivuttappakāro attho sambhavati. Itīti tasmā. Tena pariyāyenāti
tika-abh02t:1206_0: Yadi evanti yadi pañcadvārikaphassehi uppannasaññā pariyāyato nippariyāyato ca “adhivacanasamphassajā”ti
tika-abh02t:1206_1: vuccanti, evaṃ cattāropi arūpino khandhā evaṃ vattuṃ yuttā. Evaṃ sante saññāva kasmā
tika-abh02t:1206_2: “adhivacanasamphassajā”ti vuttāti āha “tiṇṇaṃ khandhāna”ntiādi. Tattha tiṇṇaṃ khandhānanti
tika-abh02t:1206_5: evaṃ attano anuppattampi nāmaṃ. Dhammābhilāpoti sabhāvanirutti. Pubbe catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1206_6: sādhāraṇopi adhivacanasamphassajavohāro ruḷhivasena saññāya eva pavattoti vatvā idāni
tika-abh02t:1206_7: so tadaññārūpakkhandhasādhāraṇo saññāya nivesitoti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha. Rajjitvā
tika-abh02t:1206_8: olokanādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena kujjhitvā olokanādi viya rajjitvā savanādipi saṅgayhatīti
tika-abh02t:1207_0: Olokanassa apākaṭabhāve rattatādivijānanaṃ na hoti, pākaṭabhāve ca hotīti āha “pasādavatthukā
tika-abh02t:1207_1: evā”ti. “Aññaṃ cintenta”nti yaṃ pubbe tena kathitaṃ, kāyena vā pakāsitaṃ, tato aññaṃ
tika-abh02t:1210_1: vuttaṃ. Tassa hi bhummavasena attho gahetabbo. Tenāha “tattha hi padhānaṃ dassita”nti.
tika-abh02t:1210_2: Heṭṭhimakoṭiyāva padhānaṃ dassitanti imamatthaṃ gahetvā “yadi eva”ntiādinā codeti.
tika-abh02t:1210_3: Itaro “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā padhānameva dassita”nti evamettha niyamo gahetabboti dassento
tika-abh02t:1210_4: “uparimakoṭigatabhāvenā”tiādinā taṃ pariharati. Padhānasseva dassanaṃ. Padhāne hi
tika-abh02t:1210_5: dassite appadhānampi atthato dassitameva hotīti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “taṃsampayuttasaṅkhārā
tika-abh02t:1210_6: pana tāya gahitāya gahitāva hontī”ti. Yaṃ heṭṭhimakoṭiyaṃ labbhati, taṃ uparimakoṭiyampi
tika-abh02t:1210_7: labbhati evāti āha “heṭṭhimakoṭi hi sabbabyāpikā”ti. Dutiye karaṇaniddesataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh02t:1210_8: “āgatāti sambandho”ti āha. Āgamanakiriyā hi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā karaṇabhāvena tattha vuttāti.
tika-abh02t:1210_9: Yathā ca āgamanakiriyāya, evaṃ vacanakiriyāyapi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā karaṇabhāvo sambhavatīti
tika-abh02t:1210_11: saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ uparimakoṭiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yevāpanakadhammehi saddhiṃ
tika-abh02t:1213_0: Samuggama-padassa tatvato pariyāyato ca atthaṃ dasseti “sañjātiyaṃ ādiuppattiya”nti.
tika-abh02t:1213_1: Bhedato pana samāyoge uggamananti. Tattha kena samāyoge, kuto, kathañca uggamananti
tika-abh02t:1213_2: vicāraṇāyaṃ āha “taṃtaṃpaccayasamāyoge”tiādi. Tatthevāti pañcavokārabhave eva. Tattha
tika-abh02t:1213_3: hi pañcakkhandhā paripuṇṇā samuggacchanti. Yathādhigatānaṃ adhigatappakārānaṃ, paṭisandhikānanti
tika-abh02t:1213_4: attho. Opapātikasamuggameneva cettha saṃsedajasamuggamopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo pañcakkhandhapariyāpannānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1213_5: tadā uppajjanārahānaṃ uppajjanato. Tattha saṃsedajā uppajjitvā vaḍḍhanti, itare na
tika-abh02t:1213_6: vaḍḍhantīti idametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ. Sukhumajātiyalomā eva kira keci eḷakā himavante
tika-abh02t:1213_7: vijjanti, tesaṃ lomaṃ sandhāya “jātimantaeḷakaloma”nti vuttaṃ atisukhumattā tesaṃ
tika-abh02t:1213_8: lomānaṃ. Keci pana “ajapākatikeḷakādīhi saṅkararahitānaṃ tesaṃ eḷakavisesānaṃ nibbatteḷakassa
tika-abh02t:1213_9: lomaṃ jātiuṇṇā, tampi taṅkhaṇanibbattassā”ti vadanti. Gabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitassāti
tika-abh02t:1213_10: apare. Evaṃsaṇṭhānanti jātiuṇṇaṃsuno paggharitvā agge ṭhitatelabindusaṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇappaṭibhāgoti
tika-abh02t:1214: Santatimūlānīti tasmiṃ bhave rūpasantatiyā mūlabhūtāni. Anekindriyasamāhārabhāvatoti yathārahaṃ cakkhādianekindriyasaṅghātabhāvato. Padhānaṅganti uttamaṅgaṃ siro.
tika-abh02t:1215_0: Na tassa tassa khandhassa paripuṇṇataṃ, taṃtaṃkhandhekadesasseva vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1215_2: vasena. Tattha duggatiyaṃ andhassa cakkhudasakavasena, badhirassa sotadasakavasena,
tika-abh02t:1215_3: andhabadhirassa ubhayavasena santatisīsahāni veditabbā. Napuṃsakassa pana bhāvahāni
tika-abh02t:1215_4: vuttā eva. Tathā andhabadhirāghānakassa cakkhusotaghānavasena. Taṃ pana dhammahadayavibhaṅgapāḷiyā
tika-abh02t:1215_5: virujjhati. Taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Rūpāvacarānaṃ pana cakkhusotavatthujīvitavasena
tika-abh02t:1215_6: cattāri santatisīsānīti itaresaṃ vasena santatisīsahāni veditabbā.
tika-abh02t:1216_0: Tesanti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ. Vatthubhāvenāti vicāraṇāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvena. Paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1216_1: uppannā pavattā pañcakkhandhāti paṭisandhikkhaṇe pavattikkhaṇe ca pañcakkhandhe dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1216_2: Bhummaniddesoti “pañcasu khandhesū”ti ayaṃ bhummaniddeso. Aññathāti niddhāraṇe anadhippete.
tika-abh02t:1216_5: uppādakkhaṇe dubbalaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ na paṭisandhikkhaṇaṃ eva, nāpi vatthurūpaṃ eva
tika-abh02t:1216_6: sandhāya vuttanti dassento āha “sabbarūpānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe dubbalataṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh02t:1216_7: “Tadā hī”tiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tattha tanti rūpaṃ. “Kammakkhittattā”ti
tika-abh02t:1216_8: idaṃ na kammajatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho kammajassa paṭhamuppattiyaṃ apatiṭṭhitataṃ
tika-abh02t:1216_9: sandhāyāti dassento “satipī”tiādimāha. Tato paranti tato paṭisandhito paraṃ. Sadisasantāne
tika-abh02t:1216_10: yathā patiṭṭhitaṃ, na tathā visadisasantāneti āha “samānasantatiya”nti.
tika-abh02t:1217_0: Aṅgabhāvanti kāraṇabhāvaṃ. Tenevāha “sahāyabhāva”nti. Tesaṃ dhammānanti yehi saddhiṃ
tika-abh02t:1217_1: uppannaṃ, tesaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ cittacetasikadhammānaṃ. Tadāti ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1217_2: ca rūpuppādanameva natthi. Anantarādipaccayalābhena uppādakkhaṇe eva cittassa balavabhāvo,
tika-abh02t:1217_3: na itaratra. Tenāha “yadā ca rūpuppādanaṃ, tadā uppādakkhaṇe”ti.
tika-abh02t:1218_0: Yehākārehīti āhārindriyapaccayādiākārehi. Yathāsambhavaṃ paccayā hontīti phassādayo
tika-abh02t:1218_1: āhārādivasena yathārahaṃ paccayā honti. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭṭhāne “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā
tika-abh02t:1218_2: āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ, kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
tika-abh02t:1219_0: Cuticittena saddhiṃ uppajjamānaṃ, cuticittena vā kāraṇabhūtena uppajjamānaṃ. Tato
tika-abh02t:1219_1: purimatarehi uppajjamānaṃ viyāti yathā cuticittato āsannehi purimatarehi uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1219_2: rūpaṃ bhavantare na uppajjati, evaṃ cuticittena uppajjamānampi anupacchinnepi vaṭṭamūleti
tika-abh02t:1221_0: Utunāti paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannena utunā. Samuṭṭhite rūpeti paṭisandhicittassa
tika-abh02t:1221_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpe samuṭṭhite paṭisandhianantaraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh02t:1221_2: Uppādanirodhakkhaṇāti yathāvuttesu soḷasasu cittesu ādicittassa uppādakkhaṇo, soḷasamacittassa
tika-abh02t:1221_3: nirodhakkhaṇo cāti vadanti, rūpasseva pana uppādanirodhakkhaṇā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t:1222_0: Dharamānakkhaṇe evāti tassa utuno vijjamānakkhaṇe eva yadi gahitā, “soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ
tika-abh02t:1222_1: rūpa”nti vuttaṃ hoti soḷasaheva cittehi tassa dharamānatāya paricchinnattā. Uppādakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1222_2: aggahetvāti utuno dharamānakkhaṇe uppādakkhaṇaṃ aggahetvā nirodhakkhaṇo atha gahito,
tika-abh02t:1222_3: “sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ rūpa”nti vuttaṃ hoti uppādakkhaṇasahitena ca ekassa cittakkhaṇassa
tika-abh02t:1223_0: Evaṃ uppādanirodhakkhaṇesu gahitesu aggahitesu ca soḷasasattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatā,
tika-abh02t:1223_1: tato adhikacittakkhaṇāyukatā ca siyāti dassetvā idāni tattha ṭhitapakkhaṃ dassento
tika-abh02t:1223_2: “yasmā panā”tiādimāha. Tattha tassa dharamānakkhaṇe uppannesūti tassa utuno dharamānakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1223_3: uppannesu soḷasasu cittesu paṭisandhipi yasmā gahitā, tasmā utuno uppādakkhaṇo dharamānakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1223_4: gahitoti nirodhakkhaṇe aggahite “rūpe dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
tika-abh02t:1223_5: taṃ pana sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhamānā
tika-abh02t:1223_6: adhikasoḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā adhippetā. Gahite vā nirodhakkhaṇe soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā
tika-abh02t:1223_7: adhippetāti sambandho. Ettha ca “adhikasoḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā”ti idaṃ paṭisandhicittassa
tika-abh02t:1223_8: uppādakkhaṇo gahitoti katvā vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1223_9: “dve bhavaṅgāni, āvajjanaṃ, dassanaṃ, sampaṭicchanaṃ, santīraṇaṃ, voṭṭhabbanaṃ, pañca
tika-abh02t:1223_10: javanāni, dve tadārammaṇāni, ekaṃ cuticittanti pañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti,
tika-abh02t:1223_12: tadavasāne tasmiññeva ekacittakkhaṇaṭṭhitike ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh02t:1223_13: ca vakkhati. Tasmā rūpassa soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatāyapi atthasiddhi hotiyeva. Tenāha
tika-abh02t:1224_0: Ojāya sabhāvasukhumatā upādārūpabhāvato. Ettha ca mātarā ajjhohaṭā ojā bāhirabbhañjanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1224_1: viya gabbhamallinā tasmiṃ santāne ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppattiyā paccayo hoti. Āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpapaveṇiyā
tika-abh02t:1224_2: ojāya viya sesatisantatiojāya rūpuppādananti udariye ojā rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti utusamuṭṭhānabhāvato,
tika-abh02t:1224_3: upādinnakaṭṭhāne eva pana samuṭṭhāpeti, rasaharaṇīhi gantvā kāyānusaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1225_0: Cittañcevāti ettha ca-saddena paṭiyogīnaṃ kammameva samuccinoti, na cittena sampayuttadhammeti
tika-abh02t:1225_1: katvā āha “cittassa pubbaṅgamatāya vutta”nti. “Cittuppādaṃ gaṇhāti ‘cittaṃ uppannaṃ
tika-abh02t:1225_2: hotī’tiādīsu viya, na kammacetanaṃ viya ekadhammamevā”ti vutte “yathā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa
tika-abh02t:1225_3: hetuādayo cittasampayuttadhammāpi samuṭṭhāpakāva, evaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānarūpassa kammasampayuttāpī”ti
tika-abh02t:1226_0: Rūpassāti rūpakkhaṇassa, rūpassa vā addhuno. Nayadassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1226_1: eva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pātubhāvoti imassa atthassa anadhippetattā. Tenevāha
tika-abh02t:1226_2: “tato parampi rūpārūpānaṃ sahuppattisabbhāvato”ti. Yathā ca “paṭisandhikkhaṇe evā”ti
tika-abh02t:1226_3: niyamo na gahetabbo, evaṃ “ekakkhaṇe eva pātubhāvo”tipi niyamo na gahetabboti dassento
tika-abh02t:1227_0: Yadi evanti yathā phalapattāni, evaṃ rūpārūpadhammā yadi dandhalahuparivattino. Asamānaddhattāti
tika-abh02t:1227_1: atulyakālattā. Nicchiddesūti nibbivaresu. Tena nirantarappavattiṃ eva vibhāveti.
tika-abh02t:1227_2: Ayanti addhānaparicchedakathā. Cittajarūpādīnaṃ na tathā nirantarabhāvena pavatti,
tika-abh02t:1227_3: yathā kammajarūpānanti āha “kammajarūpappavattiṃ sandhāyā”ti. Kammajarūpānaṃ vā itaresaṃ
tika-abh02t:1227_5: abyābajjhatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā nibbānapaṭibhāgatā veditabbā. Pade padaṃ akkamitvāti
tika-abh02t:1227_6: lakuṇḍakapādatāya attano akkantapadasamīpe padaṃ nikkhipitvā. Yo hi sīghapadavikkamo
tika-abh02t:1227_7: lakuṇḍakapādo, so idhādhippetoti āha “lahuṃ lahuṃ akkamitvāti attho”ti. Saheva nirujjhantīti
tika-abh02t:1227_8: rūpaṃ kammajamidhādhippetanti katvā vuttaṃ. Utujaṃ pana cutito uddhampi pavattati
tika-abh02t:1227_9: eva. Pubbe vuttanti “rūpassa sattarasacittakkhaṇā, arūpassa tato ekabhāgo”ti evaṃ
tika-abh02t:1228_0: Ekuppādatoti samānuppādato. Samānattho hi ayaṃ eka-saddo. Eko daṭṭhabbākāroti eko
tika-abh02t:1228_1: ñātapariññāya passitabbākāro. Evañhi soḷasākārā siyuṃ, itarathā vīsati, tato adhikā
tika-abh02t:1228_2: vā ete ākārā bhaveyyuṃ. Tassāti pacchimakammajassa. Heṭṭhā soḷasaketi pariyosānasoḷasakassa
tika-abh02t:1228_3: anantarātītasoḷasake. Pacchimassāti tattha pacchimacittassa. Nānānirodhabhāvaṃ viya
tika-abh02t:1228_4: ekuppādabhāvampi pacchimakammajassa ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ anicchanto “yadi panā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ
tika-abh02t:1228_5: vadati. “Sabbampī”tiādinā tattha atippasaṅgaṃ dasseti. Vajjetabbaṃ nānuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1228_6: Gahetabbaṃ ekuppādanānānirodhaṃ. Ubhayampi tadā natthi anuppajjanato. Tenevāha “kammajarūpassa
tika-abh02t:1228_7: anuppattito”ti. Tato pubbeti pacchimakammajarūpuppajjanato oraṃ. Aññassāti yassa
tika-abh02t:1228_8: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ, tato aññassa cittassa. Ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannassa ekuppādatā,
tika-abh02t:1228_9: bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannassa nānānirodhatā ca natthīti āha “ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu uppannarūpāni
tika-abh02t:1228_10: vajjetvā”ti. Tenāti rūpena. “Saṅkhalikassa viya sambandho”ti etena avicchinnasambandho
tika-abh02t:1228_11: idha “paveṇī”ti adhippetoti dasseti. Aññathāti vicchijjamānampi gahetvā “paveṇī”ti
tika-abh02t:1228_12: vuccamāne. Na hi rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ viya anantarapaccayabhāvo atthīti rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1228_13: bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannarūpadhamme aggahetvā “aṭṭhacattālīsā”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ pana gahaṇe
tika-abh02t:1229_0: Sudīpanattāti sukhadīpanattā, nayadassanabhāvena vā suṭṭhu dīpanattā. Tenevāha “etena
tika-abh02t:1229_1: hi nayenā”tiādi. Tattha tanti rūpaṃ. Tenāti rūpena. Ubhayatthāti pacchimakammajarūpappavattiyaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1229_2: tato pubbe ca. Aññassāti ekassa cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppajjitvā tato aññassa cittassa.
tika-abh02t:1229_3: Tassāti rūpassa. Ettha ca pacchimakammajarūpappavattiyaṃ nirujjhanakanti vuttaṃ tato
tika-abh02t:1229_5: Etthāti etasmiṃ nānuppādekanirodhatādīpane. Ṭhitikkhaṇeti arūpassa rūpassa ca ṭhitikkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1229_6: uppannassa rūpassa ca arūpassa ca dassitattā. Adassitassāti yathā eva ettha, evaṃ
tika-abh02t:1229_7: tattha vibhajitvā adassitassa. Kasmā panettha pacchimakammajena dīpanāyaṃ samatiṃsakammajarūpaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1229_8: katanti āha “samatiṃsa…pe… yojita”nti. Tato kammato jātā taṃkammajā, tesu. Saṅkharotīti
tika-abh02t:1229_9: saṅkhāro, jīvitañca taṃ saṅkhāro cāti jīvitasaṅkhāro, āyu. Jīvitena saṅkharīyantīti
tika-abh02t:1230_0: Aññassa uppādakkhaṇeti yassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ aññassa tato sattarasamassa
tika-abh02t:1230_1: uppādakkhaṇe, ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannaṃ aññassa ṭhitikkhaṇeti sambandho. “Vuttanti adhippāyo”ti
tika-abh02t:1230_2: idaṃ pāḷiyā virujjhantampi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttanti ayamettha
tika-abh02t:1230_3: adhippāyoti attho. Kasmāti cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ sandhāya pāḷi pavattā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1230_4: pana kammajarūpanti sā tāya kena kāraṇena virujjhatīti āha “catu…pe… bhavitabbattā”ti,
tika-abh02t:1230_5: nipphannassāti adhippāyo. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yo cāyaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa…pe… kammādisamuṭṭhānassāpi
tika-abh02t:1230_6: ayameva khaṇaniyamo”ti. Etehīti yathānīto yamakapāṭho, “kāyasaṅkhāro cittasamuṭṭhāno”tiādiko
tika-abh02t:1230_7: aṭṭhakathāpadesoti etehi. Natthiyeva ekuppādaekanirodhadīpanatoti adhippāyo. Tena
tika-abh02t:1230_8: hi vuttaṃ “yena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjati, tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ nirujjhatī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t:1231_1: gahitāti veditabbaṃ, ubhayatthāpi vā etehi ācariyehīti attho. Tatiyo bhāgo, tena
tika-abh02t:1231_2: adhikā soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā tatiya…pe… yukatā vuttāti sambandho. Tatiya bhāgoti
tika-abh02t:1231_3: ca uppādaṭṭhitikkhaṇe upādāya bhaṅgakkhaṇo adhippeto. Yasmiṃ ekādasa cittakkhaṇā
tika-abh02t:1231_4: atītā, avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke, yasmiṃ pañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītā, avasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke
tika-abh02t:1231_5: tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇeti yojetabbaṃ. Ubhayañcetaṃ yathākkamaṃ manodvāre pañcadvāre ca
tika-abh02t:1231_6: āpāthagataṃ veditabbaṃ. Na kho panevaṃ sakkā viññātuṃ ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1231_7: sandhāya paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā vuttanti dassento “na hi sakkā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t:1231_8: Pañcadasāti atirekapañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītāti sambandho. “Tasmā”tiādinā yattha
tika-abh02t:1231_9: khaṇekadesaṃ aggahitanti na sakkā vattuṃ, tameva dasseti. Evaṃ tāva na rūpaṃ sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1231_10: nāpi tatiyabhāgādhikasoḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ, atha kho soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukamevāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t:1232_0: Kasmā panettha rūpameva samānepi aniccasaṅkhatādibhāve cirāyukaṃ jātanti? Dandhaparivattibhāvato.
tika-abh02t:1232_1: Arūpadhammā hi sārammaṇā cittapubbaṅgamā, te yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇavibhāvanavasena
tika-abh02t:1232_3: bhagavā, “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1232_4: yadidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti. Rūpadhammā pana anārammaṇā, te ārammaṇavasena arūpadhammehi
tika-abh02t:1232_5: vibhāvetabbā. Sā ca nesaṃ vohārānuguṇā vibhāvetabbatā attano dandhaparivattitāya,
tika-abh02t:1232_6: tesañca lahuparivattitāya soḷasahi sattarasahi vā cittakkhaṇehi nippajjatīti rūpamevettha
tika-abh02t:1232_9: pana rūpassa dandhaparivattitā. Nānādhātūsu tathāgatasseva yathābhūtañāṇaṃ, tena
tika-abh02t:1232_10: ca rūpameva purejātapaccayo vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti na ettha aniccasaṅkhatādibhāvasāmaññena
tika-abh02t:1232_11: rūpārūpaṃ samānāyukaṃ parikappetabbaṃ. Vuttanayena rūpameva cirāyukanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1233_1: vā na hoti, taṃ dassetvā yvāyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpuppādo vutto,
tika-abh02t:1233_2: tattha ṭhitikkhaṇameva tāva cittassa ananujānanto “yo cettha…pe… vicāretabbo”ti vatvā
tika-abh02t:1233_4: ubhayampi yamakapadaṃ ahāpetvā katavissajjane. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañcāti uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1233_5: ca cittaṃ, anāgatañca cittaṃ na niruddhaṃ, nirujjhamānanti attho. Ṭhitikkhaṇābhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t:1233_6: cittassa dīpetīti uppannauppajjamānavārādīsu “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1233_7: nāma natthīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti bodheti. Na hi yathādhammasāsane abhidhamme labbhamānassa
tika-abh02t:1233_8: avacane kāraṇaṃ dissatīti adhippāyo. Na kevalamabhidhamme avacanameva cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇābhāvajotakaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1233_9: apica kho suttantapāḷipīti dassento “suttesupī”tiādimāha. Tattha aññathattaṃ nāma
tika-abh02t:1233_10: pubbāparaviseso. Khaṇadvayasamaṅgiṃ ṭhitanti paccuppannassa ṭhitabhāvamāha. Aññathattaṃ
tika-abh02t:1234_0: Ettha ca keci “yathābhūto dhammo uppajjati, kiṃ tathābhūtova bhijjati, udāhu aññathābhūto?
tika-abh02t:1234_1: Yadi tathābhūtova bhijjati, na jaratāya sambhavo. Atha aññathābhūto, añño eva soti
tika-abh02t:1234_2: sabbathāpi ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvoyevā”ti vadanti. Tattha ekadhammādhārabhāvepi uppādanirodhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1234_3: aññova uppādakkhaṇo, añño nirodhakkhaṇo. Uppādāvatthañhi upādāya uppādakkhaṇo, nirodhāvatthaṃ
tika-abh02t:1234_4: upādāya nirodhakkhaṇo. Uppādāvatthāya ca bhinnā nirodhāvatthāti ekasmiṃyeva sabhāvadhamme
tika-abh02t:1234_5: yathā icchitabbā, aññathā aññova dhammo uppajjati, añño dhammo nirujjhatīti āpajjeyya,
tika-abh02t:1234_6: evaṃ nirodhāvatthāya viya nirodhābhimukhāvatthāyapi bhavitabbaṃ. Sā ṭhiti, jaratā
tika-abh02t:1234_7: cāti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇo na vuttoti? Vineyyajjhāsayānurodhena
tika-abh02t:1234_8: nayadassanavasena pāḷi gatāti veditabbā. Abhidhammadesanāpi hi kadāci vineyyajjhāsayānurodhena
tika-abh02t:1234_9: pavattati. Tathā hi rūpassa uppādo “upacayo, santatī”ti bhinditvā desito. Hetusampayuttadukādidesanā
tika-abh02t:1235_0: “Yassa vā panā”tiādi pucchāvacanaṃ. Tassa “no”ti vissajjanaṃ. Samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhatīti
tika-abh02t:1235_1: cittuppādassa nirodhakkhaṇo vutto. Ayamettha adhippāyo – yadi cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1235_2: rūpaṃ uppajjeyya, taṃ dukkhasaccanti katvā “no”ti vattuṃ na sakkā, vuttañcetaṃ. Tasmā
tika-abh02t:1235_3: viññāyati “cittassa nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo natthī”ti. Tayidamakāraṇaṃ. Arūpalokañhi
tika-abh02t:1235_4: sandhāya, cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ vā “no”ti sakkā vattunti. Ayañhi yamakadesanāya pakati,
tika-abh02t:1235_5: yadidaṃ yathāsambhavayojanā. Etena “na ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpamevā”tiādivacanaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ
tika-abh02t:1235_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā paccāsattiñāyena yaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tena yaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh02t:1235_7: uppādetabbaṃ cittacetasikatappaṭibaddharūpasaṅkhātaṃ, tassa tadā uppatti natthīti
tika-abh02t:1236_1: nirujjhatīti? Āmantā”ti evaṃ sahuppādasahanirodhavacanato. Tena vacanenāti “yassa
tika-abh02t:1236_4: kammajādīnanti. Etenāti “yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjantī”tiādikena pāṭhena, “na cittasamuṭṭhānarūpamevā”ti
tika-abh02t:1236_6: anussaraṇe vijjamāne. Bhijjamānatāti cittassa bhijjamānatā nāma nirujjhamānatā ṭhitiyā
tika-abh02t:1236_7: abhāvato. Sahāyabhāvaṃ nāpi gacchati nissayatthibhāvādinā paccayabhāvābhāvato. Uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1236_8: eva hi anantarādipaccayalābhena cittassa balavatā. Evañca satīti evañca utunāpi bhavaṅgacittassa
tika-abh02t:1236_9: uppādakkhaṇeyeva rūpasamuṭṭhāpane sati. Taṃcittakkhaṇeti tassa cittassa khaṇe, khaṇadvayepīti
tika-abh02t:1236_10: attho. Tenevāti atilahuparivattibhāveneva. Atha vā tenevāti dandhaparivattikatāya
tika-abh02t:1236_11: rūpassa sakalaṃ ekacittakkhaṇaṃ uppajjamānabhāveneva. Tanti cittaṃ. Paṭisandhicittaṃ
tika-abh02t:1236_12: sampayuttadhammānaṃ viya sahajātarūpadhammānampi sahajātādipaccayena paccayo hotīti
tika-abh02t:1236_13: āha “paṭisandhito uddha”nti. Cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittaṃ sahajātādipaccayo hotiyevāti
tika-abh02t:1236_14: vuttaṃ “acittasamuṭṭhānāna”nti. Tadanantaranti yena cittena sahuppannaṃ, tassa cittassa
tika-abh02t:1236_15: anantaraṃ. Tanti rūpaṃ. Tadanantaraṃ cittanti sahuppannacittānantaraṃ cittaṃ. Yadi
tika-abh02t:1236_16: evanti yadi sakalaṃ cittakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ uppajjamānameva hoti, cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1236_17: eva rūpassa uppādārambhoti āha “na, cittanirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādārambhābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh02t:1236_18: Cittakkhaṇeti attanā sahuppannacittassa khaṇe. Tanti rūpaṃ. Rūpasamuṭṭhāpanapurejātapaccayakiccanti
tika-abh02t:1236_20: laddhabbo yo viseso, tassa alābhaṃ. Idaṃ vuttanti “yena sahuppajjati, taṃcittakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1237_0: Yaṃ yassa sambandhibhāvena vuttaṃ, taṃ dūre ṭhitampi tena sambandhanīyanti āha “tato
tika-abh02t:1237_1: paraṃ…pe… etena saha sambandho”ti. Tasmā “tato”ti ettha taṃsaddena cutiṃ paccāmasatīti
tika-abh02t:1238: Natthīti katvāti yadipi yathā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā ekuppādekanirodhatā rūpānaṃ arūpehi, arūpānañca rūpehi natthi. Yathā ca amhehi vuttaṃ, tathā atthevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1239: Catutthassa pakārassa vuccamānattā “tayo pakāre āhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1240_1: parinipphannaṃ saṅkhatamevā”ti vadantena parinipphannatāpariyāyo dassito. Pubbantāparantaparicchinnoti
tika-abh02t:1240_2: pātubhāvaviddhaṃsabhāvaparicchinno, udayabbayaparicchinno vā. “Ayaṃ datto nāma hotū”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1240_4: nāmakāyassa nirodhameva. Ādi-saddena sattakasiṇādipaññattiyā paññāpanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh02t:1243_2: ukkaṭṭhabhāvato kathānaṃ anupubbukkaṃsatā vuttā. Tena ukkaṃsakkamo nāmāyaṃ visuṃ
tika-abh02t:1243_3: kamoti dasseti. Tathāpi dānādīnaṃ desanākkamāvarodhane kāraṇamāha “uppattiādivavatthānābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh02t:1243_5: iminā pañcarūpindriyagocaratā adhippetāti āha “ekadesenā”tiādi. Ekadesenāti bāhiroḷārikāyatanehi.
tika-abh02t:1243_6: Etthāti “yaṃ vedayati, taṃ sañjānātī”ti etasmiṃ pade vuttanayena.
tika-abh02t:1244_1: vuttāti attho sāsavānampi khandhesu vuttattā. Nanu ca anāsavadhammo khandhesu avuttopi
tika-abh02t:1244_2: atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi, khandhādhikāre khandhapariyāpannā eva anāsavā gayhantīti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-abh02t:1245_0: Yathā phassādayo visesato tadanuguṇavuttitāya saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasabhāvāti saṅkhārakkhandhe
tika-abh02t:1245_1: samavaruddhā, na evaṃ vedanāsaññāviññāṇānīti rūpadhammā viya tāni visuṃ khandhabhāvena
tika-abh02t:1245_2: vuttāni. Etena phassādīnaṃ visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyatābhāvo vuttoti veditabbo. Tena
tika-abh02t:1245_3: vuttaṃ “phusanādayo panā”tiādi. Itiādīnañca suttānanti ettha ādi-saddena “rūpe kho,
tika-abh02t:1245_4: bhikkhave, sati rūpaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ abhinivissa uppajjanti saṃyojanābhinivesavinibandhā.
tika-abh02t:1245_5: Vedanāya…pe… saññāya… saṅkhāresu… viññāṇe sati viññāṇaṃ upādāya viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa
tika-abh02t:1245_6: uppajjanti saṃyojanābhinivesavinibandhā”ti, tathā “ahaṃ rūpaṃ, mama rūpanti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī
tika-abh02t:1245_7: hotī”ti ca evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Etenāti attanā dassitasuttena.
tika-abh02t:1245_8: Vakkhamānasuttavasena cāti “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, satī”tiādikassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhamānassa
tika-abh02t:1245_9: suttassa vasena. “Parittārammaṇādivasena na vattabbā”ti etena navattabbārammaṇāpi
tika-abh02t:1245_10: diṭṭhi khandhe eva nissāya uppajjati, pageva khandhārammaṇāti dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1246: Vedanākāraṇāyāti vedanāyātanāya. Chādāpanatoti rocāpanato. Bāhullenāti bahulabhāvena. Upādānakkhandhā hi bāhullappavattikā, na itare.
tika-abh02t:1247_0: Puṭaṃ katvāti ca chattasadisaṃ puṭaṃ bandhaṃ katvā. Vatthumhīti cakkhādivatthumhi.
tika-abh02t:1247_1: Vaṭṭagatavedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sā hi idha daṭṭhabbabhāve ṭhitā. Ūnehīti vatthunā, kilesehi ca ūnehi.
tika-abh02t:1248_0: Māyāyāti indajālādimāyāya payogo māyāti adhippāyenāha “māyāya dassitaṃ rūpaṃ ‘māyā’ti
tika-abh02t:1248_1: āhā”ti. Vatthubhāvāditoti ādi-saddena ārammaṇasampayuttādike saṅgaṇhāti. Katthacīti
tika-abh02t:1249_0: Tassāti ajjhattikarūpassa. Yassa kāmarāgappahānamukhena sabbarāgappahānaṃ sambhavati,
tika-abh02t:1249_1: taṃ sandhāyāha “kāmarāgamukhena vā sabbalobhappahānaṃ vadatī”ti. Yojetabbanti vedanāya
tika-abh02t:1249_2: chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā samudayabhūte phassepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti yojetabbanti.
tika-abh02t:1250: Tatoti dukkhuppādanasukhavināsanānaṃ adassanato. Bhindatīti vināseti. Tanti manosañcetanāhāraṃ ñātatīraṇapariññāhi pariggaṇhāti tīreti.
tika-abh02t:1251_0: Taṃ pajahantoti avijjaṃ pajahanto. Parāmaṭṭhanti parāmāsasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā niccādivasena
tika-abh02t:1251_1: gahitaṃ. Viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyatīti ayamattho “tadevidaṃ
tika-abh02t:1255_0: 34. Taṃ vatvāti taṃ bhūmivasena jānitabbataṃ “sabbāpi catubhūmikavedanā”tiādinā vatvā.
tika-abh02t:1256_0: Yadipi taṃ-saddo pubbe vuttassa sāmaññato paṭiniddeso, tathāpi anantarameva paccāmasituṃ
tika-abh02t:1258_0: Gahaṇavaḍḍhanavasenāti gahaṇassa vaḍḍhanavasena. Gahaṇanti cettha kathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1258_1: tassa vaḍḍhanaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne avuttassa kathanaṃ. Tenāha “pubbe gahitato aññassa
tika-abh02t:1258_2: gahaṇaṃ vaḍḍhana”nti, tato eva ca “purimagahite aññupacayavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. “Vaḍḍhanasaddo
tika-abh02t:1258_3: chedanattho”ti idaṃ yathā asivā “sivā”ti, diṭṭhañca “adiṭṭha”nti vuccati, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1258_4: Nayanīharaṇanti nīyatīti nayo, desanā, tassa nīharaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ. Vaḍḍhanakanayoti
tika-abh02t:1258_5: yathāvuttavaḍḍhanakavasena pavatto desanānayo. Aññe bhedāti ekavidhacatubbidhādayo
tika-abh02t:1258_6: bhedā. Yadi avisiṭṭhā, kasmā vuttāti āha “tathāpī”tiādi. Tattha paññāppabhedajananatthanti
tika-abh02t:1258_7: dhammavisayāya pabhedagatāya paññāya vineyyānaṃ nibbattanatthaṃ, vijjāṭṭhānādivasena
tika-abh02t:1258_9: sammasanavārassa visayabhāvato vuttaṃ “ekekassa vārassa gahitassa niyyānamukhabhāvato”ti.
tika-abh02t:1258_10: Itarepi bhedā vuttāti duvidhatividhabhedānaṃ yaṃ nānattaṃ, tassa vasena itare bhedā
tika-abh02t:1258_11: anānattāpi yathāvuttakāraṇato vuttā. “Na kevala”ntiādinā bhedānaṃ aññamaññapekkhataṃ
tika-abh02t:1259_0: Yathā dukamūlakādīsu bhedā gaṇanānupubbiyā pavattā pabhedantarāpekkhā, na evamete.
tika-abh02t:1259_1: Ete pana sattavidhādibhedā pabhedantaranirapekkhā kevalaṃ bahuvidhabhāvasāmaññeneva
tika-abh02t:1259_3: vuttattā yathā duke ṭhapetvā vuttā tikā tattha pakkhittā nāma jātā, evaṃ tikadukapadatthānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1259_4: apekkhitabbāpekkhakabhāvena vuttattā duke vatvā vuttesupi tikesu te pakkhittā nāma
tika-abh02t:1260_0: Samānavīthiyanti ekavīthiyaṃ. Cakkhusaṅghaṭṭanāyāti cakkhurūpapaṭighātena. Soti cakkhurūpapaṭighāto.
tika-abh02t:1260_1: Taduppādikāti tassa cakkhusamphassassa uppādikā. Sāti āvajjanavedanā. Nanu ca vedanāpaccayo
tika-abh02t:1260_2: phasso vutto, na phassapaccayā vedanāti? Na, vedanāsīsena cittuppādassa gahitattāti.
tika-abh02t:1261_0: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarānaṃ vipākānanti adhippāyo. Te hi idha aggahitā. Tenevāha “tesaṃ
tika-abh02t:1261_2: ettha purimena ādi-saddena “sotasamphassapaccayā”ti evamādayo saṅgahitā, dutiyena
tika-abh02t:1261_4: yojitattā vuttaṃ “samānavīthiyaṃ labbhamānatā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā”ti. Vedanāpītisanidassanattikavajjānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1261_5: ekūnavīsatiyā tikānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsaticatuvīsatikā. Yadi asamānavīthiyampi kusalādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1261_6: labbhamānatā yojetabbā, atha kasmā samānavīthiyaṃyeva yojitāti āha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1262_0: Cittasambandhoti cittena sambandho cittasambandhaṃ katvā cittasīsena vedanāya kathanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1262_2: cakkhādiuppattidvāravasena, kusalattikāditikavasena ca. Yattha katthacīti dīpetabbassa
tika-abh02t:1262_3: atthassa visesābhāvato sattavidhabhedādīsu yattha katthaci. Na ca dvāraṃ anāmaṭṭhanti
tika-abh02t:1262_4: yojanā. Tena sattavidhabhedato tiṃsavidhabhede visesaṃ dasseti. Yadipi ubhayattha
tika-abh02t:1262_5: bhūmiyo āgatā, rūpāvacarādibhūmiāmasanena pana asamānavīthiyaṃ labbhamānatā dassitāti
tika-abh02t:1262_6: āha “atibyattā ca ettha samānāsamānavīthīsu labbhamānatā”ti. Sukhadīpanāni honti
tika-abh02t:1262_7: dvārabhūmiāmasanamukhena vedanākkhandhassa vibhattattā. Na bhūmiyo apekkhitvā ṭhapitāti
tika-abh02t:1262_8: kathetabbabhāvena bhūmiyo apekkhitvā na ṭhapitā, bhūmivibhāgena na kathitāti attho.
tika-abh02t:1263_1: idhādhippetaupanissayakoṭiṃ dassetuṃ “saddhaṃ upanissāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha upanissayānanti
tika-abh02t:1263_2: vedanāya upanissayabhūtānaṃ. Dassananti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, disvā vā gahaṇaṃ. Upanissayantabhāvenāti
tika-abh02t:1263_3: lāmakūpanissayabhāvena. Yadi ghāyanādīni upanissayo bhaveyyuṃ, pakatūpanissayāneva
tika-abh02t:1263_4: siyuṃ. Pakatūpanissayo ca nānāvīthiyaṃyevāti tadalābhavacanaṃ idha nānāvīthijotakanti
tika-abh02t:1263_6: Tadalābhoti upanissayālābho, so ca ghāyanādīhi paresaṃ paṭipattiyā jānituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-abh02t:1263_7: Antimabhavikabodhisattādīnaṃ savanena vinā taṃphusanaṃ siyā mūlūpanissayoti “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1264: Sampannajjhāsayoti vivaṭṭūpanissayasampattiyā sampannajjhāsayo. Tenāti “evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇa”nti vacanena. Tadupanissayanti tato paraṃ uppannakasiṇarūpadassanādīnaṃ upanissayabhūtaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1265_0: Thāmagamanaṃ nāma kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvoti āha “appahīnakāmarāgādikassa
tika-abh02t:1265_2: vuttā, na nesaṃ kiccavisesoti kiccavisesena vutte dassento “asamapekkhanāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t:1265_3: Pavattā vedanāti attho. Pakārantarenāti cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppannakilesānaṃ samatikkamanasaṅkhātena
tika-abh02t:1265_4: pakārantarena. Tathā bhāvanāvasenāti ettha tathā-saddena cakkhusamphassassa catubhūmikavedanāya
tika-abh02t:1265_5: upanissayabhāvo eva pakārantarena kathitoti imamevatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Bhāvanāyevettha pakārantaraṃ.
tika-abh02t:1266: Sabbaṃ sammasanaṃ bhāvanāti veditabbā, na nīvaraṇappahānapariññāva.
tika-abh02t:1267: Aññamaññassa cāti phoṭṭhabbamahābhūtesu itarītarassa, āpodhātuyā ca vasena.
tika-abh02t:1268_0: Tesanti jātiādīnaṃ, kammatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Sahajātassa manosamphassassa balavapaccayabhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t:1268_1: dassetīti sambandho. Tassa vā dassanassāti tassa vā jātiādike bhayato dassanavasena
tika-abh02t:1269_0: Tadeva attano phalasseva phalabhāvenāti “manosamphasso”ti phassassa kāraṇabhāvena
tika-abh02t:1269_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ, tadeva viññāṇaṃ attano phalassa phalabhāvena vuttassa phassassa “cakkhusamphassaja”ntiādinā
tika-abh02t:1269_2: phalabhāvena vattuṃ na yuttaṃ. “Manosamphasso”tiādinā labbhamānopi viññāṇaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh02t:1269_3: phassassa paccayabhāvo hetuphalasaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ na vuttoti vatvā yadipi phasso
tika-abh02t:1269_4: viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, na pana phassassa viya viññāṇaṃ so tassa visesapaccayo hotīti
tika-abh02t:1269_5: viññāṇassa cakkhusamphassajāditā na vuttāti dassetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1272_0: 150. Taṃ taṃ samudāyanti taṃ taṃ cittuppādasaṅkhātadhammasamudāyaṃ, anavasesarūpadhammasamudāyañca.
tika-abh02t:1272_1: Yathāsambhavanti copanaṃ patto saṃvaro chaṭṭhadvāre, itaro chasupīti evaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1272_2: Tatoti abhijjhādomanassādito. Yathāyoganti yo saṃvaritabbo, tadanurūpaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1273: Katthacīti te eva parivaṭṭe sāmaññena vadati. Katthacīti vā tesu parivaṭṭesu kismiñcipi padese. Kiñcipi appakampi. Ekova paricchedo, na āyatanavibhaṅgādīsu viya nānāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1278_0: 154. Asādhāraṇatoti āveṇikato. Taṃ nesaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ vipakkhavasena patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
