tika-abh02t:1278_1: sādhāraṇaṃ udāharaṇavasena dasseti “āyatanasaddattho viyā”ti. Atha vā cakkhādiattho
tika-abh02t:1278_2: eva cakkhādisaddavisesito āyatanatthoti taṃ tādisaṃ āyatanatthaṃ sandhāyāha “āyatanasaddattho
tika-abh02t:1279_0: Yadi visayassādanattho cakkhu-saddo, sotādīnampi ayaṃ samaññā siyāti atippasaṅgaṃ
tika-abh02t:1279_1: pariharanto “satipī”tiādimāha. Dutiye atthavikappe cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ
tika-abh02t:1279_2: ācikkhati, ācikkhantaṃ viya, vibhāventaṃ viya vā hotīti attho. Rūpamiva cakkhuviññeyyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1279_3: viya saviggahamiva sabimbakaṃ viya vaṇṇavācako rūpa-saddo adhippetoti āha “vitthāraṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1280_0: Vacanamevāti saviññattikasaddameva. Gamīyatīti upanīyati. Ajjhoharaṇassa rasaggahaṇamūlatāvacanena
tika-abh02t:1280_1: rasassa paramparāya jīvitahetutaṃ dasseti. Rasanimittañhi rasaggahaṇaṃ, rasaggahaṇanimittaṃ
tika-abh02t:1280_2: ajjhoharaṇaṃ, taṃnimittaṃ jīvitanti. Rasaggahaṇamūlatā ca ajjhoharaṇassa yebhuyyato
tika-abh02t:1280_3: veditabbā. Dissati apadissati etena phalanti deso, hetūti āha “uppattidesoti uppattikāraṇa”nti.
tika-abh02t:1280_4: Tathāti cakkhāyatanādippakārena. Manogocarabhūtāti manaso eva gocarabhūtā. Sāmaññalakkhaṇenevāti
tika-abh02t:1280_6: upanetvā vuttā dvādasa ekasabhāvattā bhinditvā vacane payojanābhāvā. Dvārālambanavibhāgadassanatthā hi āyatanadesanāti.
tika-abh02t:1281: Pubbantatoti purimabhāgato pākabhāvato. Pākabhāvo hi sabhāvadhammānaṃ pubbanto, viddhaṃsābhāvo aparanto.
tika-abh02t:1282_0: Nivāsaṭṭhānādīsu āyatana-saddo na āyatanatthādīsu viya padatthavivaraṇamukhena pavatto,
tika-abh02t:1282_1: atha kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ devagharādike niruḷhatāya evamatthoti āha “ruḷhivasena āyatanasaddassatthaṃ
tika-abh02t:1282_2: vattu”nti. Manoti dvārabhūtamano. Nissayabhāvoti ettha nissayasadiso nissayo, sadisatā
tika-abh02t:1282_3: ca phalassa tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya daṭṭhabbā. Vacanīyattho bhāvattho.
tika-abh02t:1283_0: Tāvatvatoti tattakato. Ūnacodanāti dvādasato ūnāni kasmā na vuttānīti codanā. Yadi
tika-abh02t:1283_1: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ, evaṃ sante cakkhādīnampi
tika-abh02t:1283_3: na ārammaṇabhāveneva asādhāraṇaṃ, atha kho dvārārammaṇabhāvehi asādhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti vacanaseso.
tika-abh02t:1284_0: Yebhuyyasahuppattiādīhīti yebhuyyena cakkhāyatanādīni kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti.
tika-abh02t:1284_1: “Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni uppajjantī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā
tika-abh02t:1284_2: āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati, na pahānakkamo kusalābyākatānaṃ appahātabbato,
tika-abh02t:1284_3: na paṭipattikkamo akusalānaṃ, ekaccaabyākatānañca appaṭipajjanīyato, na bhūmikkamo
tika-abh02t:1284_5: ekaccassa lokuttarabhāvato ca. Evaṃ uppattikkamādiayuttiyojanā veditabbā. Yesu vijjamānesu
tika-abh02t:1284_6: attabhāvassa paññāpanā, te “mayhaṃ cakkhu”ntiādinā adhikasinehavatthubhūtā cakkhādayo
tika-abh02t:1284_7: yathā ajjhattikatāya, evaṃ dassanādikiccakaraindriyatā ca padhānāti āha “ajjhattikabhāvena,
tika-abh02t:1284_8: visayibhāvena cā”ti. Ghānādikkamenāti ghānaṃ jivhā kāyoti iminā kamena.
tika-abh02t:1285_0: Paccuppannārammaṇattā vā cakkhādīni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni, mano pana kiñci paccuppannārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1285_1: kiñci yāvanavattabbārammaṇanti pacchā vuttaṃ. Paccuppannārammaṇesupi upādārūpārammaṇāni
tika-abh02t:1285_2: cattāri paṭhamaṃ vuttāni, tato bhūtarūpārammaṇaṃ. Upādārūpārammaṇesupi dūratare dūre,
tika-abh02t:1285_3: sīghataraṃ sīghañca ārammaṇasampaṭicchanadīpanatthaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ desanākkamo. Cakkhusotadvayañhi
tika-abh02t:1285_4: dūragocaranti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāpi cakkhu dūrataragocaranti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1285_5: Passantopi hi dūratare nadisotaṃ na tassa saddaṃ suṇāti. Ghānajivhāsupi ghānaṃ sīghataravuttīti
tika-abh02t:1285_6: paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Purato ṭhapitamattassa hi bhojanassa gandho gayhatīti. Yathāṭhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1285_7: vā tesaṃ desanākkamo. Imasmiñhi sarīre sabbupari cakkhussa adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tassa adho
tika-abh02t:1285_8: sotassa, tassa adho ghānassa, tassa adho jivhāya, tathā kāyassa yebhuyyena, mano
tika-abh02t:1285_9: pana arūpībhāvato sabbapacchā vutto. Taṃtaṃgocarattā tassa tassānantaraṃ bāhirāyatanāni
tika-abh02t:1285_10: vuttānīti vuttovāyamatthoti evampi imesaṃ kamo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t:1286_0: Tatoti hadayavatthubhedato. Yañhi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya ekaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh02t:1286_1: na tadeva nissāya aññaṃ pavattati. Niddesavasenāti saṅkhepavitthāraniddesavasena.
tika-abh02t:1287_0: Sabhāvoti visayivisayabhāvo, tadabhinibbattiyañca yogyatā. Kāraṇasamatthatāti kāraṇabhūtā
tika-abh02t:1287_1: samatthatā paccayabhāvo. Dvārādibhāvoti dvārārammaṇe dvāravuttibhāvo. Imasmiṃ attheti
tika-abh02t:1287_2: anantaraṃ vuttaatthe. Yasmāti yāya dhammatāya yena dvārādibhāvena kāraṇabhūtena.
tika-abh02t:1287_3: Sambhavanavisesananti kiriyāya parāmasanamāha. Yaṃ sambhavanaṃ, dhammatāvesāti attho.
tika-abh02t:1287_4: Rittakānevāti dhuvādibhāvarittakāneva. Visamādīsu ajjhāsayo etesanti visamādiajjhāsayāni,
tika-abh02t:1287_5: visamādiajjhāsayāni viya hontīti visamādiajjhāsayāni, cakkhādīni. Visamabhāva…pe…
tika-abh02t:1287_7: cittena ca abhiramitattā. Vanabhāvoti hi vanajjhāsayoti attho.
tika-abh02t:1288_0: Purimantavivittatāti pubbabhāgaviraho. Uppādato purimakoṭṭhāso hi idha purimanto.
tika-abh02t:1288_1: Aparanteti aparabhāge, bhaṅgato uddhanti attho. Udayabbayaparicchinno hi sabhāvadhammo.
tika-abh02t:1288_2: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “anidhānagatā bhaggā, puñjo natthi anāgate”ti. Sadā abhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1288_3: na sadā abhāvapatiṭṭhāpanaṃ sabbakālampi natthīti, atha kho udayabbayaparicchinnattā
tika-abh02t:1288_5: Viparivattanaṃ uppādajarāvatthāhi santānaṃ vinā na vikārāpattīti āha “santānavikārāpatti vā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1289_0: Jātidhammatādīhīti jātijarābyādhimaraṇādisabhāvatāhi. Aniṭṭhatāti na iṭṭhatā, dukkhatāti
tika-abh02t:1289_1: attho. Purimaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇanti “paṭipīḷanaṭṭhenā”ti pubbe sāmaññato vuttaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1289_2: Paccayavasena dukkhanākārena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dukkhanaṃ puggalasseva
tika-abh02t:1289_3: vasena dukkhamatāti āha “puggalassa pīḷanato dukkhama”nti. Dukkhavacananti “dukkha”nti satthu vacanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1290_0: “Natthi etassa vasavattako”ti iminā natthi etassa attāti anattāti imamatthaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh02t:1290_1: “nāpi idaṃ vasavattaka”nti iminā pana na attāti anattāti. Attanoti niyakajjhattaṃ
tika-abh02t:1290_2: sandhāya vadati. Parasminti tato aññasmiṃ. Parassa ca attanīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-abh02t:1290_3: Taṃ etassa natthīti taṃ yathāvuttaparaparikappitaṃ vasavattakaṃ etassa cakkhādino
tika-abh02t:1290_4: natthi, etena catukoṭikasuññatāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Suññaṃ taṃ tena vasavattanākārenā”ti
tika-abh02t:1290_5: iminā ubhayathāpi avasavattanaṭṭhe dassitabbe tattha tāva ekaṃ dassetuṃ “parassā”tiādiṃ
tika-abh02t:1290_6: vatvā puna “atha vā”tiādinā itaraṃ dasseti. Sāmi eva sāmiko, na sāmiko assāmikoti
tika-abh02t:1290_7: evaṃ atthe gayhamāne “assāmikato”ti padassa suññavisesanatāya payojanaṃ natthi. Kāmakāriyanti
tika-abh02t:1291_0: Sasantāne dhammānaṃ visadisuppatti idha bhāvasaṅkantigamanaṃ nāmāti āha “santatiyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1291_2: āha “santatiyā yathāpavattākāravijahana”nti. Bhavatīti vā bhāvo, avatthāviseso, tassa
tika-abh02t:1291_3: saṅkamanaṃ bhāvasaṅkanti. Sabhāvadhammo hi uppādakkhaṇaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇañca patvā bhijjatīti
tika-abh02t:1291_4: uppādāvatthāya jarāvatthaṃ, tato bhaṅgāvatthaṃ saṅkamatīti vuccati. Tathā saṅkamato
tika-abh02t:1291_5: ca attalābhakkhaṇato uddhaṃ jarāmaraṇehi taṃsabhāvapariccāgo pakatibhāvavijahananti
tika-abh02t:1291_6: khaṇavasena cetaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Pubbāparavasenāti ca khaṇānaṃ pubbāparavasenāti attho
tika-abh02t:1291_7: sambhavati. Ekatthattāti samānādhikaraṇattā, na pana visesanavisesitabbabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1291_8: ekattā. “Cakkhuṃ anicca”nti vutte “aniccaṃ cakkhu”ntipi vuttameva hotīti “yaṃ cakkhu,
tika-abh02t:1291_9: taṃ aniccaṃ, yaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ cakkhu”nti āpannamevāti āha “aniccānaṃ sesadhammānampi
tika-abh02t:1292_0: Tehi ca aniccadukkhalakkhaṇehi ca anattalakkhaṇameva visesena dassitaṃ “yadaniccaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1292_1: taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”tiādīsu viya. Dosalakkhaṇākāranidassanatthoti
tika-abh02t:1292_2: dosassa lakkhitabbākāranidassanattho. Evaṃ dukkhenāti evaṃ nānappakārena akkhirogādidukkhena
tika-abh02t:1292_4: Na hi ghaṭabhedakaṇṭakavedhādivasena labbhamānā aniccadukkhatā sattānaṃ ekantato
tika-abh02t:1292_6: honti. Tathā hi cakkhādīni kammādimahābhūtādipaccayapaṭibaddhavuttīni, tato eva ahutvā
tika-abh02t:1292_7: sambhavanti, hutvā paṭiventīti aniccāni, abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷitattā dukkhāni, evaṃbhūtāni
tika-abh02t:1292_8: ca avasavattanato anattakānīti pariggahe ṭhitehi samupacitañāṇasambhārehi passituṃ sakkā.
tika-abh02t:1293_0: Kathaṃ panetesaṃ hutvā abhāvo jānitabboti? Khaṇe khaṇe aññathattadassanato. Taṃ kathaṃ
tika-abh02t:1293_1: ñāyatīti? Yuttito. Kā panettha yuttīti? Visesaggahaṇaṃ. Yadi cakkhādīnaṃ khaṇe khaṇe
tika-abh02t:1293_2: aññathattaṃ na siyā, bahipaccayabhede yadidaṃ pacchā visesaggahaṇaṃ, taṃ na siyā.
tika-abh02t:1293_3: Yassa hi tādisaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ natthi, tassa asati bahipaccayavisese kathaṃ
tika-abh02t:1293_4: pacchā visesaggahaṇaṃ bhaveyya, bhavati ca visesaggahaṇaṃ. Tasmā atthi nesaṃ khaṇe
tika-abh02t:1293_5: khaṇe aññathattaṃ yaṃ saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ vaḍḍhentaṃ pacchā pākaṭataraṃ jāyatīti. Tathā
tika-abh02t:1293_6: hi sarīrassa tāva ānāpānānaṃ anavatthānato parissamato ca visesaggahaṇaṃ. Anavatthitā
tika-abh02t:1293_7: hi assāsapassāsā vātā vārena vārena pavattanato. Yadi hi assasite vā passassite vā
tika-abh02t:1293_8: sarīrassa koci pacchā viseso na siyā, na nesaṃ koci bhedo siyā, diṭṭho ca so. Tasmā
tika-abh02t:1293_9: assasitaṃ sarīraṃ aññathā hontaṃ kamena tādisaṃ avatthaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yā passāsassa
tika-abh02t:1293_10: paccayo hoti, passasite ca puna tatheva assāsassa paccayo hotīti ānāpānānaṃ anavatthānatopi
tika-abh02t:1293_11: sarīrassa visesaggahaṇaṃ aññathattasiddhi. Tathā parissamopi asati visese pacchā
tika-abh02t:1293_12: sarīrassa na siyā, yenāyaṃ iriyāpathantarādīni sevanena parissamavinodanaṃ karoti.
tika-abh02t:1294_0: Atha vā rūpādibhedatopi visesaggahaṇaṃ. Rūpagandharasaphassādīnañhi visesena yo sarīre
tika-abh02t:1294_2: so asati bahipaccayavisese nesaṃ jarādiavatthāsu vaṇṇabalādibhedo, rasavīriyavipākānubhāvabhedo
tika-abh02t:1294_3: ca khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ vinā kathamupalabbheyya. Yaṃ pana taṃ dhammatārūpaṃ silādi,
tika-abh02t:1294_4: tattha kathanti? Tassāpi sītuṇhasamphassabhedato attheva visesaggahaṇaṃ. Taṃ khaṇe
tika-abh02t:1294_5: khaṇe aññathattaṃ vinā na yujjatīti. Sati ca rūpādibhede siddhova taṃnissayamahābhūtabhedopi.
tika-abh02t:1294_6: Na hi nissayamahābhūtabhedena vinā nissitabhedo sambhavatīti. Evaṃ tāva rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1294_7: visesaggahaṇato khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ, tato ca hutvā abhāvasiddhi.
tika-abh02t:1295_0: Arūpadhammānaṃ pana ārammaṇādibhedena visesaggahaṇaṃ. Yattha yattha hi ārammaṇe arūpadhammā
tika-abh02t:1295_1: uppajjanti, tattha tattheva te bhijjanti, na aññaṃ saṅkamanti, ārammaṇadhammā ca
tika-abh02t:1295_2: yathāsakaṃ khaṇato uddhaṃ na tiṭṭhantīti. Svāyamattho padīpādiudāharaṇena veditabbo.
tika-abh02t:1295_3: Aññe eva hi khaṇe khaṇe rūpādayo padīpajālāya, tathā khīradhārādīsu patantīsu, vāyumhi
tika-abh02t:1295_4: ca paharante samphassāni. Yathā cetesaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana cittacetasikānaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1295_5: Kiñca saddabhedato, saddavisesatopi tannimittānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1295_6: tato visesaggahaṇaṃ. Paguṇañhi ganthaṃ sīghaṃ parivattentassa cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1295_7: saddānaṃ bhedo diṭṭho. Na hi kāraṇabhedena vinā phalabhedo atthi. Yathā taṃ vāditasaddānaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1295_8: evaṃ ārammaṇabhedena arūpadhammānaṃ visesaggahaṇaṃ. Teneva nesaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ
tika-abh02t:1295_9: veditabbaṃ. Jātibhūmisampayuttadhammabhedena visesaggahaṇepi eseva nayo. Evaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1295_10: visesaggahaṇato khaṇe khaṇe aññathattasiddhi. Yato hutvā abhāvato cakkhādīni aniccānīti
tika-abh02t:1295_11: siddhāni, aniccattā eva abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato dukkhāni, tato ca avasavattanato anattakāni.
tika-abh02t:1295_12: Tenāha bhagavā “yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1296_0: Nirantaraṃ pavattamānassāti abhiṇhasaddatthaṃ visesetvā vadati. Dhātumattatāyāti
tika-abh02t:1296_2: padaṃ apekkhitvā sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ, “vinibbhujana”nti padaṃ apekkhitvā kammattheti
tika-abh02t:1296_4: ruppanādivasena pavattañca taṃ rūpādiggahaṇañcāti pavattarūpādiggahaṇaṃ, tatoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1296_5: Aniccādiggahaṇassa sabbhāvāti rūpavedanādiñāṇato bhinnassa aniccādiñāṇassa labbhamānattā.
tika-abh02t:1296_6: Tena satipi rūpādiatthānaṃ aniccādibhāve ruppanādibhāvato aniccādibhāvassa bhedamāha.
tika-abh02t:1296_7: Idāni tameva bhedaṃ ñātatīraṇapariññāvisayatāya pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “na hī”tiādimāha. Nātidhāvitunti
tika-abh02t:1296_8: idha lakkhaṇalakkhaṇavantā bhinnā vuttā. Tattha lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya khandhārammaṇatāvacanena
tika-abh02t:1296_9: abhinnāti aññamaññavirodhāpādanena atidhāvituṃ na yuttaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Vuttaṃ “te
tika-abh02t:1296_10: panākārā”tiādi. Adhippāyopi cettha lakkhaṇānaṃ rūpādiākāramattatāvibhāvananti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t:1296_11: “Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti hi saṅkhāre sabhāvato sallakkhentoyeva lakkhaṇāni ca sallakkhetīti.
tika-abh02t:1296_12: Yathā aniccādito aniccatādīnaṃ vuttanayena bhedo, evaṃ aniccatādīnampi satipi lakkhaṇabhāvasāmaññe
tika-abh02t:1296_14: aññamaññabhedoti dassento “aniccanti ca gaṇhanto”tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-abh02t:1299: 155. Paccayayugaḷavasenāti ajjhattikabāhirapaccayadvayavasena. Ajjhattikabāhiravasena abbokāratoti ajjhattikavasena ceva bāhiravasena ca asaṅkarato.
tika-abh02t:1300_1: samukhena, tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena ca suṭṭhu vinimuttasaṅkhārassa paramassāsabhāvena,
tika-abh02t:1300_2: gatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte. “Nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Ṭhitibhāvenāti
tika-abh02t:1300_3: ca pāṭho. Taṃsacchikaraṇābhāveti tassa nibbānassa sacchikaraṇābhāve. Nītoti pāpito, pakāsitoti attho.
tika-abh02t:1301_0: Cuṇṇitanti bheditaṃ. Tvameva kiṃ na jānāsīti kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsiyevāti attho. “Kiṃ
tika-abh02t:1301_1: tvaṃ ekaṃ nānaṃ jānāsi, kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi evā”ti evaṃ vikkhepaṃ karontaṃ paravādiṃ
tika-abh02t:1301_2: “nanu ñāte”tiādinā sakavādī nibandhati. Vibhajitvāti “rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā”ti
tika-abh02t:1301_3: bhāvatthaṃ vibhajitvā. Rāgādīnaṃ khayā na hontīti yojanā. Sasabhāvatā ca nibbānassa
tika-abh02t:1302: Nibbānārammaṇakaraṇena kāraṇabhūtena. Hetuatthe hi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Kilesakkhayamattataṃ vā nibbānassa icchato kilesakkhayena bhavitabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t:1303_0: Evaṃ kilesakkhayamatte nibbāne khepetabbā kilesā bahuvidhā nānappakārā, maggo ca
tika-abh02t:1303_1: odhiso kilese khepeti. Svāyaṃ “katamaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā katame
tika-abh02t:1303_2: kilese khepetī”ti purimapucchādvayameva vadati. Tadevāti yaṃ “avijjātaṇhānaṃ kiñci
tika-abh02t:1304: Ettha ca yāyaṃ “kilesakkhayova nibbāna”nti nibbānassa abhāvatācodanā, tatrāyaṃ āgamato yuttito cassa bhāvābhāvavibhāvanā. Tañhi bhagavatā –
tika-abh02t:1306: “Atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo”ti –
tika-abh02t:1308: “Gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti –
tika-abh02t:1309_0: “Asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ, anataṃ, anāsavaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1309_1: saccaṃ, pāraṃ, nipuṇaṃ, sududdasaṃ, ajajjaraṃ, dhuvaṃ, apalokitaṃ, anidassanaṃ, nippapañcaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1309_2: santaṃ, amataṃ, paṇītaṃ, sivaṃ, khemaṃ, taṇhākkhayaṃ, acchariyaṃ, abbhutaṃ, anītikaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1309_3: anītikadhammaṃ, nibbānaṃ, abyābajjhaṃ, virāgaṃ, suddhiṃ, muttiṃ, anālayaṃ, dīpaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1309_4: leṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ, parāyaṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi parāyaṇagāminiñca paṭipada”nti –
tika-abh02t:1310_0: Evamādīhi ca suttapadehi “appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā, sabbañca rūpaṃ asaṅkhatā
tika-abh02t:1310_1: ca dhātū”tiādīhi abhidhammapadesehi ca paramatthabhāveneva desitaṃ. Na hi sabhāvavirahitassa
tika-abh02t:1310_2: abhāvamattassa gambhīrāsaṅkhatādibhāvo abyākatadhammādibhāvo ca yutto, vutto ca so.
tika-abh02t:1311_0: Api cāyaṃ abhāvavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo – yadi kilesābhāvo nibbānaṃ, svāyamabhāvo eko
tika-abh02t:1311_1: vā siyā aneko vā? Yadi eko, ekeneva maggena kato sacchikato ca hotīti uparimānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1311_2: maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati. Na hi ekaṃ anekehi kammappavattehi sādhetabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1311_3: Atha siyā ekova so kilesābhāvo, na pana maggehi kātabbo, atha kho sacchikātabboti.
tika-abh02t:1311_4: Evaṃ sati suṭṭhutaraṃ maggassa niratthakatā āpajjati kilesānaṃ appahānato. Akaronto
tika-abh02t:1311_5: ca maggo kilesābhāvaṃ tassa sacchikiriyāya kamatthaṃ sādheyya, atha maggānaṃ saṃyojanattayappahānādipaṭiniyatakiccatāya
tika-abh02t:1311_6: pahāyakavibhāgena kilesābhāvabhedo, evaṃ sati vinā sabhāvabhedaṃ bahubhāvo natthīti
tika-abh02t:1311_7: bahubhāvatāpadesenassa sasabhāvatā āpannā. Athāpi siyā “yesaṃ abhāvo, tesaṃ bahubhāvena
tika-abh02t:1311_8: bahubhāvopacāro”ti, evaṃ sati yesaṃ abhāvo, tesaṃ sabhāvatāya sasabhāvopacāropi siyā.
tika-abh02t:1311_9: Tathā tesaṃ kilesasaṅkhatāditāya kilesasaṅkhatādibhāvā ca siyuṃ, na cetaṃ yuttanti
tika-abh02t:1311_10: na tesaṃ bahubhāvopacāro yutto. Ekabhāvopi cassa asabhāvatāya eva vattuṃ na sakkāti
tika-abh02t:1311_11: ce? Na, abhāvasāmaññato, abhāvasāmaññena abhedasamaññāya ekattaniddeso. Sati ca ekatte
tika-abh02t:1312_0: Bahubhāve ca sasabhāvatā siddhā. Yadipi siyā yathā bahubhāvo sasabhāvataṃ, evaṃ sāmaññena
tika-abh02t:1312_1: sasabhāvatā bahubhāvaṃ na byabhicareyyāti sasabhāvapakkhepi nibbānassa bahubhāvo
tika-abh02t:1312_2: āpajjatīti? Taṃ na, kasmā? Tathā sāmaññābhedato. Na hi evaṃ vattuṃ labbhā yathā kharabhāvo
tika-abh02t:1312_3: sasabhāvataṃ na byabhicarati, evaṃ sasabhāvatāpi kharabhāvaṃ na byabhicareyyāti.
tika-abh02t:1312_4: Evañhi sati tadaññasabbadhammābhāvappasaṅgo siyā, tasmā bahubhāvo sasabhāvatāpekkho,
tika-abh02t:1312_5: na sasabhāvatā bahubhāvāpekkhāti na sasabhāvassa nibbānassa bahubhāvāpatti. “Ekañhi
tika-abh02t:1312_6: saccaṃ na dutīyamatthi, ekā niṭṭhā na puthuniṭṭhā”tiādivacanato.
tika-abh02t:1313_0: Api cettha kilesābhāvo nāma rāgādīnaṃ samucchedo accantappahānaṃ anuppādanirodho.
tika-abh02t:1313_1: Tassa ca ekatte ekeneva maggena sādhetabbatā kiccavisesābhāvatoti dassanādimaggavibhāgo
tika-abh02t:1313_2: na siyā. Icchito ca so odhisova kilesānaṃ pahātabbattā. So ca maggavibhāgo saddhādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1313_4: sacchikiriyāvisesena hotīti nibbānassa sasabhāvatāyayeva yutto. Abhāvo pana kilesānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1313_5: maggena kātabbo siyā “mā maggassa niratthakatā ahosī”ti, na sacchikātabbo. Ko hi
tika-abh02t:1313_6: tassa sabhāvo, yo tena sacchikariyeyya. So ca kilesābhāvo ekeneva maggena sādhetabbo
tika-abh02t:1313_7: siyā, na catūhi “mā catubhāvanibbānatāpatti, nibbānavisesāpatti ca ahosī”ti. Tato
tika-abh02t:1314_0: Yadi ca abhāvo bhāvassa siyāti tassa bhāvadhammatā icchitā, evaṃ sati yathā saṅkhatadhammassa
tika-abh02t:1314_1: tassa jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ viya saṅkhatadhammatāpi āpannā, evaṃ bahūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dhammassa
tika-abh02t:1314_2: tassa bahubhāvādippasaṅgopi dunnivāroti ataṃsabhāvassa asaṅkhatassekassa sasabhāvassa
tika-abh02t:1315_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti vuttanti? Khayena adhigantabbattā.
tika-abh02t:1315_1: Khayo hi ariyamaggo. Yathāha “khaye ñāṇaṃ, anuppāde ñāṇa”nti. Tena rāgādikkhayapariyāyena
tika-abh02t:1315_2: ariyamaggena adhigantabbato “paramatthaṃ gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ duddasaṃ duranubodhaṃ
tika-abh02t:1315_3: nibbānaṃ rāgādikkhayo”ti vuttaṃ. Rāgādippahānamukhena vā tathā pattabbato, yathā
tika-abh02t:1316_0: Apica yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t:1316_1: nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ sasabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena
tika-abh02t:1316_2: tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Yañca tannissaraṇaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu.
tika-abh02t:1316_3: Kiñca bhiyyo – saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese tadaṅgavasena
tika-abh02t:1316_4: pajahati, na samucchedavasena pajahituṃ sakkoti. Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu
tika-abh02t:1316_5: ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati, na samucchedavasena. Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa,
tika-abh02t:1316_6: sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ
tika-abh02t:1316_8: bhavitabbaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Tathā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti
tika-abh02t:1316_9: idaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakaṃ vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
tika-abh02t:1316_10: Yañhi bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ aviparītatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe
tika-abh02t:1316_11: saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā”ti, tathā nibbāna-saddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo
tika-abh02t:1316_12: upacāravuttisabbhāvato seyyathāpi sīha-saddo. Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatā
tika-abh02t:1316_13: dhātu itaratabbiparītavimuttisabhāvattā seyyathāpi “pathavīdhātu vedanā cā”ti evamādīhi
tika-abh02t:1316_14: nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t:1324_0: 172. Abhidhamme ca āgatāti imasmiṃ dhātuvibhaṅge abhidhammabhājanīyapañhapucchakesu,
tika-abh02t:1324_1: nikkhepakaṇḍadhammahadayavibhaṅgādīsu ca desanāruḷhā. Yathā pana suttante abhidhamme
tika-abh02t:1324_2: ca āgatā khandhādayo suttante desitaniyāmena khandhavibhaṅgādīsu suttantabhājanīyavasena
tika-abh02t:1324_3: vibhattā, evamidhāpi cakkhudhātādayo suttantabhājanīyavasena vibhajitabbā siyuṃ.
tika-abh02t:1324_4: Tattha khandhādīnaṃ sabbasaṅgāhako abhidhammadesanāvisiṭṭho suttante āgato añño desetabbākāro
tika-abh02t:1324_5: natthīti te rūpakkhandhādivaseneva suttantabhājanīye desitā, dhātūnaṃ pana so atthīti
tika-abh02t:1324_6: te tiṇṇaṃ dhātuchakkānaṃ vasena idha desitāti dassento āha “suttantesveva…pe… vibhattanti
tika-abh02t:1324_7: veditabba”nti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1325_0: Kathaṃ pana chasu chasu dhātūsu aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavarodhoti? Sabhāvanissayadvārārammaṇasampayogasāmaññato.
tika-abh02t:1325_1: Tattha paṭhamachakke tāva pathavītejovāyodhātuyo sabhāvato phoṭṭhabbadhātu. Āpodhātuākāsadhātuyo
tika-abh02t:1325_2: dhammadhātuekadeso. Viññāṇadhātu sattaviññāṇadhātuyo. Catudhātuggahaṇena cettha tadāyattavuttikā
tika-abh02t:1325_3: nissayāpadesena, viññāṇadhātuyā dvārārammaṇabhāvena vā avasiṭṭhā rūpadhātuyo samavaruddhā,
tika-abh02t:1325_5: daṭṭhabbo. Dutiye chapi dhātuyo sabhāvato, dhammāyatanekadeso, taṃsampayogato sattaviññāṇadhātuyo,
tika-abh02t:1325_6: yathārahaṃ tesaṃ nissayadvārārammaṇabhāvato avasiṭṭhadhātuyo samavaruddhā. Tatiyachakkepi
tika-abh02t:1325_7: eseva nayo. Evamettha chasu chasu dhātūsu aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavarodho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t:1325_8: Tena vuttaṃ “sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1326_0: Suññoti attasuñño, tena sasabhāvatāya ca idha dhātuvohāroti āha “suññe sabhāvamatte
tika-abh02t:1326_1: niruḷho dhātusaddo”ti. Taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyantova ākāsoti yehi vivitto,
tika-abh02t:1326_2: yesañca paricchedo, tehi asamphuṭṭhatā tesaṃ byāpakabhāve sati na hotīti āha “catūhi
tika-abh02t:1327: 173. Avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci natthīti purimatthaṃ asambhāvento “dve eva vā”tiādinā samudāyena vinā dutiyatthamāha. Paccattaṃ attani jātatanti pāṭipuggalikataṃ.
tika-abh02t:1328: Pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti vā lomādiitarakoṭṭhāsehi asammisso visuṃ eko pathavīkoṭṭhāsoti attho.
tika-abh02t:1329: Payoganti bhāvanāpayogaṃ. Vīriyanti bhāvanānipphādakaṃ ussāhaṃ. Āyūhananti tādisaṃ cetanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1330_1: Abyāpāratāyāti “ahametaṃ nipphādemi, mama esā nipphādanā”ti cetanārahitatāya. Karontīti
tika-abh02t:1331: Lakkhaṇavasenāti sabhāvavasena. So pana yasmā pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷakharatā hotīti āha “kakkhaḷaṃ kharigatantiādivacanaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh02t:1332_0: Vekantakaṃ nāma sabbalohacchedanasamatthaṃ lohaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ vikantati chindatīti
tika-abh02t:1332_1: vikantaṃ, vikantameva vekantakanti vuccati. Lohasadisanti lohākāraṃ lohamalaṃ viya
tika-abh02t:1332_2: ghanasahitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Tāpetvā tāḷitaṃ pana chinnaṃ chinnaṃ hutvā visarati,
tika-abh02t:1332_3: mudu maṭṭhaṃ kammaniyaṃ vā na hoti, tena “lohavijātī”ti vuccatīti. Tiputambādīhīti
tika-abh02t:1332_4: tiputambe missetvā kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ, sīsatambe missetvā kataṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ, jasadatambe
tika-abh02t:1332_5: missetvā kataṃ ārakūṭaṃ. Yaṃ pana kevalaṃ jasadadhātuviniggataṃ, yaṃ “pittala”ntipi
tika-abh02t:1332_6: vadanti, taṃ idha nādhippetaṃ, yathāvuttamissakameva pana gahetvā “kittima”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1333_0: Nidassanamattanti muttānaṃ jātito anekabhedattā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi hatthikumbhaṃ varāhadāṭhaṃ
tika-abh02t:1333_1: bhujaṅgasīsaṃ valāhakūṭaṃ veṇupabbaṃ macchasiro saṅkho sippīti aṭṭha muttāyoniyo.
tika-abh02t:1333_2: Tattha hatthikumbhajā pītavaṇṇā pabhāhīnā. Varāhadāṭhajā varāhadāṭhavaṇṇāva. Bhujaṅgasīsajā
tika-abh02t:1333_3: nīlādivaṇṇā suvisuddhā, vaṭṭalā ca. Valāhakajā bhāsurā dubbibhāgarūpā rattibhāge
tika-abh02t:1333_4: andhakāraṃ vidhamantā tiṭṭhanti, devūpabhogā eva honti. Veṇupabbajā kāraphalasamānavaṇṇā,
tika-abh02t:1333_5: na bhāsurā, te ca veḷavo amanussagocare eva padese jāyanti. Macchasīsajā pāṭhīnapiṭṭhisamānavaṇṇā,
tika-abh02t:1333_6: vaṭṭalā, laghavo ca honti pabhāvihīnā, te ca macchā samuddamajjheyeva jāyanti. Saṅkhajā
tika-abh02t:1333_7: saṅkhoracchavivaṇṇā, kolappamāṇāpi honti pabhāvihīnāva. Sippijā pana pabhāvisesayuttāva
tika-abh02t:1333_8: honti nānāsaṇṭhānā. Evaṃ jātito aṭṭhavidhāsu muttāsu yā macchasaṅkhasippijā, tā sāmuddikā.
tika-abh02t:1333_9: Bhujaṅgajāpi kāci sāmuddikāti vadanti, itarā asāmuddikā. Tena vuttaṃ “sāmuddikamuttāti
tika-abh02t:1333_10: nidassanamattametaṃ, sabbāpi pana muttā muttā evā”ti. Bahulato vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ etaṃ
tika-abh02t:1333_11: vuttaṃ “muttāti sāmuddikamuttā”ti. Bahulañhi loke sāmuddikāva muttā dissanti. Tatthāpi
tika-abh02t:1334: 174. Idha natthi niyamo kevalaṃ dravabhāvasseva adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t:1335_1: idha nisitabhāvo. Pākatikoti sābhāviko kāyusmāti adhippeto. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ yāva
tika-abh02t:1335_2: jīvitindriyaṃ pavattati. Petaggi nijjhāmataṇhikapetaggi. Idhāti bāhiratejodhātukathāyaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1336: 176. Vāyanaṃ bījanaṃ, taṃ pana thāmasā pavattīti āha “savegagamanavasenā”ti. Samudīraṇaṃ allaparisosanaṃ, bhūtasaṅghātassa desantaruppattihetubhāvo vā.
tika-abh02t:1337: 177. Bhitticchiddādivasena labbhamānaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ nissāyeva paricchedākāsassa parikammakaraṇanti āha “ajaṭākāsassa ca kathitata”nti.
tika-abh02t:1338_1: paccayabhāvena. Kassa pana so paccayabhāvoti āha “sarīraṭṭhakautussā”ti. Paccayabhāvenāti
tika-abh02t:1338_2: ca hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Tena hi kāraṇabhūtena sukhadukkhaphoṭṭhabbānaṃ yathāvuttasamatthatā
tika-abh02t:1338_4: Evanti attano phalūpacārasiddhena pharaṇappakārena. Etesanti sukhādīnaṃ. “Oḷārikappavatti
tika-abh02t:1338_5: eva vā pharaṇa”nti iminā nirupacāraṃ etesaṃ pharaṇaṭṭhaṃ dasseti. Ubhayavatoti sukhadukkhavato,
tika-abh02t:1339_0: 181. Ettha vuttaṃ saṅkappanti etasmiṃ “saṅkappo kāmo”tiādike niddesapadese vuttaṃ
tika-abh02t:1339_1: saṅkappaṃ. Tattha hi kilesakāmova “saṅkapparāgo purisassa kāmo”tiādīsu viya. Vatthukāmassa
tika-abh02t:1339_2: tathā tathā saṅkappanato parikappanato “saṅkappo”ti vutto, na vitakkoti ayamettha
tika-abh02t:1339_3: attho vutto. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana vitakkavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sopi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāpi
tika-abh02t:1339_4: purimo evattho adhippetoti ce, sampiṇḍanattho pi-saddo niratthako siyā, “kilesasanthavasambhavato”ti
tika-abh02t:1339_5: ca na vattabbaṃ siyā, parato ca “byāpādavacanena byāpādavitakkaṃ dassetī”ti vakkhati.
tika-abh02t:1339_6: Kilesakāmo vibhatto kilesasampayuttattāti adhippāyo. Kāmapaṭibaddhāti ettha kāma-saddena
tika-abh02t:1340_0: 182. Ubhayattha uppannoti sattesu, saṅkhāresūti ubhayattha uppanno, sattākāro, saṅkhārākāroti
tika-abh02t:1340_1: vā ārammaṇassa ubhayākāraggahaṇavasena uppanno. Kammapathaviseso, kammapathavināsako
tika-abh02t:1340_2: ca kammapathabhedoti dassetuṃ “abhijjhāsaṃyogenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathā vihiṃsāya vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ
tika-abh02t:1340_3: dassetīti yojanā. Vihiṃsāyāti ca vihiṃsāvacanenāti attho. Yathāsambhavaṃ pāṇātipātādivasenāti
tika-abh02t:1340_5: saṅgāhakehi kāmanekkhammadhātūhi. Dve dveti byāpādavihiṃsādhātuyo, abyāpādaavihiṃsādhātuyo
tika-abh02t:1340_6: ca. “Etthāti panā”tiādinā saṃkilesavodānānaṃ saṅkarabhāvassa aniṭṭhāpajjanassa ca
tika-abh02t:1343_0: 183. Āveṇikattho atisayattho ca visesasaddo hotīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “puggalantarāsādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1343_1: nīlādisabbarūpasādhāraṇañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Asādhāraṇakāraṇenāpi hi niddeso hoti yathā
tika-abh02t:1343_3: ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti. Dhātuattho evāti “dhātu”iti imassa
tika-abh02t:1343_4: dhātusaddasseva attho. Dhātuvacanīyo hi attho upasaggena jotīyati.
tika-abh02t:1344: Purimena asadiso vidhānadhāraṇatthānaṃ pākaṭo bhedoti. Visabhāgalakkhaṇā visadisasabhāvā avayavā bhāgā, tesu.
tika-abh02t:1345_1: anantarādināpi, itarassa sabbāpi upanissayakoṭiyāva. Dhammadhātu pana vedanādikā
tika-abh02t:1345_2: sahajātā sahajātādinā, asahajātā anantarādinā, upanissayena ārammaṇādinā ca manoviññāṇassa
tika-abh02t:1345_3: paccayoti evaṃ manodhātudhammadhātūnaṃ manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-abh02t:1345_4: Dvārabhūtamanopi sutte “manodhātū”ti vuccatīti āha “dvārabhūtamanovasena vā”ti. Tassā
tika-abh02t:1345_5: manodhātuyā manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabboti sambandho.
tika-abh02t:1346: Purimanayenāti visesanaṃ dutiyanayassa hīnattikavaseneva vibhattattā. Nānādhātūnañca cakkhudhātuādīnanti sambandho.
tika-abh02t:1347_0: Na hi dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo santi aṭṭhārasadhātuvibhāgadassaneti adhippāyo. Khandhāyatanadhātindriyānaṃyeva
tika-abh02t:1347_1: vasena saṅkhepādivibhāgadassanaṃ tesaṃ bahulaṃ pariññeyyadhammasaṅgaṇhanato. Saccadesanā
tika-abh02t:1348_0: Nijjīvassātiādi visesato sattasuññatādīpanatthā dhātudesanāti katvā vuttaṃ. Purimanayo
tika-abh02t:1348_1: aññesampi kamavuttīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ sambhavatīti adhippāyena vuttoti “manodhātuyeva vā”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1348_2: dutiyanayo vutto. Tattha avijjamānepi purecarānucarabhāveti purecarānucarābhisandhiyā
tika-abh02t:1348_3: abhāvepi kevalaṃ anantarapubbakālaanantarāparakālatāya manodhātu purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbāti vuttā.
tika-abh02t:1349_0: “Aññaṃ aggahetvā pavattituṃ asamatthatāyā”ti etena viññāṇassa ekantasārammaṇatādassanena
tika-abh02t:1349_1: “ārammaṇena vinā sayameva nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatī”ti evaṃ pavattitaṃ viññāṇavādaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh02t:1351_0: Cakkhādi ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpādi pana anekameva saṃhatanti imassa
tika-abh02t:1351_1: vā atthavisesassa dassanatthaṃ cakkhurūpādīsu vacanabhedo kato. Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1351_2: cakkhādi ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpādi pana anekamevāti? Paccayabhāvavisesato.
tika-abh02t:1351_3: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ
tika-abh02t:1351_4: atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati abhāvato, yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa
tika-abh02t:1351_5: paccayo hotīti vuccatīti. Taṃnissayatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā
tika-abh02t:1351_6: arūpabhāvato, atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
tika-abh02t:1351_7: Itare ca paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā. Svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na
tika-abh02t:1351_8: sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “cakkhuñca
tika-abh02t:1352_0: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ
tika-abh02t:1352_1: uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā, tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā
tika-abh02t:1352_2: paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato. Yañhi paccayadhammaṃ sabhāvabhūtaṃ, parikappitākāramattaṃ
tika-abh02t:1352_3: vā viññāṇaṃ vibhāventaṃ pavattati, tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvato
tika-abh02t:1352_4: yaṃ kiñci anālambitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa olubbha pavattikāraṇatāya ālambanīyato
tika-abh02t:1352_5: ārammaṇaṃ nāma. Tassa yasmā yathā yathā sabhāvūpaladdhi viññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
tika-abh02t:1352_6: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati.
tika-abh02t:1352_7: Sā cassa indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavaseneva
tika-abh02t:1352_8: hoti, nāpi katipayakalāpavaṇṇavasena, atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti
tika-abh02t:1352_9: anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassento bhagavā “rūpe
tika-abh02t:1353_0: Yaṃ pana “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā, taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena
tika-abh02t:1353_1: paccayo”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti? Tampi yādisaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo,
tika-abh02t:1353_2: tādisameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kīdisaṃ pana tanti? Samuditanti pākaṭoyamattho. Evañca
tika-abh02t:1353_4: na dabyasallakkhaṇavasenā”ti, taṃ yuttameva hoti. Na cettha samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā
tika-abh02t:1353_5: samudāyābhogasseva abhāvato, samuditā pana vaṇṇadhammā ārammaṇapaccayā honti. Kathaṃ
tika-abh02t:1353_6: pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇā honti, na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā
tika-abh02t:1353_7: andhā samuditā passantīti? Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ asamatthānaṃ sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya
tika-abh02t:1353_8: dassanato. Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā, tasmiṃyeva
tika-abh02t:1353_9: ṭhāne samuditānaṃ taṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā paribyattā. Etena
tika-abh02t:1353_10: kiṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paramāṇurūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, udāhu taṃsamudāyotiādikā codanā paṭikkhittā
tika-abh02t:1353_11: veditabbā. “Sotañca paṭicca sadde cā”tiādīsupi ayameva nayo.
tika-abh02t:1354_0: Evampi attho labbhatīti “manodhātuyāpī”ti pi-saddena na kevalaṃ javanapariyosānā
tika-abh02t:1354_1: manoviññāṇadhātuyeva sampiṇḍīyati, atha kho tadārammaṇabhavaṅgasaṅkhātāpi sampiṇḍīyatīti
tika-abh02t:1354_2: evampi attho labbhati, sambhavatīti attho. Evaṃ satīti evaṃ aññamanodhātuppavattiyā
tika-abh02t:1354_3: oraṃ pavattacittānaṃ manoviññāṇadhātutādassane sati. Satipi manaso sambhūtabhāve
tika-abh02t:1354_4: manodhātuyā manoviññāṇadhātubhāvappasaṅgo na hotiyeva taṃsabhāvasseva manoviññāṇadhātubhāvena
tika-abh02t:1354_7: manodhātukiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuādīhi paricchinnena uppajjanaṭṭhānena ca. Idāni ekattaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1354_8: vināpi yathāvuttassa atthassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “anupanītepī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh02t:1354_9: sāmaññavasenāti sadisatāvasena. Tassāti bhavaṅgānantaraṃ uppannacittassa. Amanoviññāṇadhātubhāvāsiddhitoti
tika-abh02t:1354_11: uppajjati cittaṃ…pe… tajjā manoviññāṇadhātū”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhavaṅgānantaraṃ uppannacittassa
tika-abh02t:1354_12: manodhātubhāvaṃ sādheti. Siddhe hi manodhātubhāve taṃ tassa nivattakaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t:1354_13: Manoviññāṇadhātuyā pana uppannassa cittassa manoviññāṇadhātubhāvadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1354_14: tādisāya manodhātuyāpi manoviññāṇadhātubhāvameva dīpeyyāti kathaṃ tassā nivattakaṃ
tika-abh02t:1354_15: siyāti āha “na hi yaṃ codīyati, tadeva parihārāya hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t:1355_0: Yadi evaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanassa manoviññāṇadhātubhāvāpatti evāti codanaṃ manasi katvā
tika-abh02t:1355_1: āha “manodhātuyāpī”tiādi. Pañcaviññāṇehi manodhātūhi ca visiṭṭho sabhāvo pañcaviññāṇa…pe…
tika-abh02t:1355_2: sabhāvo, tassa vasena. Cutipaṭisandhibhavaṅgānanti tadārammaṇampi bhavaṅgantogadhaṃ
tika-abh02t:1355_3: katvā vuttaṃ. Javanāvasānānīti vā javanārammaṇattā tadārammaṇampi gahitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1356_0: Visuṃ kātuṃ yuttanti āvajjanampi yadipi rūpādivisayaṃ hoti, javanaṃ viya ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1356_1: pana na hotīti edise ṭhāne visuṃ kātabbameva. Mano cāti ca-saddo “manañca paṭiccā”tiādīsu
tika-abh02t:1356_2: viya na sampiṇḍanattho, atha kho byatirekattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t:1359_2: taṃ taṃ samudāyaṃ ekekaṃ dhammaṃ katvā”tiādinā tadatthassa khandhavibhaṅgavaṇṇanādīsu vuttanayattā.
tika-abh02t:1365_1: Saccesu kamatīti saccesu visayabhūtesu pavattati. Desetabbatthavisayā hi desanāti.
tika-abh02t:1365_2: Etesu kamatīti etesu ariyasaccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattati. “Sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhāta”nti
tika-abh02t:1365_3: vuttaṃ atthasabhāvaṃ kamanakiriyāya kattubhāvena gahitanti pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ
tika-abh02t:1365_4: “kiṃ kamatī”ti pucchati. Tabbohārenāti tadupacārena. Etena nippariyāyena atthasabhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t:1366_0: Taṃsabhāvāti dukkhādisabhāvā. Amusāsabhāvāti bādhanādibhāvena bhūtasabhāvā. Aññākārarahitāti
tika-abh02t:1366_2: kilesadāho. Santānassa avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ puggalahiṃsanaṃ. Attano eva tikhiṇabhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1366_3: saṅkhatadhammassa attano sabhāveneva rujāvahatikkhabhāvo. Sarasenevāti sabhāveneva.
tika-abh02t:1366_4: Sampiṇḍakassa samudayassa, kilesasantāparahitassa maggassa, avipariṇāmassa nirodhassa
tika-abh02t:1366_5: dassanena yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dukkhassa saṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhā āvi bhavantīti āha
tika-abh02t:1366_7: nānārammaṇesu ca visaṭā hutvā. Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ “ūhanaṃ rāsikaraṇa”nti vatvā
tika-abh02t:1366_8: puna tadatthaṃ vivarati “dukkhanibbattana”nti. Ekavokārabhavepi hi rāsibhūtameva
tika-abh02t:1366_9: dukkhaṃ nibbattati anekadhammasamūhato, pageva catupañcavokārabhavesu. Ettha ca byāpanatthaṃ
tika-abh02t:1366_10: ākāraṃ, tassa ca ya-kārāgamaṃ katvā sampiṇḍanatthaṃ āyūhananti padaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1366_11: Nidadātīti dukkhassa ekantakāraṇattā taṃ nidassentaṃ viya janetīti dassento “idaṃ
tika-abh02t:1366_12: taṃ dukkha”ntiādimāha. Dukkha…pe… āvi bhavati rogadassanena viya roganidānaṃ. Saṃyoga…pe…
tika-abh02t:1366_13: dassanehīti saṃyogaṭṭho visaṃyogasabhāvassa nirodhassa, palibodhaṭṭho niyyānasabhāvassa
tika-abh02t:1366_14: maggassa dassanena āvi bhavatīti attho. Teti saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā.
tika-abh02t:1367_0: Etthāti etasmiṃ ārammaṇabhūte sati. Samudayato viveko vivekaṭṭho. Nirodho ca taṇhākkhayabhāvato
tika-abh02t:1367_1: samudayato vivitto, tasmā avivekabhūtassa samudayassa dassanena nirodhassa vivekaṭṭho
tika-abh02t:1367_2: āvi bhavati, nibbānādhigamahetubhūtassāpi maggassa sappaccayatāya saṅkhatabhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t:1367_3: passato appaccayassa nirodhassa asaṅkhataṭṭho āvi bhavati, tathā maraṇadhammatāya
tika-abh02t:1367_4: dukkhaṃ vinassantaṃ passato amaraṇadhammassa nirodhassa amataṭṭho āvi bhavatīti imamatthaṃ
tika-abh02t:1367_6: “nāyaṃ hetu nibbānādhigamāya, ayaṃ pana hetū”ti hetuṭṭho āvi bhavati. Tathā paramagambhīrassa
tika-abh02t:1367_7: nipuṇatarassa duddasassa nirodhassa dassanena dassanaṭṭho sukhumarūpadassanena cakkhuno
tika-abh02t:1367_8: viya, dukkhadassanena pana anekarogāturakapaṇajanadassanena issarajanassa uḷārabhāvo
tika-abh02t:1368_0: Te panete hetuṭṭhādike sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha palibodhupacchedavasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1368_2: vacanatoti yasmā satipi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti
tika-abh02t:1368_3: evamādi na vuttaṃ, “maggādhipatino dhammā” icceva pana vuttaṃ. Tasmā sātisayo maggaṅgadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1368_4: ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo. Tenāha “visesato vā ārammaṇādhipatibhūtā maggaṅgadhammā hontī”ti.
tika-abh02t:1368_5: So tesaṃ ākāroti yo maggaṅgānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1368_6: ārammaṇādhipatipaccayatāsaṅkhāto ākāro, so maggassa ādhipateyyaṭṭho. Purimo pana
tika-abh02t:1368_8: paṭivijjhitabbatāya ekajjhaṃ katvā vadati. Tena abhisamayasaddaṃ kammatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1368_9: Abhisamayassāti ñāṇassa. Pavattiākāroti parijānanādivisesākāro. So hi maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1368_10: asammohato siddho, pacchā paccavekkhaṇādinā pākaṭo hoti. Ākāropi ñāṇena araṇīyato
tika-abh02t:1368_11: atthoti vuccatīti katvā tatiyanayo dassito. Pīḷanādinā dassito visayavibhāgenapi
tika-abh02t:1369_0: Kucchitaṃ khanti garahitaṃ hutvā asāraṃ. “Samāgamo”tiādinā anvayato byatirekato ca
tika-abh02t:1369_2: ita-saddassa ca payoge uppattiatthassa anupalabbhanato, u-saddassa ca payoge upalabbhanato
tika-abh02t:1369_3: so uppattiatthaṃ dīpetīti āha “evaṃ uppannaṃ uditanti etthāpī”ti. Visuṃ payujjamānāti
tika-abh02t:1369_4: āgama-ita-padehi vinā payujjamānā. Sadhātukanti antonītena dhātunā sadhātukaṃ. Teneva
tika-abh02t:1370_0: Dukkhavivekabhāvanti dukkhavivittataṃ. Nivattiyāti nibbānassa. Nivattetvāti anuppādasaddena
tika-abh02t:1370_1: visesanavasena nivattetvā. Nirodhapaccayatā nirodhassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayatā.
tika-abh02t:1370_3: ca. Phalanti ariyaphalaṃ. Tassāti niṭṭhānabhūtāya phalasaṅkhātāya dukkhanirodhappattiyā
tika-abh02t:1371: Paṭivijjhanakāle nippariyāyena buddhādisamaññāti āha “paṭividdhakāle pavatta”nti. Tato evāti tena pakāsitattā eva.
tika-abh02t:1372_0: Tannimittabhāvoti jātiādi viya adhiṭṭhānabhāvena dukkhassa kāraṇabhāvo, na samudayasaccaṃ
tika-abh02t:1372_1: viya pabhavabhāvena. Udayabbayapīḷitabhāvo saṅkhāradukkhatā. Pavattanamevāti pavatti
tika-abh02t:1372_2: eva. Kiccaṃ rasoti rasassa kiccatthataṃ dasseti. Pavattinivattīsūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1373_0: Marīcimāyāattānanti marīciyā māyāya attano ca ariyañāṇassāti ariyānaṃ ñāṇassa. Tena
tika-abh02t:1373_1: ariyānaṃ maggañāṇānusārena pavattanakañāṇampi saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “avitathagāhakassā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t:1373_3: gocarabhāvo, itarassa ārammaṇabhāvo. Paṭivijjhitabbatā, ārammaṇabhāvo vā paṭivedhañāṇassa
tika-abh02t:1374_0: Bādhakappabhavabhāvenāti bādhakassa uppādakabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā na taṇhā bādhakabhāvena
tika-abh02t:1374_1: gahitā pavattipavattihetūnaṃ asaṅkaravasena bodhanato. Evañca katvā abhidhammabhājanīyepi
tika-abh02t:1374_2: ayamatthavaṇṇanā yujjateva. Yadipi evaṃ “dukkhameva bādhaka”nti niyamānupapatti,
tika-abh02t:1374_3: samudayabhāvappasaṅgo cāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “jātiādīnaṃ viya vā”tiādi. Bādhakattassa
tika-abh02t:1374_4: bādhakatte ca niyamoti āha “dvidhāpi bādhakatthāvadhāraṇenā”ti. Yathā hi bādhakattassa
tika-abh02t:1374_5: dukkhe niyatatā, evaṃ dukkhassa ca bādhakatte niyatatāti. Suttantabhājanīye taṇhāya
tika-abh02t:1374_6: eva samudayabhāvassa dassitattā taṇhāvasena niyamaṃ dassento “na taṇhāya vinā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t:1374_7: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā hesāti. “Kusalehi vinā”tiādinā dukkhahetutāya taṇhāya padhānabhāvamāha.
tika-abh02t:1374_8: Tathā hi sā kammavicittatāya hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī visesena kammassa sahakārikāraṇaṃ
tika-abh02t:1374_9: hotīti. Dvidhāpi niyamenāti maggova niyyānaṃ, niyyānameva ca maggoti dvippakārena niyamena.
tika-abh02t:1375_0: Vacīsaccaṃ saccavācā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā cāti āha “viratisacceti musāvādaviratiya”nti.
tika-abh02t:1375_1: Keci pana “viratisaccaṃ samādānaviratī”ti vadanti, tesampi na samādānamattaṃ viratisaccaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1375_2: atha kho samādānāvisaṃvādanaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭiññāsaccattā musāvādaviratiyeva hoti.
tika-abh02t:1375_3: Tenāha “na hi aññaviratīsu saccasaddo niruḷho”ti. Satipi dukkhasamudayāvabodhe yāvadeva
tika-abh02t:1375_4: nirodhamaggādhigamatthā paññābhāvanāti pacchimadvayasseva saccatthaṃ sātisayaṃ, tadadhigamassa
tika-abh02t:1375_5: ca avivādahetukaṃ sutte vibhāvitaṃ dassento “tassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t:1376_0: Ṭhānaṃ natthīti attano vādapatiṭṭhāpanakāraṇaṃ natthīti attho. Attabhāvapaṭilābheneva
tika-abh02t:1376_1: sattānaṃ jātiādīnaṃ patti sammukhībhāvo ca jāyatīti āha “sampattatā, paccakkhatā
tika-abh02t:1376_2: ca paṭhamatā”ti. Bhagavato desanākkameneva vā paṭhamāditā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t:1378_0: Dukkhādīnaṃ ariyasaccabhāvassa anurūpaṃ yuttaṃ, ācariyaparamparāgataṃ vā savanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1378_2: ākāraparivitakko. Yathāvitakkitākārassa diṭṭhisaṅkhātāya dassanabhūtāya paññāya nijjhānakkhamanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1378_3: rocanaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti. Ādicco viya pabhāya nirodhaṃ phusati sacchikaroti
tika-abh02t:1378_4: kilesandhakāraṃ viddhaṃseti. Cattāripi saccāni passatīti vuttaṃ “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passatī”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t:1379_0: Kālantaradassananti nānābhisamayaṃ vadati. Ekadassinoti ekasaccadassino. Na yojetabbā
tika-abh02t:1379_1: siyāti yojanāyañca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo āpajjeyya,
tika-abh02t:1379_3: ekadesappahānaṃ āpajjati. Tathā ca sati ekadesasotāpattimaggaṭṭhatā, tadanantarañca
tika-abh02t:1379_4: pattabbena phalena ekadesasotāpannatā ca āpajjati, tasmā na saccānaṃ nānābhisamayo
tika-abh02t:1379_5: yutto. Yathā ca nānābhisamayo na yutto, evaṃ ārammaṇābhisamayopi. Yadi hi ārammaṇakaraṇena
tika-abh02t:1379_6: catusaccābhisamayo icchito, na maggo sayameva attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti aparipuṇṇo
tika-abh02t:1379_7: saccābhisamayo siyā. Aññena maggena maggo ālambīyatīti paripuṇṇovāti ce? Evaṃ sati
tika-abh02t:1379_8: yena maggena maggo ālambito, sopi aññena, sopi aññenāti anavaṭṭhānaṃ siyā, tasmā
tika-abh02t:1379_9: na ārammaṇapaṭivedhato catusaccābhisamayo yutto, vuttanayeneva pana yutto. Kiñca
tika-abh02t:1379_11: na yuttā tato anissaṭabhāvato, sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭaṃ nibbānameva pana ārammaṇatā
tika-abh02t:1379_12: yuttā. Ahetukadiṭṭhi akiriyadiṭṭhiggahaṇena gahitā hetubyāpārova paramatthato kiriyāti katvā.
tika-abh02t:1380: Pavattetīti sajjati, pavattiyā vā hetu hoti. Nivattetīti saṃharati palayaṃ gameti, palokatādivasena vā mokkhahetu hoti. Padhānatoti pakatito, yaṃ “abyatta”ntipi vuccati.
tika-abh02t:1382: Kālo sutte jāgarati, kālo hi duratikkamo”ti. –
tika-abh02t:1383_0: Evaṃvādā kālavādino. “Kaṇṭakassa tikhiṇatā, kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ parimaṇḍalatā, migapakkhisarīsapādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1383_1: vicittabhāvoti evamādayo kena kāritā? Sabhāveneva siddhā, evaṃ sabbampi, na ettha
tika-abh02t:1383_2: kassaci kāmakāro”ti evaṃvādā sabhāvavādino. “Loko niyato acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇisadiso,
tika-abh02t:1383_3: na ettha kassaci purisakāro”ti evaṃpavattavādā niyativādino, –
tika-abh02t:1386_0: Evaṃpavattavādā yadicchāvādisaṅkhātā adhiccasamuppattivādino ca ettha sabhāvavāde
tika-abh02t:1386_1: eva antogadhāti daṭṭhabbā. Aṇūhi loko pavattatīti ājīvakavādaṃ sandhāyāha. So hi
tika-abh02t:1386_2: akāraṇapariggaho. Kaṇādavādo pana issaricchāvasena aṇūnaṃ saṃyogaviyogato lokassa
tika-abh02t:1386_3: pavattinivattiṃ vadati. Padhānassa appavattīti mahatādibhāvena apariṇāmo, anabhibyatti
tika-abh02t:1386_4: vā. “Ahamañño, pakati aññā”ti evaṃ pavattapakatipurisantarajānanena attasukhadukkhamohesu
tika-abh02t:1386_5: avibhāgaggahaṇe nivattite kira vuttanayena padhānaṃ nappavattati, so vimokkhoti kāpilā.
tika-abh02t:1386_6: Evamādīti ādi-saddena mahābrahmuno samīpatā, saṃyogoti evamādīnampi saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t:1387_0: Ekattāti ekabhāvato ekopi vutto. Tayoti kiccavibhāgena. Tānīti sammāvācādisīlāni.
tika-abh02t:1387_1: Chandassa saddahanānukūlāpi chandanavasena pavatti hotīti saddhindriyasaddhābalehi
tika-abh02t:1387_2: saddhiṃ chandiddhipādo vutto. Tādise kāle upekkhānimittānubrūhanena upakārā samādhissa
tika-abh02t:1389_1: pariññeyyādivācakattā eva. Ādipadasaṅgahoti “dukkhaṃ, na ariyasacca”nti iminā catukke
tika-abh02t:1389_2: ādipade saṅgaho. Tadapekkhanti ariyasaccasaddāpekkhaṃ dukkhasaddaṃ. Catutthapadasaṅgahoti
tika-abh02t:1389_3: “neva dukkhaṃ, na ariyasacca”nti iminā padena saṅgaho. Avasesakilesādayoti taṇhāvajjakilesā
tika-abh02t:1389_4: avasesākusalā, sāsavāni kusalamūlāni, sāsavā ca kusaladhammā. Te hi abhidhammabhājanīye
tika-abh02t:1389_5: samudayabhāvena vuttā, na ariyasaccabhāvenāti āha “samudayo, na ariyasacca”nti. Aññāni
tika-abh02t:1389_6: maggaṅgānīti phalasammādiṭṭhiādayo. Iminā nayenāti etthāyaṃ yojanā – atthi samudayo,
tika-abh02t:1389_7: na ariyasaccaṃ, atthi ariyasaccaṃ, na samudayo, atthi samudayo ceva ariyasaccañca,
tika-abh02t:1389_8: atthi neva samudayo, na ariyasaccaṃ. Tattha paṭhamapadaṃ vuttatthaṃ. Nirodho ariyasaccaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1389_9: na samudayo, taṇhā samudayo ceva ariyasaccañca, maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni
tika-abh02t:1389_10: ca yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati, tadabhāvato neva samudayo, na
tika-abh02t:1389_11: ariyasaccaṃ. Itarasaccadvayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ tassa tassa pabhāvakaṭṭhena siyā samudayo,
tika-abh02t:1389_12: na pana yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena. Itaracatukkadvayepi
tika-abh02t:1389_13: ādipadaṃ vuttatthameva. Sesesu samudayo ariyasaccaṃ, na nirodho, asaṅkhatadhātu nirodho
tika-abh02t:1389_14: ceva ariyasaccañca, maggasampayuttā dhammā, sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa sacchikiriyāya
tika-abh02t:1389_15: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena neva nirodho, na ariyasaccaṃ. Itarasaccadvayaṃ
tika-abh02t:1389_16: ariyasaccaṃ, nirodhadhammatāya siyā nirodho, na pana yassa sacchikiriyāya bhagavati
tika-abh02t:1389_17: brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena. Tathā nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na maggo, ariyamaggo
tika-abh02t:1389_18: maggo ceva ariyasaccañca, maggasampayuttā dhammā, sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa bhāvanāya
tika-abh02t:1389_19: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena neva maggo, na ariyasaccaṃ. Itarasaccadvayaṃ
tika-abh02t:1389_20: siyā maggo upapattimaggabhāvato, na pana yassa bhāvanāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1390_0: Santanti samānaṃ. Evaṃ itaresupīti kātabbāpi kiriyā kārakarahitā kevalaṃ attano paccayehi
tika-abh02t:1390_1: tāya pavattamānāya paccayasāmaggī kiriyaṃ karotīti vohāramattaṃ hoti. Nibbutigamakesupi eseva nayo.
tika-abh02t:1391_0: Sāsavatā asubhatā kilesāsucipaggharaṇato. Dukkhādīnanti dukkhasamudayamaggānaṃ. Samudayādibhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1391_1: dukkhassa samudayamaggabhāvo, samudayassa maggadukkhabhāvo, maggassa dukkhasamudayabhāvo
tika-abh02t:1391_2: ca, na pana nirodhabhāvo dukkhādīnanti sambandho. Aññamaññasamaṅgitāti dukkhādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1391_3: itarītarasabhāvayogo. Taṇhāyāti ādhāre bhummaṃ. Punabbhavassāti punabhavasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh02t:1391_4: āyatidukkhassa. Pakativādīnanti kāpilānaṃ. Vikārāti mahatādayo byattā. Vibhāvatoti
tika-abh02t:1391_5: abhibyattito, pariṇāmato vā pubbe. Paṭippalīnā cāti pacchā pakatiyaṃ palayaṃ gatā
tika-abh02t:1391_6: vesammaṃ muñcitvā sattādisamabhāvena anto samoruddhā. Tenāha “pakatibhāveneva tiṭṭhantī”ti.
tika-abh02t:1391_8: Aññathā taṃsampayuttaavijjādīnampi samudayabhāvo labbhatevāti. Avibhattehīti vesammavirahena
tika-abh02t:1391_9: pakatibhāvaṃ gatehi. “Vikārehī”ti sāmaññato vutte “mahantā”tiādinā sarūpato dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1391_10: Tattha mahantoti mahābuddhi. Tañhi kāpilā “mahāajjhāsayo”ti ca voharanti. Rūpatammattādayo
tika-abh02t:1391_11: pañca tammattā, ahaṃkāro cāti cha avisesā. Cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo vācā pāṇi
tika-abh02t:1391_12: pādo pāyu upatthaṃ manoti ekādasindriyāni. Pathavī āpo tejo vāyo ākāsanti pañca bhūtavisesā,
tika-abh02t:1391_13: tehi. “Pakatibhāveneva ṭhitehī”ti iminā “avibhattehī”ti padassa atthaṃ vadati. Sagabbhāti
tika-abh02t:1391_14: sabījā asuññatā. Tantūsūti suttesu samavāyikāraṇabhūtesu. Tathā kapālesu. Tividhañhi
tika-abh02t:1391_15: te kāraṇaṃ vadanti upādānakāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ samavāyikāraṇanti. Tattha turivemasalākādayo
tika-abh02t:1391_16: upādānakāraṇaṃ. Tantavāyo nimittakāraṇaṃ. Tantavo samavāyikāraṇanti. Dvīsu aṇūsūti
tika-abh02t:1391_17: pathavībhūtesu vā āpotejovāyobhūtesu vā dvīsu paramāṇūsu. Idhabuddhivohārajanakoti
tika-abh02t:1391_18: “idha tantūsu paṭo, idha kapālesu ghaṭo, idha bīraṇesu ghaṭo”tiādinā nayena hetuphalānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1391_19: sambandhabhūtena sattānaṃ idhabuddhivohārā jāyanti. So govisāṇānaṃ viya avisuṃ sahasiddhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1391_20: sambandho samavāyo. Khāṇusenānaṃ viya pana visuṃsiddhānaṃ sambandho saṃyogo. Tīsu
tika-abh02t:1391_21: aṇūsu tiaṇukaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ ekībhūtamiva sambandhanti yojanā. “Samaveta”nti etassa
tika-abh02t:1391_23: mahāpathavīādikaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ, yaṃ te “kāriyaṃ drabya”nti vadanti. Yehi kāraṇehi
tika-abh02t:1391_24: āraddhaṃ kāriyadrabyaṃ, tadantogadhāni eva tāni kāraṇāni maññantīti āha “attano antogadhehi
tika-abh02t:1391_25: kāraṇehī”ti. Sati samavāye hetumhi phalaṃ samavetanti phale hetu siyā, taṃ natthīti
tika-abh02t:1391_26: dassento āha “samavāyābhāvā phale hetu natthīti hetusuññaṃ phala”nti.
tika-abh02t:1392_2: vā tannibbattadhammavisese, te paccayā etesaṃ dhammavisesānanti tappaccayadhammabhedā.
tika-abh02t:1392_4: Kiñcāpi maggakkhaṇe samathavipassanā yuganaddhāva, yathā pana suññatādisamaññā, evaṃ
tika-abh02t:1392_5: samathavipassanāsamaññāpi āgamanato maggassa siyunti āha “āgamanavasena vutto”ti.
tika-abh02t:1392_6: Yassa vā paññindriyaṃ adhikaṃ, tassa maggo vipassanā, itarassa samathoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t:1394_0: Ādāya ūhitvāti gahetvā viya takketvā vitakketvā. Dvinnanti sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappānaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1394_1: Purimakālassa viya niddeso yathā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”ti, “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
tika-abh02t:1395_0: Ogāhitunti ñāṇena paṭivijjhituṃ. Gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya saṇhattaṃ. Sukhumāya paññāya
tika-abh02t:1395_1: gahetabbatāya sukhumattaṃ. Itīti iminā kamenāti ayamatthoti adhippāyenāha “itisaddena
tika-abh02t:1395_2: vijānanakkamaṃ dassetī”ti. Evaṃ pakārehīti evaṃ-saddena jotiyamāno eva attho pakāra-saddena
tika-abh02t:1395_3: vuccatīti “evaṃ-saddena vijānanakāraṇabhūte naye dassetī”ti vuttaṃ. Itīti vā nidassanattho.
tika-abh02t:1395_4: Tena vuttappabhede paccāmasanavasena nidasseti. Evaṃ-saddo idamattho. Tena evaṃ pakārehīti
tika-abh02t:1399_0: 190. “Jātiādiniddese”ti iminā “tatthā”ti padassa atthaṃ vadati. Dukkhamātikāti dukkhadukkhādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1399_1: dukkhavisesānaṃ uddeso. Padadvayeti “pariyāyadukkhaṃ, nippariyāyadukkha”nti etasmiṃ padadvaye.
tika-abh02t:1400_0: Dukkhattāyevāti nippariyāyadukkhataṃ vadati. Sabhāvena nāmaṃ visesetīti anvatthasaññataṃ
tika-abh02t:1400_1: dasseti. Purimena sabhāvadukkhavācakena dukkhasaddena. So hi visesanaṃ avacchedakabhāvato
tika-abh02t:1400_2: pacchimaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṭṭhaṃ viseseti. So hi nivattetabbagahetabbasādhāraṇattā avacchinditabbo.
tika-abh02t:1401_0: Desetabbassa atthassa saṅkhipanaṃ idha saṅkhepo, so ca tabbibhāgānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1401_1: āha “saṅkhepo sāmañña”nti. Antokaritvāti antogadhe katvā, saṅgahetvā vā. Ubhayathāpīti
tika-abh02t:1401_2: saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi. Sādhāraṇabhāgānaṃ vibhajanaṃ vibhāgo, vitthāroti āha “vitthāro
tika-abh02t:1402_0: 191. Aparatthāti bhummavacanaṃ sāmiatthe yathā “sabbattha pādaka”nti āha “sāmiatthepi
tika-abh02t:1402_1: hi aparatthasaddo sijjhatī”ti. Siddhi pana “itarāhipi dissatī”ti iminā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t:1402_2: Yasmā ca evaṃ saddo sambhavati, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ sāmivasena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ bhummavasena
tika-abh02t:1402_3: dassitanti dīpento “tesaṃ tesanti vā”tiādimāha. Aparassāti aparassa sattassa. Manussādibhedo
tika-abh02t:1402_4: upapattibhavo gati, tabbisesabhūtā khattiyādisāmaññādhiṭṭhānā khandhā jātīti dassento
tika-abh02t:1403_0: Tiṇākāroti tiṇavikappo, tiṇavisesoti attho. Evanti nidassane. Tena vuttappakāraṃ
tika-abh02t:1403_1: paṭhamaṃ viññāṇapātubhāvaṃ paccāmasati. Tadupādāyāti tato paṭṭhāya. Ariyabhāvakaraṇattāti
tika-abh02t:1403_2: ariyabhāvakāraṇattā. Karotīti hi karaṇaṃ. Ariyasadisattā vā ariyasīlaṃ. Puthujjanakalyāṇakānampi
tika-abh02t:1403_4: Sahuppādakāti uppādasahitā uppādāvatthā khandhā. Āyatanavasenāti paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇāyatanavasena.
tika-abh02t:1403_5: Yonivasenāti aṇḍajādiyonivasena. Ekekeneva padenāti yathā dutiyanaye jātiādipadesu
tika-abh02t:1403_6: dvīhi dvīhi padehi paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇāyatanayonivibhāgena sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā
tika-abh02t:1403_7: jāti dassitā, na evamidha. Idha panetesu ekekeneva padena avibhāgato sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā.
tika-abh02t:1403_8: Ubhayatthāti purimapacchimanayesu bhāvaniddesova yutto. Anabhihite vibhattividhānaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1404_0: Dvinnaṃ dvinnanti ekavokārabhave rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dvinnaṃ, catuvokārabhave
tika-abh02t:1404_1: manāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dvinnaṃ. Seseti pañcavokārabhave. Pañcannanti cakkhusotamanorūpadhammāyatanavasena
tika-abh02t:1404_2: pañcannaṃ. Tāni hi rūpabhave pañcavokāre upapattikkhaṇe uppajjanti. Kāmadhātuyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1404_4: sattānaṃ. Indriyavaseneva hi āyatanānaṃ vekallaṃ icchitabbaṃ. Tattha vikalindriyassa
tika-abh02t:1404_5: sattannaṃ navannaṃ dasannaṃ punapi dasannaṃ, itarassa ekādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ vasena
tika-abh02t:1404_7: sattannaṃ. Gabbhaseyyakañhi sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Navannanti cakkhusotasaddāyatanavajjānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1404_8: navannaṃ. Andhabadhiravasena hidaṃ vuttaṃ. Dasannanti cakkhusaddavajjānaṃ. Puna dasannanti
tika-abh02t:1404_9: sotasaddavajjānaṃ. Andhavasena, badhiravasena cetaṃ dvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Ekādasannanti saddavajjānaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1405_1: uppattipaṭikkhepena abhāvakathanena. Dukkhuppattikāraṇeti dukkhuppattiyā hetubhūte dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne.
tika-abh02t:1407_2: tadavayavabhāvato. Tasseva nāmanti asammohatthaṃ vuttaṃ sabbassāpi ekakammanibbattajīvitindriyappabandhavicchedabhāvato.
tika-abh02t:1407_3: Sammutimaraṇameva hi jātikkhayamaraṇaṃ, taṃ pana jātikkhayamaraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1407_4: sarasamaraṇanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha sarasamaraṇampi āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ, puññakkhayamaraṇanti
tika-abh02t:1407_5: duvidhaṃ. Evametesaṃ tadekadesatā veditabbā. Yañcettha upakkamamaraṇaṃ, taṃ akālamaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1407_6: Sarasamaraṇaṃ kālamaraṇaṃ. Maraṇena sattā yathāladdhaattabhāvena viyujjantīti āha
tika-abh02t:1408: Kāraṇatthoti mūlattho. Mūlañhi “ādī”ti vuccati “ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, diṭṭhi ca ujukā”tiādīsu. Tenāha “sandhibandhanacchedamūlakanti attho”ti.
tika-abh02t:1409: Phalakiriyāgabbhā īdisī hetukiriyāti katvā vuttaṃ “antogadhā”ti. Byasanassa hi āpādakehi āpādanaṃ āpādetabbaāpattiyā saheva sijjhatīti.
tika-abh02t:1411_0: 194. Sukhaṃ hinoti pavattati etenāti sukhakāraṇaṃ hitaṃ. Bhogabyasanādipadatthavisesanti
tika-abh02t:1411_1: bhogabyasanaṃ, sīlabyasananti evaṃ bhogasīlapadānaṃ vasena atthavisesaṃ. Samāsavisesanti
tika-abh02t:1411_2: “rogoyeva byasanaṃ, diṭṭhi eva byasana”nti samānādhikaraṇavasena samāsavisesaṃ. Annapānavatthayānādi
tika-abh02t:1411_3: paribhuñjitabbato bhogoti adhippeto, so ca dhammasamūhabhāvena. Tabbināsāti ñātibhogabyasanāni
tika-abh02t:1411_4: vuttānīti te vikārabhāvena paññāpetabbattā paṇṇattimattā. Parinipphannaṃ nāma khandhapañcakaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1411_5: Ataṃsabhāvattā paṇṇatti aparinipphannā, anipphannā ca hotīti vuttaṃ “aparinipphannataṃ
tika-abh02t:1411_6: sandhāya anipphannānīti āhā”ti. Na hi paṇṇatti kenaci nipphādīyati. Aññatthāpi aparinipphanne
tika-abh02t:1411_8: “anipphanna”nti vuttaṃ, “nipphanna”nti pana na parinipphannameva vuccati, nāpi sabbo
tika-abh02t:1411_9: sabhāvadhammoti dassento “khandhavibhaṅge cā”tiādimāha. Nipphannatā vuttāti sambandho.
tika-abh02t:1411_10: Anipphannatā sabhāvadhammattepi kenaci na nipphādīyatīti katvā.
tika-abh02t:1412_0: Saṅkucitaṃ cintananti pītisomanassapaṭipakkhato, dosasampayogato ca ārammaṇe anabhiratippavattimāha.
tika-abh02t:1412_1: Anto attano nissayassa niddahanavasena vā jhānaṃ cintanaṃ antonijjhānaṃ. Satipi anusocanabhāve
tika-abh02t:1412_2: attano katākatakusalākusalavisayo manovilekhabhūto vippaṭisāro kukkuccaṃ, yathāvuttaantonijjhānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1413_2: socanākārassāpi vā nānāvīthikassa. Tampi hi dukkhamevāti. Aññathāti manodvārajavane
tika-abh02t:1415_0: 195. Ādevanasaddaṃ katvāti ādevitvā, vilapitvāti attho. Puggalassa sambhamabhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1415_1: yassa sattassa uppajjati, tassa anavaṭṭhānabhāvo. Sambhamaṃ vā abbhantaragataṃ tassa
tika-abh02t:1417: Yena domanassena. Pubbe vuttadukkhatoti “attano khandhaṃ muṭṭhīhi pothetī”tiādinā vuttadukkhato. Taṃnidānanti paridevanidānaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1419: 196-7. Kāyadukkhābhibhūtassa patikārābhilāsāya tādisadukkhāvahapayogakālādīsu kāyikadukkhassa tadupanissayatā veditabbā. Etena dukkhenāti anāthatāhatthapādacchedanādidukkhena.
tika-abh02t:1421: 198. Dukkhaṭṭhānanisajjādīni dukkhaṭṭhānādīni. Domanassassa vatthu hoti upāyāsoti sambandho.
tika-abh02t:1423: 199. Aññasāpekkhasaddo asamatthasamāsoti taṃ dasseti “yena samāso, na tassāyaṃ paṭisedhako a-kāro”ti.
tika-abh02t:1424_0: Pacchimadvayanti “samodhānaṃ missībhāvo”ti idaṃ padadvayaṃ. Tadatthavasenāti samodhānatthassa,
tika-abh02t:1424_1: missībhāvatthassa ca vasena saṅkhāresu labbhati. Āgatehi ca tehi saṅkhārehi puggalassa
tika-abh02t:1427_0: 201. Taṃ kālanti cuticittanirodhato uddhaṃ kālaṃ. “Yampī”ti yaṃ-saddo karaṇatthe
tika-abh02t:1427_1: paccattanti yenapīti attho vutto. “Yaṃ iccha”nti yaṃ-saddo yadā icchāpekkho, tadā
tika-abh02t:1427_2: “na labhatī”ti ettha alābhapadhānābhāvato icchā visesīyatīti āha “alābhavisiṭṭhā
tika-abh02t:1427_3: icchā vuttā hotī”ti. “Icchaṃ na labhati ya”nti evaṃ kiriyāparāmasanabhūto yaṃ-saddo
tika-abh02t:1427_4: yadā “na labhatī”ti etaṃ apekkhati, tattha guṇabhūtā icchā, padhānabhūto alābhoti
tika-abh02t:1428: Hirottapparahitā chinnikā, dhuttikāti vuccantīti āha “chinnabhinnagaṇenāti nillajjena dhuttagaṇenā”ti. Kappaṭikā sibbitapilotikadhārino.
tika-abh02t:1431: 202. Tādisassa vatthuno sabbhāvāti sāmaññato anavasesaggahaṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh02t:1432: Atipākaṭena ati viya pakāsena dukkhenāti attho.
tika-abh02t:1435_0: 203. Mano viyāti mano-saddassa viya. Ika-saddenāti “ponobhavikā”ti ettha ika-saddena.
tika-abh02t:1435_1: Gamiyatthattāti ñāpitatthattā. Karaṇasīlatā hi idha sīlattho, so ca ika-saddena vuccatīti
tika-abh02t:1435_2: kiriyāvācakassa karaṇasaddassa adassanaṃ appayogo. Vuttatthānañhi appayogo. Sati
tika-abh02t:1435_3: paccayantarasamavāye punabbhavassa dāyikā, tadabhāve adāyikāti vuttāti āha “adāyikāpi
tika-abh02t:1435_5: cā”ti. Tattha sabhāvo taṇhāyanaṃ. Ānubhāvo paccayasamavāye phalanipphādanasamatthatā.
tika-abh02t:1435_6: Itaresūti avasiṭṭhakilesādīsu. Pavattivipākadāyino kammassa sahāyabhūtā taṇhā “upadhivepakkā”ti
tika-abh02t:1435_7: adhippetāti āha “upadhimhi yathānibbatte”tiādi. Yathānibbatteti attano paccayehi
tika-abh02t:1435_8: nibbattappakāre. Nandanaṃ saṃuppilāvanaṃ abhitassanaṃ. Rañjanaṃ vatthassa viya raṅgajātena
tika-abh02t:1435_9: cittassa vipariṇāmanaṃ, ramāpanaṃ vā. Rāgasambandhenāti rāgapadasambandhena “uppannassā”ti
tika-abh02t:1435_10: pulliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Rūpārūpabhavarāgo visuṃ vakkhatīti ettha vakkhati-kiriyāpadaṃ
tika-abh02t:1436_0: “Savatthukaṃ cakkhu”nti iminā sakalaṃ cakkhudasakamāha, dutiyena sasambhāracakkhuṃ.
tika-abh02t:1436_1: Chiddanti kaṇṇassa chiddapadesaṃ. Kaṇṇabaddhanti kaṇṇapāḷi. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato rattakambalapaṭalaṃ
tika-abh02t:1436_2: viya, kiccato mudusiniddhamadhurarasadaṃ maññanti. Sāmaññena gahitāti visayena avisesetvā
tika-abh02t:1436_3: gahitā. Visayavisiṭṭhāti cakkhādivisayavisiṭṭhā. Ettha uppajjatīti samudāyāvayavehi
tika-abh02t:1436_4: viya sāmaññavisesehi na nānattavohāro na hoti yathā “rukkho siṃsapā”ti. Na hi sabbo
tika-abh02t:1436_5: rukkho siṃsapā. Tasmā kiriyābhedasabbhāvato “sayānā bhuñjanti sadhanā”tiādīsu viya
tika-abh02t:1436_6: “uppajjamānā”ti ettha kiriyāya lakkhaṇatā, itarattha lakkhitabbatā ca vuttā. Yadi
tika-abh02t:1436_7: uppajjamānā hotīti anicchitattā sāsaṅkaṃ uppādakiriyāya atthibhāvamāha. Tena uppāde
tika-abh02t:1436_8: satīti ayametassa atthoti “uppajjamānā”ti ettha uppādo hetubhāvena vutto, itaro ca
tika-abh02t:1436_9: tassa phalabhāvenāti āha “so hi tena upayojito viya hotī”ti. Uppajjamānāti vā taṇhāya
tika-abh02t:1436_10: tattha uppajjanasīlatā uppajjanasabhāvo, uppajjanasamatthatā vā vuttā. Tattheva cassā
tika-abh02t:1436_11: uppajjanasīlatā sakkāyato aññasmiṃ visaye pavattiyā abhāvato, samatthatā paccayasamavāyena,
tika-abh02t:1436_12: aññathā asamatthatā, yato kadāci na uppajjati. Nivisamānā nivisatīti etthāpi iminā
tika-abh02t:1439_0: 204. Taṇhāya virajjanaṃ haliddirāgassa viya palujjananti katvā āha “khayagamanavasenā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1439_1: Vicchinnaṃ nirujjhananti vuttaṃ “appavattigamanavasenā”ti. Cajanaṃ chaḍḍanaṃ, hāpanaṃ
tika-abh02t:1440_0: Tadappavatti viyāti tassā tittaalābuvalliyā appavatti viya. Appavattihetubhūtampi
tika-abh02t:1440_1: nibbānaṃ taṇhāya appavatti viya gayhatīti āha “tadappavatti viyā”ti yathā “rāgakkhayo”ti.
tika-abh02t:1440_2: Appavattibhūtanti taṇhāya appavattiyā pattaṃ, pattabbanti attho. Nibbānaṃ āgamma
tika-abh02t:1440_3: niruddhāyapi taṇhāya piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhāti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttāti
tika-abh02t:1440_4: yojanā. Ettha ca yasmā maggo, nibbānañca taṇhāya samucchedasādhanaṃ, tasmā “purimā
tika-abh02t:1440_5: vā upamā”tiādinā upamādvayaṃ ubhayattha yathākkamaṃ yojitaṃ, ubhayaṭṭhāniyaṃ pana
tika-abh02t:1443: 205. Titthiyehi kappitassa maggassa pakatipurisantarañāṇādikassa. Ariyaṃ labhāpetīti ariyaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ labhāpeti.
tika-abh02t:1444_0: Tabbipakkhaviratisabhāvāti tassā sammāvācāya vipakkhato micchāvācāya viratisabhāvā.
tika-abh02t:1444_1: Bhedakaramicchāvācā pisuṇavācā, sabbāpi vā micchāvācā visaṃvādanādivasena bhedakarīti
tika-abh02t:1444_3: musāvādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā siniddhabhāvena pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācā tappaccayasubhāsitasampaṭiggāhake
tika-abh02t:1444_4: jane, sampayuttadhamme ca pariggaṇhantī pavattatīti pariggahalakkhaṇā. Tenāha “jane,
tika-abh02t:1444_5: sampayutte ca pariggaṇhanakiccavatī”ti. Cīvarakammādiko tādiso payogo. Kātabbaṃ cīvararajanādikaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1444_6: Niravajjasamuṭṭhāpanakiccavāti niravajjassa kattabbassa, niravajjākārena vā samuṭṭhāpanakiccavā.
tika-abh02t:1444_7: Sampayuttadhamme ca samuṭṭhāpentoti ettha samuṭṭhāpanaṃ micchākammantapaṭipakkhabhūtassa
tika-abh02t:1444_8: attano kiccassa anuguṇabhāvena sampayuttānaṃ pavattanameva, ukkhipanaṃ vā nesaṃ kāyikakiriyāya
tika-abh02t:1444_9: bhārukkhipanaṃ viya. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ, ājīvasseva vā visodhanaṃ vodāpanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1445_0: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhāti diṭṭhiyā sahajapahānekaṭṭhā, paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhivaseneva taṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1445_2: kato hoti. Uparimaggasammādiṭṭhiyā pana diṭṭhiṭṭhāne taṃtaṃmaggavajjho māno gahetabbo.
tika-abh02t:1445_3: So hi “aha”nti pavattiākārato diṭṭhiṭṭhāniyo. Pakāsetīti kiccapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati.
tika-abh02t:1445_4: Teneva hi aṅgenāti teneva sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena maggaṅgena. Tathāpavattitena karaṇabhūtena,
tika-abh02t:1445_5: tena vā kāraṇena. Aṅga-saddo hi kāraṇatthopi hotīti. Tatthāti magge, maggacittuppāde vā.
tika-abh02t:1446_0: Imassevāti ariyamaggapariyāpannasseva. Yadipi viramitabbato viramantassa cetanāpi
tika-abh02t:1446_1: labbhateva, viratiyā eva pana tadā padhānabhāvoti āha “viramaṇakāle vā viratiyo”ti.
tika-abh02t:1446_2: Subhāsitādīti asamphappalāpādi. Ādi-saddena apisuṇādi saṅgahitā. Bhāsanādīti ettha
tika-abh02t:1446_3: pana kāyasucaritādi. Amaggaṅgattāti amaggasabhāvattā. Tameva cetanāya amaggasabhāvataṃ
tika-abh02t:1446_4: dassetuṃ “ekassa ñāṇassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sammāvācādikiccattayaṃ nāma micchāvācādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1446_5: tiṇṇaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ samucchindanaṃ, maggacetanā ca taṃsabhāvā na hotīti na tassā
tika-abh02t:1446_6: maggakkhaṇe sammāvācādibhāvasiddhi. Taṃsiddhiyanti kiccattayasiddhiyaṃ. Yathā panassā
tika-abh02t:1446_7: pubbabhāge subhāsitavācādibhāvo, evaṃ maggakkhaṇepi siyā. Evaṃ sante yathā tattha
tika-abh02t:1446_8: ekassa sammāsaṅkappassa tikiccatā, sammādiṭṭhiādīnañca ekekānaṃ catukiccatā, evaṃ
tika-abh02t:1446_9: ekā maggacetanā sammāvācādikiccattayassa sādhikā bhaveyya, tathā ca sati magge sammāvācādīni
tika-abh02t:1446_10: tīṇi aṅgāni na bhaveyyuṃ, chaḷaṅgiko ca ariyamaggo siyāti tayidamāha “ekāya cetanāyā”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t:1446_11: Yasmā panetaṃ natthi, tasmā maggapaccayatāvacanato ca na cetanāya maggabhāvoti maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh02t:1447: Brūhanaṃ sukhaṃ. Santasukhaṃ upekkhā. Sā hi “upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti vuttā. Vitakkādīnanti teyeva abhiniropanādayo pākaṭapariyāyena vuttā.
tika-abh02t:1448_0: Vacīsaṅkhārabhāvato vacībhedassa upakārako vitakko. “Sāvajjā…pe… upakārako evā”ti
tika-abh02t:1448_1: iminā vacībhedataṃ samuṭṭhāpakacetanānaṃ viya viratiyāpi visesapaccayo vitakkoti
tika-abh02t:1448_2: dasseti. Vacībhedaniyāmikā vācāti vacīduccaritaviratimāha. Sā hi sammāvācābhūtā micchāvācāsu
tika-abh02t:1448_3: saṃyaminī. Tattha yathā visaṃvādanādimicchāvācato avirato micchākammantatopi na viramateva.
tika-abh02t:1448_4: Yathāha – “ekaṃ dhammaṃ…pe… akāriya”nti. Tathā avisaṃvādanādinā sammāvācāya ṭhito
tika-abh02t:1448_5: sammākammantampi pūretiyevāti āha “vacībheda…pe… upakārikā”ti. Dhammānaṃ pavattiniṭṭhābhāvato
tika-abh02t:1448_6: yathā gatīti nibbatti vuccati, evaṃ pavattibhāvato rasalakkhaṇānipīti āha “kiccādisabhāve vā”ti.
tika-abh02t:1450: Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho, atthaparipucchanaṃ paripucchāti tadubhayaṃ savanādhīnanti āha “savanañāṇe eva avarodhaṃ gacchantī”ti. Ñāṇena paricchinditvā gahaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1452: Soti kāmavitakkappavattiyā kāraṇabhūto subhanimitte ayonisomanasikāro. Tassāti kāmavitakkassa. Gataṃ gamanaṃ pavatti, tassa upāyoti gatamaggo.
tika-abh02t:1454_0: Maggabhāvena catubbidhampi ekattenāti sotāpattimaggādivasena catubbidhampi maggabhāvena
tika-abh02t:1454_1: ekattena sāmaññato gahetvā “assā”ti ekavacanena vuttanti attho. Sabbassa maggassa
tika-abh02t:1454_2: aññamaññaṃ sadisatā, tathā asadisatā ca ekaccasadisatā ca jhānaṅgavasena sabbasadisasabbāsadisaekaccasadisatā,
tika-abh02t:1454_3: so eva visesoti yojetabbaṃ. Vipassanāniyāmaṃ dhuraṃ katvā āhāti sambandho. Idha panāti
tika-abh02t:1454_4: imissā sammohavinodaniyaṃ. Sammasi…pe… nivattanatoti paṭhamattheravādaṃ vadanto tadajjhāsayaṃ
tika-abh02t:1454_5: purakkhatvā vadatīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Itarathā itaravādāpettha dassitā evāti.
tika-abh02t:1454_6: Pādakajjhānaniyāmanti pādakajjhānaniyāmaṃ dhuraṃ katvā āhāti yojanā. “Vipassanā …pe…
tika-abh02t:1454_7: daṭṭhabbo”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi tassā idha paṭikkhepatā atthi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “keci
tika-abh02t:1454_8: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyāmetīti vadantī”ti? Nayidamevaṃ. Idhāpīti idha pādakajjhānaniyāmepi
tika-abh02t:1454_9: vipassanāniyāmo na paṭikkhittoti ayañhettha attho. Tenevāha “sādhāraṇattā”ti. “Idha
tika-abh02t:1454_10: panā”ti imināpi paṭhamattheravādo saṅgahitoti veditabbo. Yadi evaṃ kasmā vipassanāniyāmo
tika-abh02t:1454_11: visuṃ gahitoti? Vādattayāvidhuratādassanatthaṃ. Aññe cācariyavādāti sammasitajjhānapuggalajjhāsayavādā.
tika-abh02t:1455_0: “Āruppe tikacatukkajjhānaṃ…pe… na lokiya”nti idaṃ theravāde āgataṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1455_1: tantiṃ katvā ṭhapitanti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ saṅgahetvā vuttanti āha “vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyanti
tika-abh02t:1455_2: adhippāyo”ti. Yesūti pacchimajjhānavajjāni sandhāya vadati. Tattha hi arūpuppattiyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1455_3: saṃsayo, na itarasmiṃ. “Catukkapañcakajjhāna”nti vutte avisesato sāsavānāsavaṃ apekkhīyati,
tika-abh02t:1455_5: vatvā nivattitadhammadassanatthaṃ “na lokiya”nti vuttanti dassento āha “samudāyañca…pe…
tika-abh02t:1455_6: āhā”ti. Itarathā byabhicārābhāvato “lokuttara”nti visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. Tayo
tika-abh02t:1455_7: maggāti dutiyamaggādayo. Tajjhānikanti tikacatukkajjhānikaṃ sotāpattiphalādiṃ. Aññajhānikāpīti
tika-abh02t:1455_8: tikacatukkajjhānato aññajhānikāpi catukkajjhānikāpi maggā uppajjanti. Pi-saddena
tika-abh02t:1455_9: tajjhānikāpi tikacatukkajjhānikāti attho. Yadi evaṃ catuvokārabhavepi pañcavokārabhave
tika-abh02t:1455_10: viya maggassa tikacatukkajjhānikabhāve kenassa jhānaṅgādiniyāmoti āha “jhānaṅgādiniyāmikā
tika-abh02t:1455_11: pubbābhisaṅkhārasamāpattī”ti. Pubbābhisaṅkhārasamāpattīti ca pādakabhūtā attanā atikkantadhammavirāgabhāvena
tika-abh02t:1455_12: vipassanāya pubbābhisaṅkhārakārī arūpasamāpatti, phalasamāpatti vā. Tenāha “pādaka”nti.
tika-abh02t:1455_13: Na sammasitabbāti na sammasitabbā samāpatti jhānaṅgādiniyāmikā sammasitabbānaṃ tikacatukkajjhānānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1455_14: tattha anuppajjanato, itarattha ca visesābhāvato. Phalassapīti catutthapañcamajjhānikaphalassapi.
tika-abh02t:1456_1: yena yena kusalena saddhiṃ nekkhammasaṅkappādayo uppajjanti, tassa tassa kusalassa
tika-abh02t:1456_2: ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti taṃtaṃkusalārammaṇārammaṇā, tabbhāvato. Taṃtaṃviramitabbādiārammaṇattāti
tika-abh02t:1456_3: visaṃvādanavatthuādiārammaṇattā. Vītikkamitabbato eva hi viratīti. “Aṅgāna”nti idaṃ
tika-abh02t:1456_4: “nekkhammasaṅkappādīna”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ avayavena vinā samudāyābhāvato. Visesapaccayoti
tika-abh02t:1456_5: bhinnasīlassa, aparisuddhasīlassa vā sammappadhānāsambhavato samādhānassa viya vāyāmassa
tika-abh02t:1456_6: sīlaṃ visesapaccayo. Ayañca attho yadipi purimasiddhasīlavasena yutto, sahajātavasenāpi
tika-abh02t:1456_7: pana labbhatevāti dassento “sampayuttassāpī”ti āha. Sahajameva cettha adhippetanti
tika-abh02t:1456_8: āha “sampayuttasseva cā”tiādi. Sammoso pamādo, tappaṭipakkho asammoso appamādo, so
tika-abh02t:1457_0: Sīlakkhandho cāti ca-saddena samādhikkhandho ca. Khantippadhānattā sīlassa adosasādhanatā,
tika-abh02t:1461_0: 206-214. “Pariññeyyabhāvarahite ekantapahātabbe”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu taṇhāyapi cakkhādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t:1461_1: viya taṇhāvatthutāvacanena pariññeyyatā vuttā. Yathāha “rūpataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ
tika-abh02t:1461_2: sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t:1461_4: ca na taṇhāya eva, atha kho avasesānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānampi. Tathā hi tesaṃ sabbaso
tika-abh02t:1461_5: accantappahāyikā dassanabhāvanāti? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi yathā “dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
tika-abh02t:1461_6: pariññeyya”nti taṇhāvajje upādānakkhandhapañcake pariññeyyabhāvo niruḷho, na tathā
tika-abh02t:1461_7: taṇhāya, taṇhāya pana “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā”tiādinā samudayabhāvo viya sātisayaṃ
tika-abh02t:1461_9: Yassa asaṅgahito padeso atthi, so sappadeso, ekadesoti attho. Tatthāti ariyasaccasadde.
tika-abh02t:1461_10: Samudayoti samudayattho. “Nippadesato samudayaṃ dassetu”nti samudayassevettha gahaṇe
tika-abh02t:1461_11: kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “dukkhanirodhā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dukkhanirodhāti dukkhaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1461_12: nirodho ca. Ariyasaccadesanāyanti ariyasaccadesanāyampi saccadesanāyaṃ viya. Dhammatoti
tika-abh02t:1461_13: desetabbadhammato nippadesā eva. “Avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā desanābhedo eva hi tattha
tika-abh02t:1461_14: viseso. Tenāha “na hi tato añño”tiādi. Apubbo natthīti dhammato apubbo natthīti attho.
tika-abh02t:1461_15: Tassāti samudayassa. Sabbattha tīsupi vāresūti aṭṭhaṅgikapañcaṅgikasabbasaṅgāhikabhedesu
tika-abh02t:1461_16: mahāvāresu, tadantogadhesu ca pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu. Apubbassāti “avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā
tika-abh02t:1461_17: taṇhāya apubbassa. Avasiṭṭhakilesādīnañhi samudayatāvacanaṃ idha apubbadassanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1461_18: Tassa yadipi dutiyatatiyavāresu viseso natthi, pañcasu pana koṭṭhāsesu uparūpari
tika-abh02t:1461_19: apubbaṃ dassitanti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi samudayavisesadassanaṃ, itaraṃ pana maggavisesadassanaṃ.
tika-abh02t:1461_20: Tassa ca dhammato apubbābhāvo dassitoyeva. Yadi evaṃ dutiyādikoṭṭhāsesu, paṭhamakoṭṭhāsepi
tika-abh02t:1461_21: vā kasmā taṇhā gahitāti āha “apubbasamudayadassanatthāyapi hī”tiādi. Kevalāyāti tadaññakilesādinirapekkhāya.
tika-abh02t:1461_22: Desanāvasena na vuttoti na dhammavasenāti adhippāyo. Tasmā dukkhādīni tattha ariyasaccadesanāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1461_23: sappadesāni dassitāni honti pariyāyenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhidhammadesanā pana nippariyāyakathāti
tika-abh02t:1461_24: katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nippadesato samudayaṃ dassetuṃ”icceva vuttaṃ. Paccayasaṅkhātanti
tika-abh02t:1462_0: Tesanti kusaladhammānaṃ. Paccayānaṃ pahānavasenāti hetunirodhena phalanirodhaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh02t:1462_1: tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānena vā kusalānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave,
tika-abh02t:1462_2: pahātabbā”ti. Iti pariyāyato kusalānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ, na nippariyāyato tadabhāvatoti
tika-abh02t:1462_3: āha “na hi kusalā pahātabbā”ti. Yathā ca kusaladhammesu, abyākatadhammesupi eseva
tika-abh02t:1462_4: nayo. Nirodhanti asaṅkhatadhātuṃ. Appavattibhāvoti yo nirodhassa nibbānassa taṇhādiappavattihetubhāvo,
tika-abh02t:1463_1: ariyamaggassa dassetīti sambandho. Pañcaṅgikaṃ…pe… pavattataṃ dīpeti, na pana ariyamaggassa
tika-abh02t:1463_3: idaṃ hetuatthe nissakkavacananti dasseti. Vacanatoti vā īdisassa vacanassa sabbhāvato.
tika-abh02t:1463_4: Paṭipadāya ekadesopi paṭipadā evāti attho. Niddiṭṭho dhammasaṅgāhakehi saṅgāyanavasena.
tika-abh02t:1464_0: Jhānehi desanāpaveso “lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī”ti jhānasīsena desanāva. Tathā bhāvanāpaveso.
tika-abh02t:1464_1: Pāḷigamananti pāḷipavatti pāṭhadesanā. Yathāvijjamānadhammavasenāti tasmiṃ cittuppāde
tika-abh02t:1467_0: 215. Tassāti suttantabhājanīyassa. Evaṃ panāti “apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge
tika-abh02t:1467_1: nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā”tiādippakārena. Evañca katvāti lokuttaramaggasseva maggasaccabhāvassa
tika-abh02t:1467_2: adhippetattā. Tenāti tena kāraṇena, ariyamaggasseva uddisitvā niddiṭṭhattāti attho.
tika-abh02t:1472_0: 219. Cakkhudvārabhāveti cakkhudvārabhāvahetu. Taṃdvārikehīti tasmiṃ dvāre pavattanakehi
tika-abh02t:1472_1: cittacetasikehi. Te hi “taṃ dvāraṃ pavattiokāsabhūtaṃ etesaṃ atthī”ti taṃdvārikā.
tika-abh02t:1472_2: Nanu ca tabbatthukehipi taṃ indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tikkhe tikkhattā,
tika-abh02t:1472_3: mande ca mandattā”ti? Saccaṃ kāreti, tabbatthukāpi pana idha “taṃdvārikā”icceva vuttā.
tika-abh02t:1472_4: Apariccattadvārabhāvaṃyeva hi cakkhu nissayaṭṭhena “vatthū”ti vuccati. Atha vā taṃdvārikesu
tika-abh02t:1472_5: tassa indaṭṭho pākaṭoti “taṃdvārikehī”ti vuttaṃ. Indaṭṭho parehi anuvattanīyatā paramissarabhāvoti
tika-abh02t:1472_6: dassento “tañhi…pe… anuvattantī”ti āha. Tattha tanti cakkhuṃ. Teti taṃdvārike. Kiriyāniṭṭhānavācī
tika-abh02t:1473_0: “Cha imāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni. Katamāni cha? Cakkhundriyaṃ…pe… manindriya”nti
tika-abh02t:1473_1: evaṃ katthaci chapindriyāni āgatāni, kasmā pana suttante khandhādayo viya indriyāni
tika-abh02t:1473_2: ekajjhaṃ na vuttāni, abhidhamme ca vuttānīti āha “tattha suttante”tiādi. Nissaraṇūpāyādibhāvatoti
tika-abh02t:1473_3: ettha lokuttaresu maggapariyāpannāni nissaraṇaṃ, itarāni nissaraṇaphalaṃ, vivaṭṭasannissitena
tika-abh02t:1473_4: nibbattitāni saddhindriyādīni nissaraṇūpāyo, itaresu kānici pavattibhūtāni, kānici
tika-abh02t:1474: Khīṇāsavassa bhāvabhūtoti chaḷaṅgupekkhā viya khīṇāsavasseva dhammabhūto.
tika-abh02t:1475_0: Dve atthāti indaliṅgaindasiṭṭhaṭṭhā. Attano paccayavasenāti yathāsakaṃ kammādipaccayavasena.
tika-abh02t:1475_1: Taṃsahitasantāneti itthindriyasahite, purisindriyasahite ca santāne. Aññākārenāti
tika-abh02t:1475_2: itthiādito aññena ākārena. Anuvattanīyabhāvo itthipurisindriyānaṃ ādhipaccanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t:1476_0: Tesanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ. Yā sukhadukkhindriyānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhākārasambhogarasatā
tika-abh02t:1476_1: vuttā, sā ārammaṇasabhāveneva veditabbā, na ekaccasomanassindriyādīnaṃ viya parikappavasenāti
tika-abh02t:1477_0: Yadipi purisindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ rūpakaṇḍepi desitaṃ, taṃ pana rūpajīvitindriyaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1477_1: na ca tattha manindriyaṃ vatvā itthipurisindriyāni vuttāni. Idha pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh02t:1477_2: indriyānukkamo vutto sabbākārena yamakadesanāya saṃsandatīti dassento āha “so indriyayamakadesanāya
tika-abh02t:1477_3: sametī”ti. Purimapacchimānaṃ ajjhattikabāhirānanti cakkhādīnaṃ purimānaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ,
tika-abh02t:1477_4: itthindriyādīnaṃ pacchimānaṃ bāhirānaṃ. Tesaṃ majjhe vuttaṃ ubhayesaṃ upakārakatādīpanatthanti
tika-abh02t:1477_5: adhippāyo. Tena evampi desanantarānurodhena jīvitindriyassa anukkamaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-abh02t:1477_6: dasseti. Kāmañcettha evaṃ vuttaṃ, parato pana kiccavinicchaye idha pāḷiyaṃ āgataniyāmeneva
tika-abh02t:1477_8: dassessati. Sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhabhāvena, yathārahaṃ vā dukkhadukkhatādibhāvena.
tika-abh02t:1477_10: Rūpārūpavasena duvidhampi hi jīvitindriyaṃ idha gahitaṃ. “Pavattī”ti etena sahajātadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t:1477_12: iminā phalabhūtaṃ aññindriyaṃ nivatteti. Bhāvanāgahaṇañcettha sakkā avattuṃ. “Bhāvetabbattā”ti
tika-abh02t:1477_13: vuttattā bhāvanābhāvo pākaṭova. Dassanānantarāti samānajātibhūmikena abyavahitataṃ
tika-abh02t:1478_0: Tassāti indriyapaccayabhāvassa. Anaññasādhāraṇattāti aññehi anindriyehi asādhāraṇattā.
tika-abh02t:1478_1: Evaṃ sāmatthiyato kiccavisesaṃ vavatthapetvā pakaraṇatopi taṃ dasseti “indriyakathāya
tika-abh02t:1478_2: ca pavattattā”ti. Aññesanti aññesaṃ indriyasabhāvānampi sahajātadhammānaṃ. Yehi te
tika-abh02t:1478_3: indaṭṭhaṃ kārenti, tesaṃ vasavattāpanaṃ natthi, yathā manindriyassa pubbaṅgamasabhāvābhāvato
tika-abh02t:1478_4: sayañca te aññadatthu manindriyasseva vase vattanti. Tenāha “taṃsampayuttānipi hī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t:1478_5: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ tesaṃ indaṭṭhoti? “Sukhanādilakkhaṇe sampayuttānaṃ attākārānuvidhāpanamatta”nti
tika-abh02t:1478_6: vuttovāyamattho. “Cetasikattā”ti iminā sampayuttadhammānaṃ cittassa padhānataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t:1478_7: Tato hi “cetasikā”ti vuccanti. Sabbatthāti vasavattāpanaṃ sahajātadhammānupālananti
tika-abh02t:1478_8: evaṃ yāva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca sampayuttānanti taṃkiccaniddese. “Anuppādane,
tika-abh02t:1478_9: anupatthambhe ca satī”ti padaṃ āharitvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Na hi padattho sabbhāvaṃ
